The Jordan 1 Mid University Blue Black was released on July 14th, 2023, for $125 retail.

Name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG ‘Yellow Ochre’
Text: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG ‘Yellow Ochre’ sports a smooth leather upper, featuring a white base with mustard yellow overlays at the forefoot and heel. Contrasting black accents settle on the high-cut collar and Swoosh. A woven Nike Air tag decorates the breathable nylon tongue, while the retro Wings logo is imprinted on the lateral collar flap. Lightweight cushioning is provided by a polyurethane wedge, housed in a durable rubber cupsole and fitted with an encapsulated Air-sole unit in the heel.

Name: Nike Dunk Low PRM Bacon (Women's)
Text:
The Nike Dunk Low PRM Bacon (Women’s) presents an exclusive colorway for women, drawing inspiration from the iconic 2004 release of the Air Max 90 "Bacon."

Showcasing a Sail tumbled leather foundation, the Nike Dunk Low PRM Bacon (Women’s) is enhanced by Sport Red suede eyestays and overlays. Touches of Sheen Pink adorn the mesh tongues and leather Swooshes, while Medium Brown accents on the heel tabs and tongue labels add vibrancy to the design. The low-top silhouette is positioned on a classic cupsole, featuring white sidewalls and a brown rubber outsole.

A distinctive aspect of the Nike Dunk Low PRM Bacon (Women’s) is its unique color palette. This particular Dunk Low pays homage to its celebrated predecessor, boasting a vibrant color scheme and incorporating iconic design elements. The combination of these features makes the shoe a standout and appealing addition to the Nike Dunk Low collection. The sneaker debuted for $125 on December 21st, 2023.

Name: Jordan 5 Retro A Ma Maniére Dawn (Women's)
Text:
Step into the dawn of a new era with the exclusive A Ma Maniére x Air Jordan 5 "Dawn". This collaboration infuses classic elegance with a street-ready edge. The leather upper pairs with a gleaming metallic silver tongue, preserving the silhouette's celebrated features like the prominent "23" on the heel and the distinctive shark teeth design. ​
​​
​Echoing the hues of early morning skies, the "Dawn" presents a color palette of Photon Dust, Black, Diffused Blue, and Pale Ivory. It's an all-new colorway, a testament to A Ma Maniére's finesse and Jordan's timeless appeal. The slimmed-down collar and pre-yellowed quarter panel netting, round out the exclusive design elements.​
​​
​Released on November 17, 2023, and priced at $225, this women's exclusive sneaker is a must-have for collectors and style mavens alike. Grab your pair and witness the rise of a new icon.

Name: Jordan 3 Retro J Balvin Rio
Text:
The Jordan 3 Retro J Balvin Rio perfectly blends the classic Jordan 3 design with J Balvin's signature flair. Featuring a predominantly black upper, this sneaker is brought to life with solar flare and total crimson abyss accents that capture the vibrant energy of J Balvin’s music. The iconic elephant print on the heel and toe areas pays homage to the original Jordan 3 design, while the gradient midsole transitioning from bright orange to deep abyss adds a unique and colorful twist.

As part of his ongoing collaboration with Jordan brand, J Balvin's "Rio" edition, named after his son, infuses a personal and artistic touch into the Jordan 3 model. The sneaker's construction maintains the high standards of comfort and durability that the Jordan 3 is known for. The bold colorway reflects J Balvin’s dynamic personality, making this model a standout piece. The thoughtful design elements, from the premium leather to the eye-catching gradient midsole, highlight the meticulous attention to detail in this collaboration.

Retailing at $250, the Jordan 3 Retro J Balvin Rio was released on May 22, 2024. This sneaker is a tribute to J Balvin's influence and the enduring legacy of the Jordan brand. Don’t miss out on this unique and stylish collaboration that perfectly captures the essence of both the music and sneaker worlds.

Name: Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 Silver Off White
Text:
The Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 drops in a striking Silver/Off White palette, seamlessly merging vintage vibes with contemporary fashion.

At the forefront of the sneaker game, this classic silhouette has reinvented itself once again. Featuring leather craftsmanship, the shimmering silver upper is complemented beautifully by muted off-white highlights, and an off white midsole making it an instant head-turner. But it isn't just about aesthetics; the Mexico 66 is a statement piece with a history. When you lace up, you're not only joining the fashion-forward crowd but also honoring the iconic legacy of Onitsuka Tiger.

This trendsetting blends classic old-school charm with modern flair. The Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 in Silver/Off White was available at an initial retail price of $120.

Name: April Skateboards x Nike Dunk Low SB 'Turbo Green'
Text: The April Skateboards x Nike Dunk Low SB ‘Turbo Green’ dresses the retro model in an airy white mesh upper, accented with a chrome Swoosh and fortified with suede overlays in a bright teal finish. White leather is utilized on the toe box and back tab, marked with April and Nike SB branding across the left and right shoe. ‘April’ is stamped on the lateral heel, while each tongue tag displays mismatched Nike SB and April logos. Underfoot, a translucent rubber outsole reveals a unique floral graphic.

Name: New Balance 550 ‘White Grey’
Text: The New Balance 550 ‘White Grey’ offers a clean colorway of the vintage hoops shoe retrieved from the brand’s late ‘80s archive. A monochromatic white finish is executed on the leather upper, featuring a tonal ‘N’ logo and perforated midfoot detailing. Breathable mesh construction on the collar and tongue provides a comfortable fit. The low-top is mounted on a durable rubber cupsole, with an EVA wedge for lightweight cushioning. Grey New Balance branding on the heel is matched by the rubber outsole.

Name: Nike Dunk Low 'Michigan State'
Text: The Nike Dunk Low ‘Michigan State’ delivers a low-top version of the Michigan State Dunk from 2020. Like its predecessor, the shoe features a two-tone all-leather upper rendered in classic ‘Be True to Your School’ color blocking. A stark white finish is contrasted by a dark green Swoosh and matching overlays at the toe and heel. Standard Nike branding hits decorate the heel and nylon tongue. The low-top is mounted on a durable rubber outsole, complete with a traction pattern originally developed for the hardwood.

Name: Air Jordan 8 Retro 'Playoff' 2023
Text: The 2023 edition of the Air Jordan 8 Retro ‘Playoff’ celebrates the 30th anniversary of the shoe that Michael Jordan wore when he captured his third NBA championship in 1993. Previously released in 2013 and 2007, the legacy silhouette carries a black nubuck upper with a unique cross-strap design for a secure, locked-in fit. A crimson Jumpman decorates a tongue patch made with fuzzy chenille, while an embroidered ‘23’ lands on the vamp. A red and black brushstroke graphic adorns synthetic overlays along the lateral and medial sides of the ‘Playoff’ 8s. The sneaker rests on a matching black foam midsole with glossy sidewalls and encapsulated Air-sole cushioning. A multicolor rubber outsole reveals a golden Jumpman logo under the forefoot.

Name: Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Platinum Tint
Text:
The Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Platinum Tint applies an off-white base of Platinum Tint with accents in Subtle Gray and beige hues to the Zoom Vomero 5 silhouette.

This technical running shoe boasts a durable mesh upper with synthetic leather overlays that form an overlapping pattern. A plastic piece on the side panels provides support, while the synthetic grid-like design on the heel maintains the sneaker’s durability and allows the foot to breathe. The combination of Platinum Tint, Iron Gray, and cashmere across the upper gives the sneaker a slightly off-white appearance. The Zoom Air unit in the midsole gives responsive cushioning, while the rubber outsole grips the pavement or ground.

Our StockX experts like the way the Cashmere Swoosh logos stand out against the plastic panels on the sneaker’s side panels. The Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Platinum Tint was released on January 2nd, 2024, and sold for $160.

Name: Nike SB Dunk Low City of Love Burgundy Crush
Text:
The Nike SB Dunk Low City Of Love Burgundy Crush embodies the depth and richness of Paris's cultural tapestry, presented through a captivating colorway of burgundy crush, dark team red, earth, dark pony, and university red. This sneaker is a tribute to the city’s artistic legacy and the undying romance that Paris is known for, designed for those who draw inspiration from the world around them.

Echoing the hues of Parisian sunsets and the historic bricks that line the Montmartre district, the Burgundy Crush colorway is both a celebration of the city’s natural beauty and its storied past. The sneaker’s luxurious materials and intricate design details, such as the embroidered branding and unique insole, reflect the craftsmanship and creativity synonymous with Paris. It’s a sneaker for those who wear their hearts on their soles, embracing the blend of tradition and contemporary flair that defines Paris.

Introduced on February 9, 2024, for $125, the Nike SB Dunk Low City Of Love Burgundy Crush quickly rose to prominence among those who cherish both the art of skateboarding and the art of living. Its release commemorates the enduring influence of Paris on the creative world, offering a sneaker that captures the essence of the city's elegance, creativity, and love, and inviting wearers to make every day a journey through the City of Love.
Colorway: Burgundy Crush/Dark Team Red/Earth/Dark Pony/University Red/Earth

Name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 ‘Red’
Text: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 ‘Red’ released alongside ‘Copper’ and ‘Green’ colorways on November 23, 2016. Like its companions, this pair features mostly black Primeknit construction, accented with contrast-hued fibers resulting in a speckled effect throughout the upper. The sneaker’s lateral side is embellished with a bright red stripe that extends from heel to toe, marked with SPLY-350 branding. Responsive cushioning arrives via a caged Boost midsole, visible through cut-away detailing on the rubber outsole.

Name: Nike Book 1 'Haven'
Text: The Nike Book 1 'Haven' takes its name from Devin Booker's pet dog. Inspired by the Cane Corso's fur, the low-top carries a suede upper in a solid black finish. The monochrome design is disrupted by a metallic bronze Swoosh that matches Haven's eyes. Additional branding elements include 'Book' tongue tags and 'Chapter One' stamped on the heel tab, featuring a layered design modeled after a book spine. A TPU cage reinforces the lateral side of the Cushlon foam midsole, painted black and fitted with a top-loaded Zoom Air unit in the heel. A translucent herringbone-pattern rubber outsole provides grippy traction underfoot.

Name: New Balance 2002R 'Protection Pack - Phantom'
Text: The New Balance 2002R ‘Phantom’ is taken from the ‘Protection Pack,’ composed of three neutral colorways of the lifestyle runner originally released in 2010. This pair showcases a monochromatic dark grey finish throughout the upper, featuring a breathable mesh base with raw-edged suede overlays that enhance the shoe’s deconstructed look. A tonal ‘N’ logo on the quarter panel is joined by a discreet 2002r callout on the lateral side. A distressed ABZORB midsole, borrowed from the 860v2, delivers lightweight cushioning and a smooth ride.

Name: Nike Wmns Air Zoom Vomero 5 'Photon Dust Pink Foam'
Text: The Nike Women's Air Zoom Vomero 5 'Photon Dust Pink Foam' spotlights varying shades of pink on the full-length Cushlon foam midsole, fitted with Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot and heel. The upper features white open-cell mesh, accented with a metallic silver Swoosh atop the TPU midfoot cage. The layered design is further enlivened with 3M accents and mirror-reflective detailing on the eyestay and forefoot overlay.

Name: Nike Air VaporMax Plus 'Triple Black'
Text: Setting the tone for Air Max hybrids, the Air VaporMax Plus 'Triple Black’ features an all-black neoprene gradient upper with a molded TPU cage made famous on the Air Max Plus. The sneaker sports 3M reflective detailing on the tongue, 'Vm Air' heel branding, and a black foam midsole with a matching translucent full-length VaporMax outsole. It dropped in January 2018 alongside ‘Cargo Khaki’, Sunset’ and ‘Photo Blue’ colorways.

Name: ASICS Wmns Gel Kayano 14 'Baked Pink Cream'
Text: The ASICS Women's Gel Kayano 14 'Baked Pink Cream' showcases a gradient mesh upper, finished in a subtle pink hue through the forefoot that transitions to powder blue along the heel and features synthetic leather overlays in metallic silver. ASICS branding adorns the tongue and sockliner, while off-white tiger stripes sweep across the midfoot. Lightweight cushioning arrives via an EVA foam midsole with visible Gel inserts in the forefoot and heel.

Name: Nike Women's Air Zoom Vomero 5 'Metallic Silver Blue Tint'
Text: The Nike Women's Air Zoom Vomero 5 'Metallic Silver Blue Tint' sports a ventilated white mesh upper, featuring forefoot overlays and an eyestay in a mirror-reflective finish. A metallic silver Swoosh sits atop the TPU midfoot cage, which is flanked by matte silver overlays accented with 3M reflective detailing. A splash of powder blue enlivens a lightweight Cushlon midsole with encapsulated Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot and heel.

Name: Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Lakeside
Text:
Nike introduced the original Zoom Vomero running sneaker to the world all the way back in 2006, and the company has continued to put out new versions of it ever since. The brand first unveiled the Zoom Vomero 5 in 2010 as part of its "Bowerman Series," and it makes its return more than a decade later in the form of the Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Lakeside. It's one of the many new Zoom Vomero 5 colorways that Nike released in 2024.

This Nike Zoom Vomero 5 has a mesh and leather upper that is covered in a Lakeside colorway along with TPU overlays situated on its sides and heels. This same bright blue color also covers everything from the tongue and laces to the inner lining and even the rubber outsole on the shoe.

Our experts like the Lakeside colorway on this sneaker, but they also love the 3M reflective accents scattered all over it. It makes them shine in low-light situations and adds another cool decorative touch to them. The Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Lakeside was released on January 1, 2024, for a $160 retail price.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple Black
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple Black is a new colorway of the Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA line of sneakers.

The Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple Black features a Primeknit upper that is both flexible and breathable, allowing for a snug fit that will keep your feet comfortable and supported no matter how long your run or workout. The shoe also features a Boost midsole, which offers energy return and cushioning, making it perfect for those who need protection from the impact of running, jumping, and other high-intensity activities. The shoe's Continental rubber outsole provides traction on both wet and dry surfaces, giving you the confidence to tackle any terrain with ease.

We think that the standout feature of the adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple Black is its sleek design. The use of black on black gives the shoe a clean and minimalist look that is both stylish and understated. The shoe was released on November 30th, 2022 at a retail price of $200.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple White
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple White takes on a monochromatic design, dressed in Cloud White from heel to toe, featuring adidas signature technologies, including PRIMEKNIT and Boost.

The Triple White adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA upper is made of PRIMEKNIT material, which gives it a lightweight and breathable feel. The midsole features adidas’ Boost technology, ensuring support and comfort. Underfoot, the Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally, while the Continental™ rubber outsole provides traction and grip. For brand recognition, the sneaker features the iconic 3-Stripes on the lateral and medial sides, with an adidas logo on the tongue tag. With a lace closure for a secure fit, this shoe provides both comfort and an eco-conscious design.

What stands out in the adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple White is its commitment to sustainability, as its upper incorporates a high-performance yarn made from at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic, repurposed from plastic waste intercepted in remote coastal areas and shorelines, preventing ocean pollution. The remaining 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester. The shoe was released on January 1st, 2023, for $200.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next% 3 Volt Concord
Text:
The Nike Alphafly 3 Volt Concord is a cutting-edge distance running shoe designed to maximize performance while delivering a truly unique aesthetic.

Crafted from Nike’s Flyknit material, the Alphafly features ZoomX foam in the midsole, which is one of Nike's most responsive and lightweight cushioning materials. This foam provides exceptional energy return, allowing runners to maintain speed and efficiency over long distances. Strategically placed Air Zoom pods in the forefoot minimize energy loss and enhance toe-off for a powerful and efficient running experience, while a full-length carbon fiber plate in the midsole delivers stability. A rubber outsole with patterned traction ensures a reliable grip on many surfaces.

What our experts enjoy most about the Nike Alphafly 3 Volt Concord, however, is its vibrant colorway, which combines a predominantly Volt yellow background with pops of Dusty Cactus, Total Orange, and Concord blue. This shoe originally retailed for a price of $285 on April 4, 2024.

Name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 White Particle Grey
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 White Particle Grey was released two years after Nike unveiled the second version of the Vaporfly shoe. This running sneaker boasts a slew of new features not found in the previous Vaporfly models.

For starters, the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 has a full-length carbon fiber flyplate to provide it with stability. It also has Nike's patented ZoomX foam to make it extra responsive. It includes a breathable upper constructed out of Flyknit yarn and is available in a variety of colors.

The thing that our experts love most about the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 White Particle Grey is the bulge near the heel. In addition to giving the Vaporfly 3 a more unique appearance than previous Vaporfly sneakers, the bulge near the heel prevents people from putting too much weight on the insides of their feet. The Vaporfly 3 was released on 1st April 2023 for $250.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next% 3 Prototype
Text:
The Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% 3 Prototype is a Nike "super shoe" designed by the iconic sneaker company specifically to enhance the speed of marathon runners.

The Prototype colorway of the Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% 3 features an upper constructed from white to pale orange gradient Atomknit. The "V62" on the medial side collar indicates that this is the 62nd version of this lightweight fabric, while the number of the midsole refers to a Nike test runner that put the most miles on this shoe. To complete the look of this upper, an oversized black Nike swoosh is printed across the quarter panel and extends onto the midsole.

The most impressive aspect of this running shoe is its high-octane sole unit. The midsole has a carbon Flyplate pressed between two slabs of continuous ZoomX foam to provide cushioning and maximum energy return. Visible Zoom Air units under the forefoot propel momentum, and all of this sits atop a black rubber outsole designed for traction. The Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% 3 Prototype was released on January 4, 2024, for $285 retail.

Name: On Running Cloud 5 All Black
Text: The On Running Cloud 5 All Black is a sleek and stylish running shoe that combines comfort and performance. The shoe features a black mesh upper with synthetic overlays for added durability and support. The CloudTec sole provides a cushioned and responsive ride, while the Speedboard technology promotes a natural and efficient stride. The shoe also has a breathable and moisture-wicking lining to keep your feet cool and dry during intense workouts. The On Running Cloud 5 All Black is perfect for runners who want a versatile and reliable shoe that can handle any terrain or distance. The shoe is available in men's and women's sizes and has a retail price of $140. The release date for this shoe is August 8th, 2022. Something we love about the On Running Cloud 5 All Black is its sleek and minimalist design that can easily transition from the gym to the streets. Our experts think the best features of this shoe are its CloudTec sole and Speedboard technology, which provide a comfortable and efficient ride. We also love the breathable and moisture-wicking lining, which keeps your feet cool and dry during long runs. Overall, the standout feature of the On Running Cloud 5 All Black is its combination of style and performance, making it a must-have for any runner.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Black
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Black is a striking dual-chromatic sneaker. This running and lifestyle shoe is partially made of recycled Parley Ocean Plastic, signifying the adidas commitment to the environment.

The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA in a Core Black colorway features an upper in black adidas Primeknit designed to hug your foot and provide comfort and energy-enhancing support. The black adidas three stripes on the side panel and a black Fitcounter molded heel counter have a sheen that sets them apart from the Primeknit. The tongue, laces, pull tab on the heel, sock liner, and insoles are also unrelieved black.

The feature we most enjoy about this shoe is the high-performance sole unit. Hundreds of Boost capsules are fused to cushion and return energy with every step. The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Black was released on January 1, 2023, for a retail price of $200.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next% 2 Hyper Pink Laser Orange (Women's)
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next 2 Hyper Pink Laser Orange Women's is a cutting-edge running shoe that builds upon the success of its predecessor, the Air Zoom Alphafly Next%, to deliver innovative technology and improved design features that enhance speed, comfort, and efficiency.

This shoe in women's sizing comes equipped with ZoomX foam, Nike's most responsive and lightweight cushioning material, which is strategically placed in the midsole to ensure a plush and responsive feel underfoot. Air Zoom Pods in the forefoot and heel further enhance cushioning and responsiveness. A Flyknit upper wraps around the foot to provide a snug and supportive fit while maintaining breathability and flexibility. Similar to its predecessor, the Air Zoom Alphafly Next 2 features a full-length carbon fiber plate in the midsole which is designed to maximize energy return.

What our experts love most about the Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next 2 Hyper Pink Laser Orange Women's, however, is its Hyper Pink upper, Laser Orange outsole, and contrasting black accents. This shoe originally retailed for $275 on February 14, 2023.

Name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Black Metallic Gold Grain
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Black Metallic Gold Grain is a sneaker designed with a ZoomX+ midsole for stability and energy return.

This iteration of the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 is constructed with a white FlyKnit upper for breathability. Black mesh with wide holes covers the upper, giving the shoe a grainy look. The Nike Swoosh appears across both sides in a gray color, while "FLYKNIT appears in small white text near the top of the laces. The tongue contains Nike Vaporfly branding. The thick rubber sole appears in beige under the forefoot and contains ZoomX branding on the lateral side. The white sole underneath the heel has a unique chunky look, jutting out past the heel. This part of the sole also contains a small Nike Swoosh in black.

What we like best about this shoe is the unique and chunky look of the rubber sole and outsole, which also gives the shoe its functionality. The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Black Metallic Gold Grain was released on September 24, 2023, for a retail price of $260.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Grey
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Grey is a running shoe from the adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA lineup in a gray colorway.

This Ultra Boost sneaker features a PrimeKnit upper dressed in Gray Three and Gray Five with Core Black detailing. A gray lace cage with contrasting Three stripes and a TPU heel counter with "Ultra-Boost" lettering etched on the lateral provide support to the upper. Other details include the adidas mountain logo on the tongue, gray laces, and a padded ankle collar. Underfoot, a white Boost midsole and a black rubber outsole complete the design.

  What our experts particularly love about this Ultra Boost sneaker is its classic yet versatile colorway and the combination of comfort and style it offers. Its timeless colorway and performance-oriented design contribute to its standout nature, appealing to individuals seeking a blend of style and functionality in a sneaker. The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Gray was released on November 30th, 2022, retailing at $200.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 4.0 DNA White
Text:
When you get your feet inside of a pair of adidas Ultra Boost 40 DNA White shoes you are ready to step out in style.

What makes the adidas Ultra Boost 40 DNA White shoes so unique is that they offer great performance innovations with an extra splash of flair. With all that performance, wearers get a surprise when they feel the comfort that Boost technology provides. The shoes offer a lightweight Primeknit upper combined with a high-performance sole. These stylish shoes are equally at home on the track and out on the town.

With a release date of November 2020, these great shoes retail for $200.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple White
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple White is a running shoe specifically designed to deliver lightweight, snug, flexible, and cushioning energy return with every step.

The Triple White adidas Boost Light features an upper with a base of white adidas PRIMEKNIT for a snug, lightweight fit around the foot. The adidas three stripes on the side panel appear in a smooth white textile overlay that works itself into the eye stays. White laces cross over a white mesh tongue with adidas branding. A smooth white molded heel counter and toe cap add support. A white stacked Boost midsole delivers ultra-lightweight cushioning and energy return with every step. An outsole of black Continental rubber provides traction on many kinds of surfaces.

The feature that delights us most about this shoe is the incorporation of recycled material from Parley Ocean Plastic into the upper. The adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple White was released on January 28, 2023, for a retail price of $190.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple Black
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple Black is a performance shoe designed for lightness and energy return.

This iteration of the adidas Ultra Boost Light is made with a Primeknit and textile upper to make the shoe lightweight and breathable. The upper is all black and is made partially from recycled material. The adidas three stripes logo appears on each side, running from the laces to the outsole in black. The three stripes’ construction also serves to support and stabilize the shoe. The tongue sports another adidas logo, and a thick black sole and outsole provide energy return. The shoe is equipped with Boost suspension technology and the Linear Energy Push system for extra performance enhancement.

What we like most about this shoe is the combination of lightweight materials used to build it. It provides not only comfort but also functionality. The adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple Black was released on January 3, 2024, for an initial retail price of $190.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 5.0 DNA Triple Black
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost 50 DNA Triple Black is a unisex sneaker designed for running, training, or casual wear throughout the week.
 
The Ultra Boost 50 DNA by adidas has a core black colorway throughout its design. The shoe has the classic Ultra Boost midsole for comfort and to provide cushioning for feet and ankles. Its upper is made from the adidas Primeknit textile, while the Stretchweb outsole is made from Continental rubber compound. The shoe has grid-like aerodynamic ventilation for increased breathability and airflow.
 
The adidas Ultra Boost 50 DNA Triple Black was released on June 16, 2022, with a retail price of $190.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 20 Triple Black
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost 20 Triple Black adds a monochromatic black look to the Ultra Boost collection.

The adidas Ultra Boost 20 features a black Continental outsole and Boost midsole. The midsole for these sneakers also features 20% more Boost, which offers more comfort, flexibility, and durability and allows the wearer to absorb and return more energy when running. The adidas Primeknit upper provides a supportive fit, while the heel is made with soft elastane material for comfort. Tailored Fiber Placement technology offers stitched-in reinforcement as well as a superior fit and lightweight feel.

The adidas Ultra Boost 20 Triple Black released in December of 2019 and retailed for $180.

Name: adidas Ultra 4D Cookies and Cream 2.0
Text:
The adidas Ultra 4D Cookies and Cream 2.0 is a performance sneaker whose look was inspired by the popular ice cream flavor.

This iteration of the adidas 4D is made with a Primeknit upper for breathability and flexibility. The forefoot features a pattern in black and white that is similar to a houndstooth pattern, but a little softer and more modern. The white mesh also forms the toe box and mudguard. The adidas three stripes logo appears on each side formed by supports in black and white. White mesh also forms the tongue, ankle, and heel areas, while the heel is also supported by thick black overlays with Ultra 4D branding on the lateral side. The tongue features an adidas logo, and a black criss crossed PEVA outsole completes the look.

What stands out about this shoe are the sole and outsole, which are patterned and shiny. The adidas Ultra 4D Cookies and Cream 2.0 was released on June 1, 2023, for $220.

Name: adidas Adizero Adios Pro Evo 1 White Black
Text:
Launched on September 26, 2023, for $500, the adidas Adizero Adios Pro Evo 1 White Black redefines the meaning of speed with its cutting-edge design. Aimed at athletes seeking breakthrough performance, this shoe features an optimized White, Black, and Crystal White colorway that encapsulates speed and simplicity.

The Adizero Adios Pro Evo 1 is engineered with a carbon-infused rod and responsive cushioning, tailored to propel runners forward with each stride. Its streamlined silhouette and performance-focused construction mirror the competitive spirit of runners who are constantly pushing their limits.

Wearing the adidas Adizero Adios Pro Evo 1 White Black is a commitment to excellence, symbolizing a relentless pursuit of personal bests and the ultimate expression of speed and efficiency in motion.

Name: adidas Adizero Prime X Strung Pulse Mint Lucid Fuchsia
Text:
The adidas Adizero Prime X Strung Pulse Mint Lucid Fuchsia is a running shoe from the adidas Adizero Prime X line sporting a Pulse Mint, Lucid Fuchsia, and black color combination.

Designed with long runs in mind, the upper is one piece and appears like it is strung together, with pieces of thread intertwined throughout the upper. Two iterations of the Three Strips are found, one on each side of the shoe, which is a unique aspect of this particular silhouette. Pulse Mint laces lay against a black tongue with Adizero branding. The lateral side of the white midsole boasts a lightning strip that gradients from dark blue to Lucid Fuchsia and adds a pop of color to the large platform.

We particularly like the huge, foam midsole that is seen on this all-gender shoe. It provides a highly cushioned step or stride and is attached to the Continental rubber outsole that provides traction. When it was released on February 1, 2023, the adidas Adizero Prime X Strung Pulse Mint Lucid Fuchsia colorway sold at a retail price of $300.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost Light Solar Red
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost Light Solar Red dresses its lightest Ultraboost model to date in a bold Solar Red, Core Black, and Night Metallic colorway.

Although the Solar Red base is eye-catching, it’s the ultra-lightweight Boost midsole that draws the most attention. Tiny Boost foam capsules provide responsive energy return with each step, while the midsole’s sloping shape supports the foot’s natural movement. In addition, the Linear Energy Push System improves stability and works with the grippy rubber outsole. The upper of the Solar Red adidas Ultra Boost Light is made from breathable Primeknit and textile, creating a foot-hugging, sock-like feel. Minimalist branding details— Core Black 3-Stripes on the side panels and the tongue—complete the look.

Our experts at StockX like that the upper is made from at least 50 percent reclaimed plastic waste from the oceans. In addition, this sneaker boasts a 10 percent smaller carbon footprint than previous models. The adidas Ultra Boost Light Solar Red was initially released on March 3, 2023, and was priced at $190.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 21 Gore-Tex Carbon
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost 21 Gore-Tex Carbon is presented in a Carbon colorway, which is a blend of deep gray and black tones, offering a versatile and urban aesthetic. The shoe boasts a running-inspired silhouette in a low-top design with lace closure.

The Carbon adidas Ultra Boost 21 Gore-Tex is constructed with a combination of synthetic materials and textile, including the incorporation of Gore-Tex technology for weatherproofing, ensuring durability and protection against the elements. The midsole features adidas’ signature Boost technology, which provides cushioning and support. The shoe features a Continental rubber outsole with a multidirectional traction pattern, ensuring reliable grip. Branding is subtly integrated, with the iconic 3-Stripes logo on the sides, the logo on the tongue and heel pull tab, and Gore-Tex branding to signify its weatherproof technology.

What our experts love about the adidas Ultra Boost 21 Gore-Tex Carbon is its combination of performance and weatherproofing. The incorporation of Gore-Tex technology adds an extra layer of protection, making it suitable for running in various weather conditions. The shoe debuted on the 22nd of August 2022 for $220.

Name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Hyper Pink Laser Orange
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Hyper Pink Laser Orange is a running shoe designed by Nike and is known for its innovative technology, lightweight design, and exceptional performance.

The shoes feature a lightweight and breathable upper made from engineered mesh to keep your foot cool and comfortable during extended running activities. The upper also showcases a pink and orange color scheme complemented by black accents which covers the Nike Swoosh and other branding details. Other design elements on the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 include a Carbon Fiber plate and foam in the midsole to enhance propulsion and stability and provide exceptional energy return and lightweight cushioning, respectively.

One thing we love about the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Hyper Pink Laser Orange is the unique color scheme which combines pink and orange hues to provide a beautiful blend of colors that make the shoe stand out aesthetically. The shoes were released for retail in April 2023 for $250.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Tempo Next% Flyknit Black White Anthracite
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Tempo Next FlyKnit Black White Anthracite is a running shoe that features midsole technology designed to cushion, respond, propel, and return energy with every step you take.

The Nike Air Zoom Tempo Next FlyKnit in a Black/White/Anthracite colorway features a breathable, lightweight black FlyKnit upper. Black laces cross over an integrated tongue for a comfortable, secure fit. The white midsole of this shoe is made of Zoom X foam in the forefoot and React foam in the heel. Visible translucent black Zoom Air pods are isolated from the surrounding foam in the forefoot and stabilized by a plate that runs along the length of the midsole. The outsole features black rubber with traction on the forefoot and heel, with white rubber connecting in between.

A detail our shoe experts really love about this sneaker is the Air Zoom X branding that accents the heel of the midsole, and the Air Zoom branding on the visible Zoom Air unit. The Nike Air Zoom Tempo Next FlyKnit Black White Anthracite was released on February 21st, 2022, at a retail price of $200.

Name: Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Black Wolf Grey
Text:
The Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Black Wolf Gray is trail running sneaker with waterproof features.

Something that makes this shoe stand out is the Gore-Tex along the upper. It helps keep the foot dry without adding weight or sacrificing comfort. The sneaker boasts an all-black construction with Wolf Gray and reflective detailing. Flecks of reflective material in the laces and a strip along the side panels improve visibility in low lighting and add a pop of silver. Unlike other trail running sneakers, this version of the React Pegasus Trail 4 has less rubber on the outsole. This allows the runner to transition from rough terrain to pavement. Other notable features include the full-length Boost unit in the midsole and the grippy traction pattern underfoot.

Our StockX experts like that some versions of the sneaker feature ‘JUST DO IT’ along the midsole, while others display ‘JUST RUN IT.’ The Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Black Wolf Gray was released on August 9th, 2022, and retailed at $160.

Name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Aquatone
Text:
Nike debuted its ZoomX Vaporfly 3 running sneaker in 2023 in a variety of eye-catching colors that made it hard to miss. The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Aquatone is one of the many options the brand has available.

This shoe features a crisp white Flyknit upper with a faded teal color covering the Nike Swooshes on its sides and the other branding found on it. These colors offer some contrast when paired with the brighter Aquatone and Azure Blue colors used on the shoe's oversized ZoomX cushioning system.

But what our experts love the most about this shoe is its funky design that features the back of the midsole jutting out from the heel. It gives it an unorthodox look and feel while also enabling it to provide comfort and stability for runners. The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Aquatone was released on September 1, 2023, and it originally retailed for $250.

Name: Nike ZoomX Invincible Run 3 Black White
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Invincible Run 3 Black White is part of the Nike ZoomX Invincible Run 3 lineup of running shoes. Although the colorway is Black, White, Dark Grey, and Coconut Milk, the Invincible Run 3 Black White presents as a dual-tone black and white sneaker.

This sneaker stands out from others due to the amount of cushioning underfoot. ZoomX foam cushioning in the midsole conforms to the foot shape and added foam height provides a soft underfoot feel. The lightweight Flyknit upper is both breathable and durable. In terms of branding, a Swoosh made of stripes graces the side panel, another Swoosh covers the vamp, and lettering along the heel spells out ‘NIKE INVINCIBLE RUN 3’. In addition, the midsole features an orange rectangle with Nike ZoomX foam branding.

What do our StockX experts love about this sneaker? It is comparatively light weighing approximately 310 grams. The Nike ZoomX Invincible Run 3 Black White was released on January 5, 2023, and retailed at $180.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 41 Volt
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 41 Volt is designed to bring energy and style to your running routine. Featuring a vibrant volt, black, and barely volt colorway, this sneaker is sure to turn heads. The Pegasus 41 builds on Nike's legacy of creating high-performance running shoes that cater to the needs of dedicated athletes.

With responsive Zoom Air units, the Pegasus 41 offers exceptional cushioning and support, making each run comfortable and efficient. The engineered mesh upper provides breathability and a secure fit, ensuring your feet stay cool and supported. The durable outsole offers excellent traction, making the Pegasus 41 suitable for various terrains and running conditions.

Released on June 5, 2024, the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 41 Volt retailed at $140. Its bold volt, black, and barely volt colorway showcases Nike's commitment to innovation and style. Step up your running game with the Pegasus 41, a sneaker that delivers both performance and visual appeal.

Name: Nike React Phantom Run Flyknit 2 White Black
Text:
The Nike React Phantom Run Flyknit 2 White Black uses a neutral two-tone color scheme on the breathable knit upper.

The Nike React Phantom Run Flyknit 2 White Black slip-on silhouette trades in standard lace closure for elastic Flywire cables integrated into the midfoot. At the same time, external molding on either side of the heel provides enhanced stability. The sock-like build is supported by a React foam midsole, good for responsive cushioning with each step, and increased rubber at the outsole helps deliver better traction and durability.

The Nike React Phantom Run Flyknit 2 White Black was released in may 2020 and retailed for $140.

Name: Nike Pegasus Turbo Next Nature White Light Bone
Text:
The Nike Pegasus Turbo Next Nature White Light Bone is a feather-light running shoe that is created from at least 50% recycled materials such as yarn, plastics, and textiles.

The White Light Bone colorway of the Nike Pegasus Turbo Next Nature features an upper crafted from white recycled FlyKnit yarn, a fabric that is both lightweight and breathable. A large black and white Nike Swoosh is woven into the knit on the lateral side panel, while a more solid black Swoosh is woven into the medial collar. An off-white, partially recycled midsole of ZoomX foam provides ultimate cushioning, while the brown outsole of Nike grind rubber features a modified waffle traction pattern.

What we most enjoy about this sneaker are the external Flywire cables that provide support as they course up the side panel of the shoe and integrate into the lacing system. This feature adds both a unique aesthetic and structural integrity to the shoe. The Nike Pegasus Turbo Next Nature White Light Bone was released on December 21, 2022, for $150 retail.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next% 2 Ekiden Scream Green
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next 2 Ekiden Scream Green pays homage to the annual Japanese marathon relay with a running shoe that packs a lot of pop and power.

The Scream Green colorway of the Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next 2 Ekiden sports an Atomknit upper for a snug, breathable sock-like fit. Bright light green is the dominant hue, with supportive underlays and a Nike Swoosh visible beneath. The Atomknit heel, laces, pull tabs, and Nike Swooshes are black, and hits of orange appear on the heel and in the Atomknit branding on the eye stays.

What impresses us most about this shoe is the eye-popping midsole. Made of ZoomX foam to provide cushioning and springy energy return, this midsole also houses a forefoot Zoom Air unit and full-length Flyplate carbon fiber inserts. The black rubber outsole has cut-out vents that expose the Flyplate and allow the ZoomX to expand. The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next% 2 Ekiden Scream Green was released on December 1, 2022, for $275 retail.

Name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Game Royal Vivid Orange
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Game Royal Vivid Orange is a high-performance sneaker designed for serious runners. Featuring a striking game royal, vivid orange, white, and university blue colorway, this shoe is both eye-catching and functional. The Vaporfly Next% 2 is built to help you achieve your best times, making it a favorite among elite athletes.

Equipped with Nike's ZoomX foam and a full-length carbon plate, the Vaporfly Next% 2 offers unparalleled energy return and propulsion. The lightweight, breathable upper ensures a secure fit, while the aerodynamic design reduces drag, allowing you to run faster and more efficiently. These features make the Vaporfly Next% 2 a must-have for competitive runners.

Released on December 17, 2022, the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Game Royal Vivid Orange retailed at $250. Its vibrant game royal, vivid orange, white, and university blue colorway underscores Nike's commitment to performance and style. Achieve your personal best with the Vaporfly Next% 2, a sneaker that combines cutting-edge technology with bold design.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 White Obsidian
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 White Obsidian is an elite running shoe that gives easy takeoffs and safe landings with every comfortable, lightning-quick stride.

The upper of this Nike Air Zoom running shoe is crafted from a lightweight, breathable white knit with padding at the collar and tongue for extra comfort. A midfoot band helps ensure a secure fit and works with the white lace closure. The lateral side sports an Obsidian outline of a Nike Swoosh, while the medial features a fully filled-in Obsidian Swoosh. The thick midsole with an extended heel comprises speckled cream-colored Nike React foam. It encapsulates Zoom Air units under the forefoot and the heel for ultimate cushioning and springy energy return. The red rubber outsole is lugged for traction and grooved for flexibility.

The detail of this running shoe we enjoy the most is the branding on the insole and tongue tag. A smiley face is winking, with one of its eyes as a Nike swoosh. The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 White Obsidian debuted on April 1, 2023, for $130 retail.

Name: Nike ZoomX Streakfly Premium White Metallic Silver
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Streakfly Premium White Metallic Silver is a lightweight high-performance running shoe dressed in a white, metallic silver, and black color scheme.

Whether for training or race days, the sleek Nike ZoomX Streakfly Premium White Metallic Silver has a low profile and provides adaptive and nimble responsive cushioning with ZoomX foam. The ultra-thin white knit upper gives the shoe an aerodynamic design. Adding to this design is the unique lacing system that runs asymmetrically and towards the lateral side. A large black Nike Swoosh is presented in a flying fashion swooping across the medial side and toebox, with a smaller similar styled Swoosh on the lateral side. Note the metallic silver toe and mud guard and other black branded accents that reference running culture.

According to our experts, this shoe’s prominent feature has to be its lightweight responsiveness, which is achieved thanks in part to the full length ZoomX midsole. The Nike ZoomX Streakfly Premium White Metallic Silver debuted on January 6, 2023, and sold at retail price of $160.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 Black White
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 Black White is an ultra-lightweight running shoe with a sleek colorway of black, Dark Smoke Grey, and white that doesn’t distract from the technical features.

Designed for runs during any of the four seasons, the Black White Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 is even lighter than the Pegasus 38. In addition, it includes two Zoom Air units that provide a springy feel and Nike React foam cushioning underfoot for responsive comfort. Soft padding around the collar and in the tongue adds extra comfort without giving the sneaker a bulky appearance. Finally, Flywire technology helps keep the foot in place, while the waffle-style rubber outsole provides traction.

Our experts at StockX like the inclusion of engineered mesh in the upper. It’s more durable and flexible yet just as lightweight as traditional mesh. The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39 Black White was released on June 8, 2022, and sold for $120.

Name: Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Barely Grape Total Orange
Text:
The Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Barely Grape Total Orange offers a trail running shoe silhouette enhanced with rugged all-weather fabric.

The Barely Grape Total Orange iteration of the Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 x Gore-Tex sports a pale purple mesh upper created with Gore-Tex to provide water resistance. Hits of green adorn the toe and textile collar that can be pulled tight with black laces. The heel and tongue each features a black pull tab to facilitate on/off. A yellow React midsole provides cushioning and energy return, while the black rubber outsole delivers traction that works on rugged terrain as well as on smooth pavement. The outer-side Nike Swoosh is outlined in orange, while a miniature green Nike Swoosh appears vertically on the collar. Another miniature Nike Swoosh in white appears on the inner side, while a yellow Nike Swoosh is debossed on the outsole.

The detail we love most about this sneaker is the motto on the midsole: JUST DO IT - REASON NOT REQUIRED. The Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Barely Grape Total Orange was released on January 5, 2023, for $160 retail.

Name: Nike KD 17 NRG 'Aunt Pearl'
Text: The Nike KD 17 NRG 'Aunt Pearl' continues a long-running design motif that honors the memory of Kevin Durant's late aunt. A soft pink hue floods the textile upper, featuring molded side panels and decorative embroidery on the heel overlay. Atop the tongue, a 'KD' badge is treated to an iridescent finish. Performance benefits include a matching pink foam midsole with Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot and an Air Strobel unit in the heel.

Name: Nike Sabrina 2 Court Vision (Women's)
Text:
The Nike Sabrina 2 Court Vision (Women's) updates the Sabrina 1 created by WNBA player Sabrina Ionescu with performance-enhancing features.

The Sabrina 2 replaces the React foam midsole with a Cushlon 3.0 foam midsole. Combined with the Zoom Air unit in the forefoot, this upgrade allows for increased impact protection without reducing agility. The mesh upper helps the foot breathe, while the locked-in feel comes in part from the containment fit bands that wrap around the midfoot. In addition, the "S" herringbone pattern on the rubber outsole supports multi-directional traction and quick movements.

Our experts at StockX like the shattered glass embroidery patterns on the upper that symbolize Ionescu’s ability to shatter the proverbial glass ceiling in the world of women’s sports and beyond. The sneaker also displays an ‘i’ on the heel that represents Ionescu’s last name. The women’s size Nike Sabrina 2 Court Vision (Women's) was released on June 25, 2024, and sold for $130.

Name: adidas Harden Vol. 8 After Hours
Text:
The adidas Harden Vol. 8 After Hours represents a departure from the bold color blocking displayed on other Harden Vol. 8 iterations. Instead, it features Core Black and Cloud White on the upper and midsole, and a splash of Cobalt Blue on the outsole.

Created by NBA player James Harden and adidas, this basketball shoe boasts a sleek silhouette with a sock-like cuff and breathable textile upper. The oversized EVA cage provides lateral support, while the BOOST midsole comes equipped with Lightstrike cushioning. However, the standout feature is the patent leather toe box in Cloud White. Its shiny surface reflects the light and draws attention to the sneaker’s molded design.

Our experts at StockX like that both the textile base and other EVA cage come in Core Black, minimizing the color-blocking effect and reducing the spotlight usually shone on the side panels. The adidas Harden Vol. 8 After Hours was released on July 1, 2024, and sold for $160.

Name: 361 Degrees BIG3 4.0 Quick Reverse
Text:
The 361 Degrees BIG3 4.0 Quick Reverse is a performance basketball shoe created by the Chinese sportswear brand 361 Degrees. It features a mismatched colorway, with blue dominating the left shoe and pink covering the right shoe.

The 4.0 version features several upgrades, including a full-length ENRG-X+ midsole for a springy feel underfoot. TPU panels reinforce the lightweight mesh upper at the heel and toe box and reduce rollover motions. Another important technical feature is the nylon anti-torsion piece beneath the midfoot, which provides rigid support. The Reverse 361 Degrees BIG3 4.0 Quick displays several design details that reinforce its reputation for speed, including a lightning bolt motif down the side panels in an off-white hue.

Our experts at StockX like the grippy rubber outsole because it provides superior traction on indoor and outdoor basketball courts. The 361 Degrees BIG3 4.0 Quick Reverse was released on July 15, 2023, and sold for $130.

Name: Nike Kobe 4 Protro Gold Medal (2024)
Text:
The Nike Kobe 4 Protro Gold Medal 2024 is a re-release of an iconic colorway that pays tribute to Kobe Bryant's legendary performance at the 2008 Olympics. This sneaker, featuring a striking white, dark obsidian, varsity red, and metallic gold colorway, celebrates Kobe’s pivotal role in the Redeem Team, where he led Team USA to victory and secured his place in Olympic history. The Protro line brings modern performance upgrades to this classic silhouette, combining heritage with innovation.

Designed with advanced tech, the Kobe 4 Protro features enhanced cushioning for superior comfort and support, making it perfect for both on-court performance and off-court style. The shoe’s low-cut design allows for maximum agility, while the Flywire technology offers a secure fit. The heel features the number 10 to honor the number Kobe wore in the Olympics. The colorway’s gold accents symbolize the triumph and excellence of Kobe’s Olympic journey, making this sneaker a meaningful addition to any collection.

Released on August 6, 2024, the Nike Kobe 4 Protro Gold Medal retailed at $190. This sneaker’s blend of white, dark obsidian, varsity red, and metallic gold captures the essence of a significant moment in basketball history. With its blend of historical significance and modern enhancements, the Kobe 4 Protro Gold Medal continues to resonate with fans and athletes alike.

Name: Nike Ja 1 Year of the Dragon
Text:
Celebrating the Chinese New Year, the Nike Ja 1 Year of the Dragon is a stylish homage to cultural heritage and basketball performance. The White, Aquarius Blue, Glacier Blue, and Metallic Gold colorway makes a striking statement, designed to captivate a dynamic, energetic audience.

The sneaker's design focuses on agility and responsiveness, suited for dynamic play. It features a lightweight yet durable construction, with cushioning that offers both comfort and support. The Year of the Dragon edition of the Nike Ja 1 is not just a sports shoe; it's a symbol of power and prosperity, resonating with its wearers' aspirations.

Launched on January 3, 2024, the Nike Ja 1 Year of the Dragon, priced at $140, has garnered attention for its unique design and cultural significance, making it a sought-after piece in sneaker collections.

Name: Nike Book 1 Premium Hike
Text:
Hit the court or the town in style with the Nike Book 1 Premium Hike, a sneaker that echoes Devin Booker's passion for exploring the great outdoors. Featuring a color palette of dark stucco, light silver, and clay orange, this shoe captures the essence of a rugged adventure, merged with the sophistication of premium materials. It's a shoe crafted for individuals who seek the thrill of the hike and the rush of the game – a perfect blend for the active and the stylish.

Booker's signature sneaker comes loaded with features designed for the trail-blazing spirit. The Hike edition is more than just its earthy, rich tones; the sneaker's advanced traction pattern, responsive Cushlon cushioning, Nike Zoom air bag in the heel and lockdown fit reflect Booker’s dynamic gameplay, offering you the support and performance needed to dominate the game. Whether you're making quick cuts or going for the jump shot, the Nike Book 1 Premium Hike is built for those who play with passion and style.

Dropped on April 6, 2024, for $150, the Nike Book 1 Premium Hike is your invitation to step into a world of adventure. These sneakers are a salute to Devin Booker's multifaceted life, balancing the demands of an athlete with the call of the wild. Don your pair and be ready to tackle any challenge with confidence and flair, just as Booker takes to the court or the trails.

Name: Nike Book 1 Rattlesnake
Text:
The Nike Book 1 Rattlesnake is a premium sneaker that’s part of a collaboration between NBA player Devin Booker and Nike. It features a primarily white upper with rattlesnake skin details.

The upper is crafted from smooth leather and a canvas-like textile with white stitching. The combination of these two materials creates a gentle textural contrast that allows the rattlesnake elements to stand out. The Swoosh logos on the side panels display a rattlesnake pattern with brown, tan, and black tones. Embroidery around the Swoosh logos creates a white border and makes the print stand out. Hits of red can be found on the BOOK logo tag on the tongue and CHAPTER ONE running up the heel. Other noteworthy details include the number 96 on the heel pull tab, which represents the year Booker was born.

Our StockX experts like the addition of a lightweight midsole with a Zoom Air unit in the heel. The Nike Book 1 Rattlesnake was released on May 11, 2024, and retailed at $140.

Name: adidas Harden Vol. 8 Pioneer
Text:
The adidas Harden Vol. 8 Pioneer is a futuristic basketball shoe that’s part of a collaboration between adidas Basketball and NBA player James Harden.

This performance basketball shoe features a supportive EVA frame that looks like an off-white teardrop. It provides structure around the sock-like inner cuff, which allows the cuff to fit securely from toe to ankle. The EVA frame wraps around the arch and extends into a Boost midsole in the same Cloud White hue. The upper is made of black textile that wraps around the foot, while a panel of black leather wraps around the toe area. There are no branding details on the upper, which contributes to the sneaker’s futuristic aesthetic.

Our StockX experts like the ‘JH’ traction pattern and herringbone tread on the rubber outsole. The adidas Harden Vol. 8 Pioneer was released on March 1st, 2024, and retailed at $160.

Name: Rigorer AR1 Iceman
Text:
The Rigorer AR1 Iceman is a stylish and high-performance soccer cleat designed with the demands of competitive players in mind.

This shoe boasts a sleek and modern design with clean lines and bold accents. The upper is constructed from premium mesh, providing durability, flexibility, and breathability even during intense gameplay. It features a padded collar and cushioned insole to provide support and comfort, while a soft lining helps to reduce friction and irritation. A lightweight and responsive soleplate with strategically placed studs delivers top-notch traction and agility, and a low-profile design promotes quick acceleration and agile movements.

What our experts especially appreciate about the Rigorer AR1 Iceman, however, is its white and gray colorway against which thoughtfully placed blue accents pop for a modern and elegant aesthetic. This soccer shoe originally retailed with a price tag of $100 when it was first released on December 25, 2023.

Name: Nike KD 16 All-Star
Text:
The Nike KD 16 All-Star is an athletic shoe featuring a mesh upper with green tiger print, complemented by blocks of magenta.

Designed for the 2024 NBA All-Stars, Nike has created a special colorway for the Nike KD 16 collection, in honor of Phoenix Suns player Kevin Durant. Known as Easy Money because of his ability to effortlessly score points on the basketball court, the KD 16 pays homage to this nickname beneath the orange overlay. A holographic disc appears on the tongue tab, bearing the initials KB in dollar bill print. Kevin Durant branding appears as his name and number visible beneath semi-opaque overlays in Orange TPU, which extend to form the outsole. A yellow midsole and Nike Swooshes in purple at the heel complete the look.

Our experts feel that the best feature of the KD 16 is its vibrant color palette, which is eye-catching and unique. The Nike KD 16 All-Star released on February 16, 2024, and retailed at $160.
Colorway: Stadium Green/Hyper Violet/Barely Green/Playful Pink/University Gold/Lightening

Name: Nike Zoom LeBron NXXT Gen White Metallic Silver
Text:
The Nike Zoom LeBron NXXT Gen White Metallic Silver comes in a white and metallic silver colorway with black accents.

The upper part of the Zoom LeBron NXXT Gen White Metallic Silver is designed with Flyknit material, which provides a lightweight, supportive, and breathable fit around the foot. Additionally, the Nike logo features on the tongue while the Zoom Air branding is visible on the heel. The midsole features Nike's proprietary Zoom Air technology, which is designed to provide a responsive and comfortable cushioning system. The translucent outsole design provides traction and durability on any surface, while the Lunarlon foam in the midsole offers cushioning and absorbs shock during landings. Similarly, the shoe's padded collar and tongue provide additional cushioning and comfort.

We think that the key feature of the Nike Zoom LeBron NXXT Gen White Metallic Silver is its Flywire lacing technology that locks the foot in place and adds stability. The shoe was released on April 1st, 2023 at a retail price of $160.

Name: Nike KD 4 Weatherman (2024)
Text:
The Nike KD 4 Weatherman (2024) brings back one of the most iconic colorways in the KD line, inspired by Kevin Durant's childhood dream of becoming a weatherman. This re-release features a lush green upper with volt, black, and team orange accents, creating a visually striking design. The sneaker's standout feature is the weather pattern graphics on the upper and outsole, which pay homage to Durant's passion for meteorology before he discovered his talent for basketball. This unique design element makes the KD 4 Weatherman a must-have for both sneaker enthusiasts and KD fans.

The KD 4 Weatherman first made waves in 2011 and has remained a favorite among sneakerheads. This 2024 version retains the original's bold aesthetics. The vibrant colorway, highlighted by lush green and volt, captures attention, while the weather-inspired graphics add a layer of storytelling that connects to Durant’s personal history. The black and team orange details further enhance the dynamic look, making this sneaker a standout on and off the court.

Priced at $130, the Nike KD 4 Weatherman (2024) was released on May 21, 2024. This re-release not only celebrates Kevin Durant's journey but also offers a piece of sneaker history with a fresh twist. Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the KD line, this sneaker combines heritage, design, and performance in one compelling package. Make sure to add this iconic model to your collection and step out in style with the KD 4 Weatherman.

Name: Nike Kobe 8 Protro Halo
Text:
Unveiled on August 23, 2023, the Nike Kobe 8 Protro Halo signals the epic return of the iconic Kobe line.

Drenched in a pristine all-white colorway, this sneaker stands as an embodiment of purity, legacy, and unparalleled style. A true nod to the rebirth of the legendary Nike Kobe series, this piece is all about legacy and finesse. From its seamless upper construction to the intricate detailing, every aspect echoes Kobe's timeless style and unwavering commitment to the game. An embodiment of both on-court prowess and off-court style, this sneaker is a must-have for any collection.

Mamba mentality isn't just a mindset; it's a lifestyle. And for those looking to embody that spirit, the Nike Kobe 8 Protro Halo was made available at a retail price of $180. Truly, a timeless tribute to basketball royalty.

Name: Nike Zoom GT Cut 2 Hyper Pink
Text:
The Nike Zoom GT Cut 2 Hyper Pink is part of the second edition of Nike’s Greater Than (GT) series with a focus on Air Zoom technology. As the name implies, this high-performance basketball shoe is designed for cutting across the court and changing directions quickly.

The sneaker features a Zoom Air unit in the heel and another layered beneath the upper. When combined with the supportive insole, these cushioning units allow for increased responsiveness. A vibrant pink colorway featuring Hyper Pink, Fierce Pink, Pearl Pink, and Gym Red covers the texturized knit upper while a darker Fireberry color makes the heel and tread stand out.

Something our experts love about this basketball shoe is the contrasting Swooshes on the side panel and the midsole. They face in opposite directions and create the appearance of movement, embodying the rapid "cut" motion that inspired the shoe’s name. The Nike Zoom GT Cut 2 Hyper Pink was released on August 10, 2023, and retailed at $170.

Name: adidas AE 1 With Love
Text:
The adidas AE 1 With Love, born out of a collaboration with basketball sensation Anthony Edwards, marks the inaugural colorway for Edwards' debut signature shoe.

Crafted with black knit textile, the upper of the adidas AE 1 With Love is reinforced by an Acid Orange TPU support cage, which incorporates breathable perforations arranged in a unique honeycomb pattern. The woven tongue tag proudly displays Anthony Edwards' initials, and the back heel features the iconic adidas 3-Stripes logo. The midsole integrates Boost and LightStrike technologies, delivering both lightweight cushioning and energy return. With a rubber outsole, the shoe guarantees exceptional traction and grip on diverse surfaces.

The standout attribute of the adidas AE 1 With Love is its prominent TPU overlay, seamlessly integrated with perforations extending to the sole unit. This design element, paired with the Georgia peach-inspired upper, imparts a unique and distinctive aesthetic to the shoe. The sneaker debuted for $120 on December 16th, 2023.

Name: Nike Ja 1 Halloween Zombie
Text:
Step into the eerie season with the Nike Ja 1 "Halloween" a sneaker that beautifully marries innovative design with a spooky aesthetic. This edition, wrapped in a Lime Blast/Oil Green-Black-Hemp-Cacao Wow colorway, brings a fresh and spooky vibe to the courts. The upper, crafted with synthetic materials and mesh ensures a comfortable and breathable fit. The design is a salute to the Halloween spirit, echoing haunting stories with every stride you take.

The innovative tech in the sneaker doesn't take a backseat to aesthetics. The colorway is more than just a visual treat; it's a representation of Nike's commitment to evolving sneaker culture. The zombie scratches across the iconic Swooshes, the eerie hands rising from graves, and the blood-red embroidered number "12" are a tale of spooky elegance blended with sporty functionality. This is where the tradition of Halloween meets the futuristic design of Nike, creating a sneaker that's as visually appealing as it is performance-ready.

With the Nike Ja 1 "Halloween" you're stepping into a narrative crafted meticulously by Nike and Ja Morant. The eerie yet exciting colorway, coupled with the innovative design, makes it a coveted possession for any sneakerhead. Dropping on October 28, 2023, at a retail price of $120, the Nike Ja 1 "Halloween" is a sweet deal for those ready to make a statement on and off the court.

Name: Nike Kobe 6 Protro Italian Camo (2024)
Text:
Introducing the Nike Kobe 6 Protro Italian Camo 2024, a sleek rendition of the classic Kobe 6, set to captivate with its unique camouflage pattern inspired by Kobe Bryant's early years in Italy. The colorway, a sophisticated blend of black, crimson bog, and khaki, is a stylish nod to Kobe's formative experiences and his enduring legacy. Tailored for those who admire the subtleties of design and the stories behind them, this sneaker combines the essence of Kobe's history with cutting-edge footwear technology.

The Kobe 6 Protro isn't just about its standout Italian Camo aesthetic; it's a powerhouse of sneaker tech. The shoe is engineered with advanced performance features like Zoom Air cushioning for responsive comfort, a Cushlon midsole for lightweight support, and a durable outsole that pays homage to Kobe's multidirectional playing style. The sneaker's unique texture mimics a snake's skin, reflecting Kobe's "Black Mamba" persona, while the innovative tech ensures these shoes stand up to the demands of both performance and everyday wear.

On April 13, 2024, the Nike Kobe 6 Protro Italian Camo dropped at a retail price of $190. This release offers a piece of basketball royalty's origin story, wrapped in modern performance and timeless design. Embrace the spirit of Kobe's legacy and add a touch of Italian finesse to your sneaker collection with this 2024 re-release. It's a sneaker that celebrates history, innovation, and the endless pursuit of greatness, perfect for those who walk the path less traveled.

Name: Nike Kobe 8 Protro Radiant Emerald
Text:
Dive into the game with the Nike Kobe 8 Protro Radiant Emerald, a sneaker that blends cutting-edge design with a tribute to a basketball legend. This sneaker captures the essence of Kobe Bryant's dynamic playstyle and his legacy on the court, featuring a sleek White/Radiant Emerald/White colorway that stands out in any crowd. The numbers 8, 24, and 2 are displayed on the upper, symbolizing Kobe's iconic numbers with the Lakers and his daughter Gianna's number 2, making it more than just a shoe; it's a piece of history.

Crafted for the modern athlete and styled for the streets, the Kobe 8 Protro Radiant Emerald is engineered with performance technology that ensures comfort and responsiveness. Its lightweight construction and supportive fit adapt seamlessly to rapid movements, embodying the agility and precision Kobe was known for. The vibrant Radiant Emerald accents add a fresh pop of color, perfectly suited for individuals who appreciate a mix of heritage and style.

The Nike Kobe 8 Protro Radiant Emerald, retailing at $190, made its mark on February 8, 2024. This brand-new colorway not only honors the legacy of Kobe and Gianna but also serves as a fashionable statement piece for sneaker enthusiasts and basketball players alike, making it a must-have addition to any collection.

Name: Nike KD 4 Galaxy (2024)
Text:
The Nike KD 4 Galaxy recaptures the essence of its 2012 counterpart, which was a highlight of the NBA All-Star Weekend. Its Metallic Silver/Total Orange/Dark Grey colorway is a nod to the original's space-themed design, making it a standout piece in any sneaker collection. The KD 4 Galaxy is not just a shoe; it's a piece of basketball history, embodying the spirit of one of the most memorable All-Star events.

The 2024 version of the KD 4 Galaxy preserves the iconic design while integrating modern technology for enhanced performance. It's a perfect amalgamation of nostalgia and innovation, appealing to both long-time fans of the silhouette and new enthusiasts alike. The distinct colorway and star-studded design elements pay tribute to Kevin Durant's stellar performance and the sneaker's astronomical theme.

Set to launch on February 15, 2024, with a retail price of $130, the Nike KD 4 Galaxy is more than just a re-release; it's a celebration of basketball heritage and sneaker culture. Its arrival is eagerly anticipated by fans around the world, ready to experience a piece of sneaker history.

Name: Nike LeBron 4 Fruity Pebbles (2024)
Text:
Introducing the Nike LeBron 4 Fruity Pebbles 2024, a vibrant and playful addition to the LeBron sneaker lineage. This edition bursts onto the scene with a colorway inspired by the iconic cereal, featuring white, true red, mean green, varsity purple, and splashes of color that mimic the look of Fruity Pebbles. It's a design that pays homage to LeBron James' childhood favorite and brings a fun, nostalgic vibe to the basketball court.

The Nike LeBron 4 Fruity Pebbles 2024 features advanced cushioning and a foamposite shell upper to ensure optimal comfort. Its distinctive design, from the bold color palette to the intricate detailing, showcases Nike's commitment to innovative aesthetics. If you're a sneakerhead or LeBron fan in search of a unique addition to your collection, this sneaker hits all the right notes.

Released on March 7, 2024, and retailing at $250, the Nike LeBron 4 Fruity Pebbles 2024 has made a splash in the sneaker community. Its playful design, coupled with the sneaker's history, has garnered attention from fans and collectors alike. As a celebration of LeBron's legacy and a nod to the simple joys of childhood, the Nike LeBron 4 Fruity Pebbles 2024 stands out as a memorable and desirable release in the world of basketball sneakers.

Name: Nike LeBron 20 Miami Heat
Text:
The Nike Lebron 20 Miami Heat, available in different hues - including black, university red, university gold, and light smoke gray - is one of the collaborative designs between this iconic American brand and the NBA champion from Akron.

The upper section of the Lebron 20 model is made of black woven textile with a double Swoosh on its right side. The sneaker has an elongated tongue beneath the laces made from cotton. Its midsole and outsole, which are both made from rubber, appears in the black and red colors.

The Nike Lebron 20 Miami Heat was first released on October 24th, 2022 with $200 as the retail price.

Name: Nike LeBron 20 PRM Mimi Plange Ceremony
Text:
The Nike LeBron 20 Premium Mimi Plange Ceremony was released to honor culture and mark two decades of collaboration between LeBron James and Nike.

Dressing a textile knit on the upper, the Nike LeBron 20 features vibrantly colored bright crimson floral patterns on the vamp. More scarlet flowers are embroidered on the quarter panels, covering most of the midfoot. Also on the panels are the Nike swooshes, which intertwine on the lateral side. The heel extends the bright Crimson-on-White colorway but introduces some branding. LeBron’s crown logo is plastered on a reed patch on the heel counter, while Mimi Plange’s brand motif is embroidered on the red mustache in a bold berry tone.

The lace-up closure on the Nike LeBron 20 Premium Mimi Plange Ceremony is among its most outstanding features. Multicolor laces inspired by the Maasai community of Tanzania rest on a woven, bold-berry-colored tongue. This shoe was released on September 9th, 2023, for $250.

Name: Nike LeBron 20 Black Metallic Gold
Text:
The Nike LeBron 20 Black Metallic Gold showcases gold accents thoughtfully incorporated into its design. These refined gold details grace the "XX" dubrae (lace aglets), the "XX" branding on the tongue, and the uppermost eyelets. At the heel of the shoe, you'll find LeBron James' signature patch, which signifies his endorsement and personal touch on the design.

The upper of the Nike LeBron 20 Black Metallic Gold is crafted from a black knit material, providing a lightweight and breathable feel. The upper offers flexibility and comfort, making it suitable for intense on-court action. The Nike Swoosh logos on each side of the shoe are presented in a striking Metallic Gold finish. The outsole is constructed from a translucent material.

What truly captivates our experts is the midsole of the Nike LeBron 20 Black Metallic Gold, which is predominantly in white with black specks. It incorporates advanced cushioning technology, ensuring responsiveness and impact protection during gameplay. The Nike LeBron 20 Black Metallic Gold was released on April 6th, 2023, available for purchase for $200.

Name: Nike LeBron Witness 6 Light Melon Orange
Text:
The Nike LeBron Witness 6 Light Melon Orange was released as part of the Nike LeBron Witness series.

The Light Melon Orange Nike LeBron Witness 6 is designed with a lightweight, breathable mesh upper that offers ventilation and durability on the court. It features a TPU mudguard for added protection and stability, ensuring that you can make quick cuts and moves without the worry of sliding or slipping. The foam midsole ensures that the shoe will keep your feet cushioned and comfortable, protecting them from the impact of the ground. The outsole of the shoe is made of rubber and is designed with a unique traction pattern that provides grip and traction on the court.

Our experts say that one of the significant features of the Nike LeBron Witness 6 Light Melon Orange is the Zoom Air cushioning technology in the sole, which provides a responsive and comfortable feel during those high jumps and dives. The shoe was released on October 12th, 2021 at a retail price of $110.

Name: Nike LeBron 21 Purple Rain
Text:
The Nike LeBron 21 Purple Rain pays homage to the greatness of both LeBron James and the legendary artist Prince, fusing the realms of music and basketball in a unique collaboration.

Taking inspiration from the iconic song Purple Rain, the Purple Rain Nike LeBron 21 is draped in a soft Violet Dust hue, extending to the oval laces and tongue construction. Vivid Melon Tint accents accentuate the prominent Swooshes, tongue tab logo, and central lace loops. An iridescent Purple Cosmos finish enhances the Zoom Air cushioned heel. Additionally, the design subtly references the signature colors of the Lakers. The insole features a graphic that directly nods to the late rock and roll legend.

The standout aspect of the Nike LeBron 21 Purple Rain lies in its insole design, featuring a hand adorned with rings, symbolizing LeBron James' four NBA championships. This thoughtful detail adds a personal and meaningful touch to the shoe, commemorating LeBron's remarkable achievements throughout his illustrious career. The sneaker debuted for $200 on October 14th, 2023.

Name: Nike LeBron 21 Abalone
Text:
The Nike LeBron 21 Abalone takes the recognizable Lebron 21 silhouette and adds a vibrant pattern that mimics the inside of an abalone shell.

The lightweight mesh upper features abalone shell patterns that include whirling patterns in tones ranging from aqua to dark green. The Swoosh on the lateral side comes in abalone print with an embroidered white line, while the Swoosh on the medial side panel features rows of stitches. These stitched lines look like the pattern on the outside of an abalone shell and correspond to the exposed construction on the heel. This low-to-the-ground basketball shoe boasts Zoom Air technology in the midsole and ventilation ports on both sides of the shoes.

Our StockX experts like the symbolism behind the shoe. To Lebron James, the shell protecting the pearl within symbolizes the way he protects his daughter. The Nike LeBron 21 Abalone was released on December 1st, 2023, and retailed at $210.

Name: Nike LeBron 21 Tahitian
Text:
The Nike LeBron 21 Tahitian is a performance basketball shoe with a low-to-the-ground and lightweight design. It features iridescent details on the heel that resemble a Tahitian pearl and a rope pattern that mimics the patterns on the exterior of a clam’s shell.

The black mesh upper boasts a series of perforations along the side panels that allow the foot to breathe and look like the veining on a clam shell.
