The quilted tongue also houses perforations and provides plush cushioning. A 360-degree zonal cabling system reinforces the mesh upper without weighing the shoe down. Zoom Air cushioning and foam in the midsole provide responsive cushioning underfoot, while the front lace system secures the fit.

Our StockX experts like the way the iridescent green details on the heel match the green tones of the durable outsole. The Nike LeBron 21 Tahitian was released on November 3rd, 2023, and retailed at $200.

Name: Nike Zoom LeBron 4 Graffiti (2023)
Text:
The Nike Zoom LeBron 4 Graffiti (2023) is a limited-edition sneaker that was created by Nike in collaboration with LeBron James and was initially released in 2006.

The sneaker features a University Red, Black, and White colorway with bold graffiti graphics that dominate the side. The graphics feature black and white lettering inspired by the graffiti written across the walls of New York City. A black and red ankle collar secures the foot and features a white mini-Swoosh outlined in red, while an exaggerated pull tab adorns the heel. The sneaker also comes with a responsive Zoom Air unit in the midsole and a plastic casing that adds stability.

Our StockX experts love the translucent red detailing on the outsole. It provides traction while allowing you to see the graffiti designs on the midsole. The Nike Zoom LeBron 4 Graffiti (2023) was released on September 19, 2023, and retailed at $240.

Name: Nike LeBron 4 Black Anthracite (2023)
Text:
The Nike LeBron 4 Black Anthracite (2023) is a manifestation of LeBron James's enduring impact on the game, updated for the modern player. Its monochrome black and anthracite palette exudes a powerful, imposing presence, much like LeBron's command on the court. Engineered for those who lead with strength and determination, this sneaker is synonymous with performance royalty.

Built with a robust construction and Nike’s advanced cushioning, the LeBron 4 provides the support and responsiveness that are hallmarks of LeBron’s own footwear demands. The all-black colorway is versatile, offering a sleek look that's as formidable in style as it is in performance.

Set for release on December 12, 2023, at $240, the Nike LeBron 4 Black Anthracite (2023) is anticipated to continue the legacy of LeBron's signature series, offering a premium basketball experience and a bold aesthetic statement.

Name: Nike LeBron 20 Nike Lifer
Text:
The Nike LeBron 20 Nike Lifer was released in 2023 and comes in a blend of colors including Light Silver, Hyper Royal, Safety Orange, and Lemon Chiffon.

The upper of the LeBron 20 Nike Lifer is made of a combination of FlyKnit, leather, and synthetic materials, which work together to provide a supportive and adaptable fit. The FlyKnit material is used in high-wear areas of the shoe, such as the forefoot and midfoot, and provides excellent breathability. The outsole incorporates a tread pattern that gives the shoe excellent grip and durability. The sneaker features Nike Swooshes in an overlay pattern on one side and a stitched Swoosh on the other side.

We think that the standout feature of the Nike LeBron 20 Nike Lifer is its React sole. The shoe's midsole is made of Nike's React foam, which is a lightweight and durable material that provides optimal cushioning and stability. The midsole also incorporates Nike Zoom Air technology, which compresses and then rebounds, providing a responsive and explosive feeling. The shoe was released on March 23rd, 2023, at a retail price of $200.

Name: Nike LeBron 20 Laser Orange
Text:
The Nike LeBron 20 Laser Orange is a model from the LeBron James' signature basketball shoe line with Nike, often referred to as the LeBron series, which is known for incorporating innovative technologies, performance features, and stylish designs.

The Nike LeBron 20 Laser Orange is designed to be worn on the basketball court. It has a color palette that is mainly composed of bright orange, blue, neon green, white, and pink. The upper is made of breathable knit material, allowing for it to be flexible and provide airflow. The white sole is made from rubber that allows for traction while running on the court.

A feature of the Nike LeBron 20 Laser Orange that our group of experts enjoy is the double Nike Swoosh logo on the side of the shoe that provides a pop of color and is a modern version of the brand’s traditional logo. This model was first released on June 8th, 2023, for a starting price of $200.

Name: Nike Zoom LeBron NXXT Gen Wolf Grey
Text:
The Nike Zoom LeBron NXXT Gen Wolf Grey is part of Lebron James’ LeBron NXXT Gen collection. The sneaker features several details that pay homage to Lebron James, including the traction pattern on the outsole that forms a map of Akron, Ohio, the athlete’s hometown.

Like other Lebron NXXT Gen models, the "Wolf Grey" variation comes with two Swooshes that contrast the base color. Although the colorway boasts Pink Spell, Wolf Grey, and Hyper Royal, the dominant color is grey with pinkish accents. The sneaker features alternating colors on the right and left foot. Lightweight elements include the wide-hole mesh upper, the Zoom Air unit in the heel, and another Zoom Air unit in the forefoot.

Our experts at StockX appreciate the larger Swoosh, which comes in an iridescent pink-purple and complements the outsole. The Nike Zoom LeBron NXXT Gen Wolf Grey was released on March 16, 2023, and retailed at $160.

Name: Jordan Tatum 1 Pink Lemonade
Text:
The Jordan Tatum 1 Pink Lemonade is a special-edition sneaker that was released in 2023.

The upper of the Air Jordan Tatum 1 in Pink Lemonade iteration is made from high-quality mesh and leather construction. The use of mesh on the upper helps to keep the feet cool and dry, while the leather provides a durable and supportive structure for the shoe. The outsole is made of durable rubber that provides traction and grip on a variety of surfaces. The midsole is made of soft foam that provides cushioning and support while also absorbing shock during wear.

We think that the notable feature of the Jordan Tatum 1 Pink Lemonade sneaker is its unique and playful colorway. The combination of soft, full-grain pink-tinted leather and mesh with Barely Volt and Lava Glow accents creates a truly eye-catching design. The shoe was released on June 20th, 2023, at a retail price set at $120.

Name: Jordan Luka 2 Matador
Text:
The Jordan Luka 2 Matador is a double nod to Luka Dončić’s time with Real Madrid before he entered the NBA and his smart, determined on-court style that can be compared to a real-life matador.

The Jordan Luka 2 Matador is a Jordan-esque sneaker dressed in a tropical twist, washed teal, and barely green color combination with metallic gold accents. The semi-transparent mesh upper incorporates synthetic suede overlays that add support where the shoe needs it, while textile portions ensure breathability while not weighing it down. Luka’s branding is found on the top of the tongue in golden stitching, and a semi-translucent rubber outsole with a radial traction pattern provides traction and coverage on smooth surfaces.

Apart from the eye-catching design, our experts think that other standout features include cutting-edge Nike technology like an IsoPlate foot frame, a Cushlon 3.0 wedge foam, and the Formula 23 foam that runs the full length of the midsole. Innovation to the max. The Jordan Luka 2 Matador debuted on August 3, 2023, and sold at a retail price of $140.

Name: Jordan Tatum 1 Barbershop
Text:
The Jordan Tatum 1 Barbershop is a collaborative sneaker between the Jordan Brand and Jayson Tatum, a rising star in the NBA. This sneaker takes inspiration from barbershops, which are a central gathering place for communities to socialize, relax, and get haircuts.

The Air Jordan Tatum 1 Barbershop comes in a predominantly Coconut Milk and black colorway with Metallic Gold and Laser Blue accents. The upper is made from a mix of mesh, leather, and suede. The toe area is reinforced with a TPU material for added protection, while the Jumpman logo features on the side.

Our experts say that one of the standout features of the Jordan Tatum 1 Barbershop is its high level of comfort and performance. The shoe features Jordan's Flywire technology, which helps provide a secure and comfortable fit. The shoe also includes a cushioned midsole and a rubber outsole for added traction. The sneaker was released on May 12th, 2023, at a retail price of $120.

Name: Jordan Tatum 1 Pure Money
Text:
The Jordan Tatum 1 Pure Money stands out with a unique silhouette, drawing inspiration from the 2006 Air Jordan 4 Pure Money and faithfully embracing the original Air Jordan 4's name and design elements.

The Pure Money Air Jordan Tatum 1 boasts a predominantly clean white appearance throughout its woven, synthetic, and leather upper. Accents near the forefoot and heel, including the Jumpman branding, pay homage to the Pure Platinum eyelets featured on the retro version. The synthetic layers of the shoe alternate between a Pristine White and a complementary silver hue. The lines encircling the midsole feature a polished appearance, coordinating with the glossy elements on the tongue emblem, heel tab, and Jumpman logo on the lateral heel.

The standout characteristic of the Jordan Tatum 1 Pure Money lies in its immaculate Pure Money aesthetic. This all-white theme, originally introduced in the Air Jordan 4 in 2006, offers versatility that effortlessly complements various styles. The sneaker debuted for $120 on September 5th, 2023.

Name: Jordan Luka 1 Dog Dad
Text:
Celebrate the joy of companionship with the Air Jordan Luka 1 Dad Dog, a sneaker that captures Luka Dončić’s love for his four-legged friends. In white, black, bleached coral, and sesame, this sneaker embodies the playful and loyal nature of man's best friend, combined with the competitive spirit of one of the NBA’s brightest stars. The design is perfect for those who bring a sense of loyalty and fun to the game.

The Luka 1 Dad Dog is designed for dynamic play, with features that support swift movements and provide comfort for all-day wear. It's a tribute to the off-court passions that shape players and the relationships that keep them grounded.

With a retail price of $110, the Air Jordan Luka 1 Dad Dog was released on February 5, 2023, offering sneaker enthusiasts a playful yet performance-ready option inspired by Luka's heartwarming bond with his canine pals.

Name: Jordan Luka 2 Luk.AI Space Hunter
Text:
The Air Jordan Luka 2 Space Hunter debuts one of the launch colorways of Luka Doncic’s sophomore signature shoe.

Ghillie style lacing secures the upper of the Air Jordan Luka 2 Space Hunter, crafted from breathable black mesh with tonal nubuck overlays accented with violet stitching. Luka’s personal logo decorates the tongue, while ‘Non Desistas’ and ‘Non Exieris’ are inscribed on the back heel of each shoe, which translate to ‘Never Surrender’ and ‘Never Give Up.’ Speckled detailing lands on support pieces embedded in the foam midsole, reinforced by a semi-translucent rubber outsole underfoot. Jordan branding elements include the Jumpman on the midsole, outsole, and tongue tag pull tab.

What our experts love about the Air Jordan Luka 2 Space Hunter is its cutting-edge midsole technology, utilizing the Formula 23 platform. This technology provides exceptional cushioning and support, ensuring that every step you take is comfortable and responsive. The sneaker debuted for $130 on July 11th, 2023.

Name: Jordan Tatum 2 Momma's Boy
Text:
The Jordan Tatum 2 Momma's Boy is a basketball shoe designed in collaboration with American basketball star Jayson Tatum.

This version of the Jordan Tatum 2 is constructed with a white upper that is patterned with outlines of calla lily flowers and bright yellow accents. The calla lily is his mother’s favorite flower, while the yellow accents represent her favorite color. The black tongue features a JT logo in bright yellow, while the black heel collar features a yellow Jumpman logo The number 0 appears on the heel collar over a pink background. Bright yellow supports outlined in black appear on each midsole, and a pink Jumpman can be found on the lateral side. The shoes also feature a full-length Air Strobel unit for performance enhancement.

What we like most about this shoe are the hits of bright pink that perfectly complement the use of yellow on the otherwise black-and-white shoe. The Jordan Tatum 2 Momma's Boy was released on March 5, 2024, for a price of $125.

Name: Jordan 36 Low Flipped Infrared
Text: The Air Jordan 36 Flipped Infrared 23 is a highly anticipated release from the iconic sneaker brand. The shoe features a sleek black and white colorway with pops of vibrant Infrared 23 accents. The upper is constructed with a mix of breathable mesh and durable leather, providing both comfort and support. The shoe also boasts a responsive Zoom Air unit in the forefoot for added cushioning during high-impact activities. The Air Jordan 36 Flipped Infrared 23 was released on May 19, 2022, with a retail price of $185. This shoe is a must-have for sneaker enthusiasts and basketball players alike, offering both style and performance in one package.

Name: Jordan Tatum 1 Celtics (Translucent Green Sole)
Text:
The Jordan Tatum 1 Celtics (Translucent Green Sole) is a performance shoe that was the first collaboration with American basketball point guard Jayson Tatum.

The Celtics (Translucent Green Sole) Jordan Tatum 1 has an upper made of lightweight black mesh with hints of Green Strike underneath on the toe box and sides. A Green Strike Jumpman logo appears on the outer heel, while Tatum’s initials adorn the tongue, also in Green Strike. The heel features a green pull tab with Tatum’s signature and the number 0. A durable synthetic frame reaches up from the midsole to support the sides of the shoe in gray and green on the outer side and in shiny black on the inner side. The outsole features translucent-green sections, and the midsole is equipped with Zoom Air cushioning.

What we think stands out here are the Green Strike accents that really pop against the black base. The Jordan Tatum 1 Celtics (Translucent Green Sole) was released on November 14, 2023, for $120.

Name: Jordan Luka 2 Lake Bled
Text:
The Jordan Luka 2 Lake Bled blends performance and style, perfect for the young and dynamic crowd. Inspired by the picturesque Lake Bled, this sneaker showcases a stunning color palette of Polar, Bright Crimson, Psychic Blue, and Diffused Blue. Its design is a nod to Luka Dončić's fluid playing style, embodying agility and grace on the court.

With a focus on comfort and durability, the Jordan Luka 2 Lake Bled integrates advanced basketball technology. Its innovative cushioning system provides excellent responsiveness, while the sleek upper ensures breathability and a snug fit. These sneakers are not just about performance; they're also a fashion statement, embodying the spirit of modern basketball culture.

The Jordan Luka 2 Lake Bled, originally priced at $140, was released on September 14, 2023. Its unique colorway and state-of-the-art design elements have made it a must-have for sneaker enthusiasts and basketball players alike.

Name: Jordan 38 Fundamentals (Clear Sole)
Text:
The Jordan 38 Fundamentals (Clear Sole) is a performance shoe with 20% recycled material for cushioning and support. 
 
This iteration of the Jordan 38 has an upper made of black mesh and white leather. White leather forms the toe box and eyestays, while the black mesh is seen on the sides, revealing red and white accents underneath, and you can even see through to the inside of the shoe at some points. Black support layers appear around the ankle, while the heel is white with a black Jumpman logo. The white tongue also features an inverted Jumpman. The shoe's midsole is transparent, revealing underneath the white, black, and red support units. A Zoom Air Strobel unit allows for faster movements.

What stands out here is the clear sole, which allows you to see right through the technology that makes this shoe great. The Jordan 38 Fundamentals (Clear Sole) was released on August 25, 2023, and retailed for $200.

Name: Jordan Zion 3 'Gen Zion'
Text: The Jordan Zion 3 'Gen Zion' features a breathable white textile upper with a contrasting black splatter print. A Jumpman icon appears on the tongue, while Zion Williamson's personal logo decorates the back heel. Lightweight cushioning arrives via a drop-in midsole, built with Formula 23 foam and equipped with a springy Zoom Air unit in the forefoot. A TPU cage wraps up the midsole for lateral stability, while a translucent herringbone rubber outsole provides grippy traction underfoot.

Name: Jordan 36 Low Pure Money
Text:
The Air Jordan 36 Low Pure Money is a unique variation of Nike's iconic Air Jordan 36 Low sneakers that appear in white and Metallic Silver color schemes.

The Air Jordan 36 Low Pure Money sneaker's design boasts an all-white breathable, light mesh upper with small touches of silver on the outer trim, and an iridescent finish on the sport stripe within the midsole and the larger Jumpman logo on the tongue. The upper design also features a pull tab for easy wear. The Pure Money look is finished with a full "iced out" rubber outsole for traction and grip on various surfaces.

What we love about this iteration is its Metallic Silver colors on the Jumpman logo and an iridescent finish on the sport stripe. This color scheme makes it shiny and unique from the other Air Jordan 36 Low sneakers. This Air Jordan 36 Low Pure Money sneaker was released on July 21, 2022 with a recommended retail price of $175.

Name: Jordan Zion 2 SP Naruto vs. Sasuke
Text:
Unleashing a fierce blend of anime inspiration and on-court prowess, the Air Jordan Zion 2 Naruto vs Sasuke steps onto the scene, capturing the essence of the legendary rivalry from the beloved Naruto series. This sneaker is a tribute to the dynamic between Naruto and Sasuke, emblematic of determination and skill.

The design infuses elements from both characters, with a striking color palette of black, laser blue, yellow strike, dark purple dust, and metallic silver. It's more than just a sneaker; it's a narrative of perseverance, friendship, and competition. The Zion 2's cutting-edge technology, including responsive cushioning and superior grip, ensures top-notch performance, mirroring the abilities of the anime heroes. Its aesthetic is a harmonious mix of style and substance, appealing to both sneakerheads and anime fans alike.

Released on February 28, 2023, the Air Jordan Zion 2 Naruto vs Sasuke, priced at $130, has since captivated a wide audience. It’s not just a shoe; it’s a statement piece that resonates with the spirit and the passion of the basketball court.
Colorway: Black/Laser Blue/Yellow Strike/Dark Purple Dust/Metallic Silver

Name: Under Armour Curry 1 Low Flotro Sour Patch Kids
Text:
The Under Armour Curry 1 Low Flotro Sour Patch Kids celebrates NBA player Steph Curry's favorite candy: Sour Patch Kids. It features a textile upper covered with gummy candy motifs in red, green, yellow, and blue.

This basketball shoe features a no-sew forefoot overlay in Capri blue that protects the toe area and adds durability. In terms of technology, the UA Flow sole unit provides lightweight cushioning, and the midfoot shank gives the shoe rigidity. Plus, a molded TPU heel clip offers stability in the rearfoot area. Curry's "SC" branding is in multiple places, including the heel, the tongue, the midsole, and near the toe.

Our experts at StockX like the neon yellow collar lining because it complements the vibrant colors of the Sour Patch Kids candies. The Under Armour Curry 1 Low Flotro Sour Patch Kids was released on November 11, 2022, and retailed for $150.

Name: Under Armour Curry Flow 9 For the W
Text:
The Under Armour Curry Flow 9 For the W is the ninth collaboration between Under Armour and basketball player Stephen Curry.

The sole of the Under Armour Curry Flow 9 features multicolor speckles on the lateral side and a gentle texture that builds up on the heel. The underfoot is embellished by the UA Flow technology that enhances traction. An Oxford Blue suede overlay covers the heel counter to match the fabric lining visible in the collar. The heel also has Vivid Lilac stitches that give rise to a pleated design. The intricate lacing system consists of punched eyelets on a white synthetic leather eyestay overlay, pink webbed eyelets, and a "CURRY" branding on the tongue logo.

What makes the Under Armour Curry Flow 9 For the W outstanding? We like the multicolor, lightweight upper on the front of this sneaker. It features Oxford Blue and Vivid Lilac wide mesh, a transparent overlay, and the performance-oriented UA Wrap technology. The sneaker was released on July 8th, 2022, for $140.

Name: Under Armour Curry 10 Splash Party
Text:
The Under Armour Curry 10 Splash Party is a light, summery basketball sneaker created by the partnership between UA and NBA star Stephen Curry.

The white mesh-like upper of the Splash Party UA Curry 10 is enhanced with streaks of blue and yellow. It is crafted using UA WARP upper technology that works like hundreds of mini seatbelts, holding your foot while allowing flexibility and breathability. It displays whimsical blue, yellow, and pink splashes. Hot pink accents hit the laces; eye stays, and the branding on the tongue and heel pull tabs. A white and blue TPE inner bootie offers a secure fit, comfort, lockdown, and energy return. The rubberless sole unit combines an internal midfoot shank for stability and support with a durable UA FLOW outsole that offers a superior court feel that makes it easier to cut, start, and stop faster.

The detail we enjoy the most about this colorful pair of kicks is the surprise when it lights out: these sneakers glow in the dark! The Under Armour Curry 10 Splash Party was released on March 14, 2023, for $160 retail.

Name: Under Armour Curry Flow 9 Sesame Street Cookie Monster
Text:
The Under Armour Curry Flow 9 Sesame Street Cookie Monster sneaker is completely rubber-free, making them lighter and offering a lot of grip.

The Under Armour Curry Flow 9 Sesame Street Cookie Monster features a woven TPU yarn in blue Wind and a black tongue and heel counter. The pull tab features a fuzzy blue piece inspired by Cookie Monster’s fur coat, and his eyes appear on the ankle collar. Steph’s logo is seen on the lateral side, with the lightweight Flow midsole/outsole construction bringing cushioning and grip without a rubber outsole.

The Under Armour Curry Flow 9 Sesame Street Cookie Monster was released in November 2021 and retailed for $160.

Name: Under Armour Curry Flow 8 NM Black White
Text:
The Under Armour Curry Flow 8 NM Black White is a black and white colorway from the Curry Flower 8 NM line, which is basketball player Stephen Curry's signature line.

This colorway is a sleek black and white iteration. The black upper has two layers that allow the foot to move freely. The Curry Flow 8 NM boasts supreme traction and cushioning thanks to Under Armour’s Flow tech. This means that the midsole and outsole are all one piece, so a rubber outsole is not needed. The outside part of the white Flow tech has micro teeth which provides traction. The Curry brand’s logo is white on the tongue tag and lateral heel side.

According to our experts, the padded and contoured heel is a standout feature. Paired with the CURRY branded heel tag, it is easy to slip into this shoe. The Under Armour Curry Flow 8 NM Black White was released with a $160 retail price when it debuted on December 11, 2020.

Name: Puma LaMelo Ball MB.01 Lo Black White
Text:
The physical appearance of the Puma LaMelo Ball MB.01 Lo Black White is designed with only two main colors: Puma Black and Puma White.

The MB.01 Lo Puma LaMelo Ball in Black White is crafted from high-quality leather. The upper showcases a timeless white and black color scheme, striking a perfect balance between classic and contemporary aesthetics. The lightweight foam midsole ensures comfortable cushioning and support during wear, while the sturdy rubber outsole guarantees excellent traction and grip. Emphasizing the brand identity, the Puma logo is prominently featured on the side of the shoe, adding a subtle branding element to the overall design.

Something that we found interesting with the Puma LaMelo Ball MB.01 Lo Black White is that this sneaker can be worn on the court or on the streets, making it a versatile and fashionable option. At the time of its release on October 15, 2022, the Puma LaMelo Ball MB.01 Lo Black White retailed for about $120.

Name: Puma LaMelo Ball MB.03 Toxic
Text:
The Puma LaMelo Ball MB.03 Toxic effortlessly combines style and functionality, taking inspiration from an extraterrestrial realm. The design integrates bold elements such as slime and claw marks, creating a visually aggressive aesthetic.

With slime-inspired rubber wrap-ups and an engineered knit upper featuring scratch cutout, the Puma LaMelo Ball MB.03 Toxic showcases a vibrant Purple Glimmer-Green Gecko color combination. The spotlight is on NITROFOAM, a nitrogen-infused foam providing responsive cushioning in a lightweight configuration. The durability and comfort of the shoe are enhanced by the engineered mesh upper and TPU heel counter. A high abrasion, non-slip rubber outsole guarantees excellent traction, and personalized LaMelo Ball branding adds a distinctive touch.

The standout feature of the Puma LaMelo Ball MB.03 Toxic is the NITROFOAM Infused midsole, introducing innovative technology that delivers superior responsiveness and comfort while maintaining a lightweight profile. The sneaker was originally sold for $125 on October 27th, 2023.

Name: Puma LaMelo Ball MB.01 White Silver
Text:
The Puma LaMelo Ball MB01 White Silver is a signature shoe created by Lamelo Ball and Puma.

The Puma LaMelo Ball features a construction of white mono-mesh up the top of the shoe with a forefoot of tonal no-sew overlays. The low-top has its anchor from the white Nitro Foam midsole with the molded TPU frame for more stability. The padded mesh tongue is woven with a "1 of 1" tag to add sass to this iconic design. It has the LaMelo signature tagline "Not From Here" printed on the shoe vamp and the lateral collar embellished detailing.

The Puma LaMelo Ball MB01 White Silver was released in July 2022 at a retail price of $120.

Name: Puma LaMelo Ball MB.02 Queen City Fade
Text:
The Puma LaMelo Ball MB.02 Queen City Fade is a basketball sneaker from the Puma LaMelo Ball MB.02 lineup in a "Queen City Fade" colorway.

Inspired by the colors of LaMelo Ball's franchise, the Charlotte Hornets, this Puma LaMelo Ball sneaker features a super breathable technical mesh material dressed in the team’s light blue and violet accents. Feather-like synthetic overlays that pay homage to the basketball player’s trademark wings and a gradient honeycomb pattern that fades at the heel offer a unique and stylish aesthetic. Other details include LaMelo Ball’s signature wings logo on the tongue and the  Silver TPU (thermoplastic polyurethane) heel counter, blue laces, and a co-branded heel tab. A NITRO foam midsole rests on a white rubber outsole with herringbone traction treads.

Our experts particularly love this sneaker’s colorway and construction, which add a meaningful and stylish element to the design. The Puma LaMelo Ball MB.02 Queen City Fade was made available on July 7th, 2023, for a retail price of $130.

Name: New Balance KAWHI 2 New Money
Text:
The New Balance KAWHI 2 New Money is a product of the collaboration between sportswear manufacturer New Balance and double NBA Champion Kawhi Leonard.

Dressed primarily in gray mist, with contrasting accents of green, off-white, black, and gold, this basketball sneaker features an upper constructed with Kinetic Stitch, a data-driven thread application that assists wearer movement where you need it the most. Its synthetic upper sits atop a FuelCell midsole that provides support and a propulsive fee. Its design is rounded out by a full-length outsole shank that adds stability and bounce.

The New Balance KAWHI 2 New Money debuted on 19th March 2022. At the time, it retailed at $160.

Name: New Balance KAWHI Jolly Rancher White
Text:
The New Balance KAWHI Jolly Rancher White was released as part of a collaborative collection inspired by Kawhi’s special childhood candy.  

This pair features an array of color schemes all over the shoe’s breathable mesh upper. Above the padded tongue, "Kawhi Leonard" is superposed over an artwork showing the Jolly Rancher Fruit Gang, while a 3D printed NB graphic makes its way at the back of the heel and a flame embroidery at the heel tab. Rounding out the sneaker is a white FuelCell midsole with the translucent rubber outsole revealing extra hints of color underfoot.  

The New Balance KAWHI Jolly Rancher White was released on October 31st, 2020, and retailed at a  price of $160.

Name: Nike Air Zoom GT Hustle 2 Victor Wembanyama Alien
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom GT Hustle 2 Victor Wembanyama Alien edition is a bold statement in performance basketball footwear, inspired by the rising star Victor Wembanyama. This special edition features a multi-color design dominated by striking black and green hues, creating a visually captivating aesthetic. The sneaker includes a glow-in-the-dark sole that reads "Be Unique Every Day," adding a unique touch that resonates with Wembanyama's out-of-this-world nickname, "alien." The metallic swoosh further enhances the sneaker's futuristic appeal, making it a standout both on and off the court.

Designed for optimal performance, the Nike Air Zoom GT Hustle 2 incorporates advanced technology to meet the demands of modern basketball players. The alien logo on the heel serves as a tribute to Wembanyama's unique presence in the basketball world, symbolizing his extraordinary skills and potential. The combination of black and green, along with the glow-in-the-dark features, ensures that this sneaker is not just about performance but also about making a bold style statement.

Priced at $170, the Nike Air Zoom GT Hustle 2 Victor Wembanyama Alien was released on May 15, 2024. This sneaker merges cutting-edge design with the name recognition of the NBA's newest star, offering a perfect blend of style and functionality. Celebrate Victor Wembanyama and embrace the "alien" spirit with this unique and stylish sneaker.

Name: Timberland 40 Below Super Boot Hazel Highway
Text:
The Timberland 40 Below Superboot Brown was originally designed for the harsh Alaskan climate, but the classic boot has been available for all terrains.

The 40 Below Superboot in Brown measures about 9 inches and includes an exclusive tannage Hazel Highway leather inspired by the Krymp Oxide leather of the original 1979 model. The shoe also comes with waterproof seam-sealed construction, anti-slip D-ring hardware, and a triple-bubble collar. The whole design by Timberland is rounded off by a black Vibram Ecostep sole crafted from 30% recycled rubber.

The Timberland 40 Below Superboot Brown was first released on the 1st of January 2018 for an original price of $260.

Name: Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore-Tex Black
Text: The Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore Tex Black is a highly functional and stylish shoe that is perfect for outdoor activities. It features a durable Gore-Tex upper that is waterproof and breathable, ensuring that your feet stay dry and comfortable in any weather condition. The shoe also has a Zoom Air unit in the heel for responsive cushioning and a rubber outsole with a rugged tread pattern for excellent traction on any surface. The black colorway gives the shoe a sleek and versatile look that can be worn with a variety of outfits. The Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore Tex Black was released on November 10, 2022, with a retail price of $230. This shoe is a must-have for anyone who loves to explore the great outdoors in style and comfort.

Name: Nike Manoa Leather Black
Text:
The Nike Manoa Leather Black features a sleek design with a black leather upper, providing a classic, versatile look. Its construction and rugged outsole make it suitable for outdoor adventures and urban environments, ensuring long-lasting performance and protection.

The Manoa Leather Black is designed to offer enduring durability with its sturdy leather upper, allowing for long-lasting wear. The boot also incorporates breathable textile materials, providing enhanced comfort throughout use. Its rugged construction includes hexagonal metal eyelets and a webbing pull tab, adding durability and stylish touch. The mid-height collar is padded, ensuring a comfortable fit and easy styling. The boot's rubber outsole boasts a durable design with rugged lugs, delivering traction on various surfaces. With its sleek all-black colorway, it exudes a timeless aesthetic.

At StockX, we're particularly fond of the Manoa Leather Black's hexagonal metal eyelets, as they add durability and style to the boot. The Nike Manoa Leather Black was released on 1st January 2018 and sold at $90.

Name: Timberland 6" Premium Waterproof Boot Supreme Diamond Plate Wheat
Text:
The Timberland 6" Premium Waterproof Boot Supreme Diamond Plate Wheat is a waterproof boot designed as a collaboration between the two brands.

This version of the Timberland 6" Premium Waterproof Boot is made with a premium nubuck upper in a Wheat color. The upper is sectioned off with white stitching, and the nubuck itself contains an embossed diamond pattern throughout. A small debossed Timberland logo appears on the lateral heel above the outsole, and a red Supreme tag can be found above it. Black padded leather appears around the ankle area, and a tan rubber outsole completes the overall design.

Our favorite things about this shoe are the small and subtle branding elements, as they allow the pattern of the shoe to take center stage. The Timberland 6" Premium Waterproof Boot Supreme Diamond Plate Wheat was released on December 21, 2023, for a price of $248.

Name: Timberland 6" Basic Boot Wheat
Text: The Timberland 6 Basic Wheat is a classic and timeless boot that has been a staple in the fashion industry for decades. Made with premium nubuck leather, these boots are durable and built to last. The wheat colorway is versatile and can be paired with a variety of outfits, making it a great addition to any wardrobe. Released on January 1st, 2018, the Timberland 6 Basic Wheat has been a popular choice among sneaker enthusiasts and fashionistas alike. Retailing at $140, these boots are a great investment for anyone looking for a high-quality and stylish shoe. One of the standout features of the Timberland 6 Basic Wheat is its waterproof construction, making it perfect for any weather condition. The padded collar and anti-fatigue technology also provide added comfort and support for all-day wear. Something we love about Timberland 6 Basic Wheat is its ability to seamlessly transition from a casual day out to a more formal occasion. Our experts think the best features are its durability, comfort, and versatility. Whether you're hiking through the mountains or walking through the city streets, the Timberland 6 Basic Wheat is a reliable and stylish choice.

Name: Nike ACG Woodside II Dark Gold Leaf
Text:
The Nike ACG Woodside II Dark Gold Leaf takes inspiration from a duck boot aesthetic to create a rugged high-top for the Nike All Conditions Gear line.

The Dark Gold Leaf iteration of the Nike ACG Woodside II has a black rubber upper surrounded by black water-repellent textiles at the mudguard. Brown tumbled leather with gold piping and stitching forms the collar that extends up the high-top ankle, topped off by black padded textile. Bright yellow ACG branding adorns the black textile heel tab underneath a black textile pull tab that helps you get these boots on and off. A warm lining is included to keep your feet warm and dry.

One aspect of this shoe we particularly enjoy is the rugged, yet comfortable, sole unit. A black foam midsole sits on a tan rubber outsole with thick waffle pattern lugs for traction in the great outdoors. The Nike ACG Woodside II Dark Gold Leaf was released on December 1, 2019, for a retail price of $125.

Name: Timberland 6" Boot Veneda Carter Wheat
Text:
The Timberland 6" Boot Veneda Carter Wheat is a special-edition 6" Boot from Timberland that was designed in collaboration with renowned stylist Veneda Carter.

The iconic yellow Timberland boot got a new image with this collaboration model that stays true to the original in some aspects, while some parts get the Veneda Carter make over. This iteration is the wheat patent leather colorway. It features a glossy patent leather upper in a sumptuous wheat color. The Timberland logo sits near the lateral ankle. Inside the boot there is ReBOTL lining, which is an eco-friendly material. The eyelets are silver metallic and lace up the two-toned rope laces. Underfoot is a durable outsole.

Our experts think that the waterproof, shiny patent leather upper keeps feet protected and dry and is what sets the Timberland 6" Boot Veneda Carter Wheat apart from other boots out there. It was released on March 5, 2024, with a retail list price of $250.

Name: Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore-Tex Trails End Brown
Text:
The Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore-Tex Trails End Brown is a rugged release from the Nike All Conditions Gear collection that keeps feet dry and secure at all times.

Crafted with heavy-duty materials and comfort in mind, the Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore-Tex is designed to keep weather at the helm while you enjoy your adventure. The brown and black upper has a Gore-Tex finish and you’ll find a durable plastic shank in the midfoot. The metal eye stays and lacing clasps keep your foot snug while the laces sport reflective flecks.

It is our expert opinion that the combination of Nike Air Zoom technology that absorbs impact and Gore-Tex makes it a high-quality waterproof boot to keep your feet protected from all of mother nature’s elements while hiking, backpacking or simply exploring. The Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore-Tex Trails End Brown made its first entry into the market on the 7th of October 2022, with $230 as the retail price.

Name: Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore-Tex Summit White
Text:
The Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore-Tex Summit White is a hiking boot designed for use on multiple types of terrains, ranging from icy to muddy.

What makes this sneaker stand out is the upper construction made of water-proof Gore-Tex. It protects the foot from moisture in the form of rain, snow, or sleet. Another noteworthy feature is the traction pattern on the rubber outsole. It boasts a three-prong pattern and large lugs designed for gripping the ground. Technical features include a plastic shank in the midfoot area that adds propulsion and Nike Air cushioning in the midsole. Laces with reflective detailing wind through the metal eyelets and clasps, securing the closure system.

Our experts at StockX like the boot's all-white colorway of Summit White and white. The Nike ACG Air Zoom Gaiadome Gore-Tex Summit White was released on December 31st, 2022, and retailed at $225.

Name: Nike Air Max Goadome Black
Text:
The trail boot-inspired Nike Air Max Goadome Black made its debut as part of the Nike Sportswear in November 2016.

Nike Air Max Goadome Black has a fully Black colorway. The boot is made of premium leather synthetic materials. Its upper features richly detailed leather and a Nike Air Max cushioning that ensures a clean, classic look with lasting comfort. The design is finished off by a waterproof finish and an aggressive outsole pattern that offers in and outdoor durability.

During its release in November 2016, the triple black colored Nike Air Max Goadome Black retailed at $170.

Name: MSCHF Big Red Boot
Text: The MSCHF Big Red Boot presents a cartoonishly proportioned high-top from the Brooklyn-based creative collective known for whimsical and provocative footwear. A straightforward crimson hue suffuses the bulky boot, constructed with a single-mold-shell design and a sturdy TPU rubber shell. The bulbous silhouette features a padded collar that reaches midcalf, and a flat EVA outsole marked with horizontal treads and debossed MSCHF branding.

Name: adidas Yeezy 950 Pirate Black (2023)
Text:
The adidas Yeezy 950 Pirate Black (2023) is a distinctive fusion of duck boot and military boot, culminating in a hybrid silhouette that carves its niche in the sneaker realm.

The 2023 adidas Yeezy 950 boasts a monochromatic theme, with the entirety of its structure, including the upper and midsole, enveloped in a sleek Pirate Black hue. Fashioned from ballistic nylon mesh and durable black rubber, the high-cut upper ensures durability and sturdy support. Enhanced with leather and canvas lining, the shoe provides durability and support. Notable features encompass a rugged rubber base encircling the mudguard and toe box, along with a convenient heel pull tab for easy wear. Anchored by a substantial rubber midsole and a lug-patterned rubber outsole, the sneaker ensures reliable traction.

The remarkable aspect of the adidas Yeezy 950 Pirate Black (2023) lies in its hybridized silhouette that blends design elements from both a duck boot and military boot. This distinctive amalgamation sets it apart within the sneaker landscape, offering an unconventional and standout footwear option. The shoe debuted for $600 on August 17, 2023.

Name: adidas Yeezy Desert Boot Salt
Text:
The adidas Yeezy Desert Boot Salt, Influenced by military and utility design, was made available as part of Season 7 lineup collection.

This version was made of breathable mesh, suede, and nubuck with a Salt color palette. Its disassembled design lines are reminiscent of the 500 sneakers. Rubber outsoles are .finished in complementary colors. A 3M fluorescent nylon pull tab runs the entire length of the tongue's spine. A thick foam midsole with EVA cushioning and a serrated rubber outsole, both of which take on tonal colors dependent on the upper, complete the overall design.

The adidas Yeezy Desert Boot Salt first debuted on 14 September 2019 and retailed at $200.

Name: Crocs Classic Cowboy Boot Black
Text:
The Crocs Classic Cowboy Boot Black is a reimagining of the cowboy boot using signature Crocs elements as a base.

Although this silhouette looks like a classic cowboy boot, the crocodile-embossed upper is made of resin with Jibbitz holes along the vamp. These holes provide ventilation and allow the wearer to attach charms to the shoe. Two charms come with the boot, including one that looks like a gold sheriff’s badge. The boot shaft features decorative embroidered designs while the heel strap displays shapes that resemble spurs. The boot features ‘crocs’ written near the top of the boot shaft with stars above and below.

Our experts at StockX love the way the shoe maintains the classic Crocs round-toe shape. It sets the shoe apart from other boots with a pointed toe. The Crocs Classic Cowboy Boot Black was released on October 23, 2023, and retailed at $120

Name: Dr. Martens 1460 DMXL Mega Lace Boot Rick Owens Black
Text:
The Dr. Martens 1460 DMXL Mega Lace Boot Rick Owens Black is a reimagination of the iconic Dr. Martens 1460 by American fashion designer Rick Owens.

Owens’ edgy, avant-garde aesthetic can be seen in the boot’s chunky sole and overlapping collection of laces. Silver-tone hardware secures the pearl lacing pattern and tonally matches the zipper on the medial side. The upper is made of soft Nappa leather in black with Dr. Marten’s signature reinforced welt stitches. First seen in the 14XX Beta Pack released in 2023, the oversized sole is made of EVA material and durable PVC pods. Other oversized features include the extra-long tongue that extends up and over the boot shaft.

Our StockX experts like the way Owens' design elements seamlessly blend with Dr. Martens' house codes to create a grunge-inspired boot. The Dr. Martens 1460 DMXL Mega Lace Boot Rick Owens Black was released on February 8th, 2024, and retailed at $370.

Name: Timberland 6" Field Boot Beef and Broccoli
Text:
The Timberland 6'' Field Boot Beef and Broccoli is a reimagination of the original Timberland 6 Field Boot that was first released in 1983. It is a shoe that is designed for being both a classic work boot and the footwear of choice for hikers.

This Timberland 6'' Field Boot model is a high top style that has a dark brown body with black and green overlays. The sole of the shoe is made out of strong rubber, while the body is primarily composed of waterproof leather. The laces are stretchy and designed to help provide ultimate support.

A feature of the Timberland 6'' Field Boot Beef and Broccoli that our team of experts particularly enjoys is the direct-inject polyurethane outsoles that help to provide durability and support to the wearer. This Timberland model was first made available for sale in January of 2017 and had a retail price that started at $175.

Name: Dr. Martens 1460 Smooth Leather Lace Up Boot Black
Text:
The Dr. Martens 1460 Smooth Leather Lace Up Boot Black is a reboot of the original Doc Martens boot, first launched on April 1, 1960. Whether it's worn highly polished or artfully scuffed, this boot delivers iconic style and legendary durability.

This eight-eyed boot is a testament to meticulous craftsmanship. It is constructed from smooth black leather that has been Goodyear Welted, a process where the upper and sole are sewn together and heat-sealed, ensuring improved comfort and hard-wearing resilience. The high-top boot with a wider and more rounded toe sports a black and yellow embroidered heel tab that aids in putting on and taking off the boot and matches the branded insole. The DMS sole, composed of black and gum PVC, features signature grooving on the sidewalls and a rugged traction tread on the outsoles.

The standout aspect of this boot that we most enjoy is the yellow stitching at the foxing. Not only does it hearken back to the color of the insole and pull tab, but it also gives the distinct Doc Martens look. The Dr. Martens 1460 Smooth Leather Lace Up Boot Black was released on May 1, 2022, for $170 retail.

Name: Nike SB Dunk High Pass~Port Work Boots
Text:
In collaboration with Nike SB, Australian skate shop PASS⁓PORT took inspiration from outdoor exploration for the Nike SB Dunk High PASS⁓PORT Work Boots.

Composed of yellow ripstop nylon, green hairy suede, and brown tumbled leather, the Nike SB Dunk High PASS⁓PORT Work Boot borrows its fabrication and palette from classic hiking boots. Thick patterned cord laces and brass D-Ring style lace loops are fashioned in a way that is typically geared for strenuous mountain activity. On the tongue, PASS⁓PORT embroidery and matching pull tabs highlight the collaboration. At the heel, find embroidering of a hatted figure in silhouette using a mini-Swoosh as a tool, underscoring the workwear inspiration of the collaboration.

The Nike SB Dunk High PASS⁓PORT Work Boots released in March of 2022.

Name: Nike Air Force 1 Boot Black Anthracite
Text:
The main hues that determine the outside appearance of the Nike Air Force 1 Boot Black Anthracite are black and Anthracite.

The Nike Air Force 1 Boot Black Anthracite is a boot-style shoe with a high-top silhouette. It has a leather upper that is resistant to water. The shoe includes recognizable Nike branding and offers the option to adjust the fit with a detachable silicone ankle strap. With Nike Air cushioning, this sneaker provides long-lasting lightweight comfort. Its rubber outsole with prominent lugs ensures stability and grip. The sneaker is finished with a black lacing system for a sleek appearance.

We found the prominent slugs on this sneaker’s outsole the most attractive aspects. The Nike Air Force 1 Boot Black Anthracite entered the market space for the very first time on October 21st, 2020. At the time of its release, this footwear sold for an approximate value of $160.

Name: Nike Air Force 1 High Boot Summit White
Text:
The Nike Air Force 1 High Boot Summit White is a variation of the classic Nike Air Force 1 High Boot.

Designed to counter the weather elements during the colder months, this high-top sneaker features a durable upper with a white base and similar-colored overlays around its perforated toe box, mid-foot, and heel. Its upper is contrasted by hits of Light Bone on the rubberized ankle strap, branded tongue, heel tab, pull tab, and Nike Swoosh branding. Holding the upper for the Nike Air Force 1 High Boot Summit White in place is a white stacked midsole for cushioning and a Light Bone traction rubber outsole, patterned for enhanced grip. Inside the shoe, you’ll find branded insoles cushioned to provide comfort.

What we love the most about the Nike Air Force 1 High Boot Summit White is the fact that it strikes a balance between sturdy and comfy. When wearing this sneaker, released on January 13, 2022, for $170, you can tackle rough terrains without getting blisters or hurting your feet.

Name: Nike Air Force 1 High Boot NN Dark Smoke Grey
Text:
The popular "Nike Air Force 1 High Boot NN Dark Smoke Gray" is a high-top sneaker that fits like a boot. The shoe boasts a variety of recycled components, including a fleece-like inner lining and a rubber outsole made of recycled material.

The shoe’s almost tactical design features a construction of leather and mesh with overlapping overlays and contrasting textures. Dual pull tabs, on the tongue and heel, help the wearer put on and take off the shoe while showcasing the smooth leather. Exposed stitching across the shoe gives it an industrial appearance that complements the durable woven laces in the lace cage. The speckled bits of rubber that make up the outsole are the only splashes of color on the otherwise Dark Smoke Gray, Smoke Gray, and black shoe.

Our experts like the way the inner lining matches the speckled rubber outsole. The "Nike Air Force 1 High Boot NN Dark Smoke Gray" was released on March 1st, 2022, and retailed at $180.

Name: Nike React Boot Undercover Brown
Text:
Created in partnership with the avant-garde fashion brand led by Jun Takahashi, the Nike React Boot Undercover Brown offers a contemporary reimagining of the traditional rubber boot.

The Undercover Brown Nike React Boot offers a rebellious and contemporary take on a classic winter boot. First unveiled during the AW19 'The Droogs' runway presentation, this boot exudes a punk-rock vibe, highlighted by elongated TPU pull tabs, a full-zip closure, and an intricately paneled upper. Taking cues from the 1989 Air Pressure model, it integrates Air pump technology for a comfortable fit and incorporates water-resistant leather uppers with nubuck overlays. The winter-ready React Presto sole unit delivers traction, making it a dependable choice for the colder months.

What we love about the Nike React Boot Undercover Brown is its rebellious and contemporary design, a design that reflects the punk-rock and anti-establishment aesthetic often associated with Undercover. The boot was released on the 30th of November 2019 for $250.

Name: Nike Air Force 1 High Gore-Tex Boot Anthracite
Text:
The Nike Air Force 1 High Gore-Tex Boot Anthracite is a stylish and weather-resistant iteration of the classic Air Force 1 High silhouette, combining the timeless design of the Air Force 1 with the added protection and durability of Gore-Tex technology.

The shoe’s upper is constructed using leather and synthetic materials featuring a fully black colorway with a gum rubber sole. The shoe retains some Air Force 1 high design elements, such as the ankle strap and Air cushioning in the midsole, delivering excellent comfort and impact absorption. Branding details on this shoe include Nike branding on the tongue, Air Force branding on the strap, and Gore-Tex branding on the lateral ankle.

What our experts think is the stand-out feature of the Nike Air Force 1 High Gore-Tex Boot Anthracite is the integration of Gore-Tex technology, known for its waterproof and breathable properties. It was released on October 28, 2020 priced at $180.

Name: Nike Air Force 1 High Gore-Tex Boot Flax
Text:
The Nike Air Force 1 High Gore-Tex Boot Flax is a standalone shoe that was released as part of Nike's Air Force 1 line of sneakers.

The High GTX Boot Flax Nike Air Force 1 features a padded ankle collar and cushioned insole, making it comfortable for extended wear. This shoe features a durable outer layer constructed from a waterproof GORE-TEX material in a Flax colorway that is a mix of Wheat and Gum Light Brown colors. It has a high cut design that provides ample ankle support. The sneaker is equipped with the Air-Sole unit to provide a comfortable and supportive feel with every step. 

Something we love about the Nike Air Force 1 High GTX Boot Flax is its durable waterproof GORE-TEX material, which helps to keep your feet dry in wet weather. The Nike Air Force 1 High Gore-Tex Boot Flax was released on October 28, 2020 at a retail price of $180.

Name: Jordan 9 Retro Boot NRG Military Brown Legion Green
Text:
The physical appearance of the Air Jordan 9 Retro Boot NRG Military Brown Legion Green is determined by four different hues: Military Brown, Legion Green, University Red, and black.

The Air Jordan 9 Retro Boot NRG Military Brown Legion Green showcases a color palette of brown and olive. The boot boasts a suede upper, a tongue with a gusset for added protection, a pull tab on the heel, and distinct Jordan signature elements highlighted in red. It is designed with a water-resistant coating, rope laces, and metal eyelets for durability. Completing the design is the sturdy black outsole of the shoe.

We found the rugged gum rubber outsole of this shoe to be an outstanding feature that makes it convenient for inclement weather. The Air Jordan 9 Retro Boot NRG Military Brown Legion Green was initially launched in the market on  October 13th, 2018, with $225 as the manufacturer’s recommended retail value.

Name: Jordan Spizike 270 Boot Dark Brown
Text:
The upper of the Jordan Spizike 270 Boot Dark Brown showcases an array of Dark Cinder suede overlays strategically positioned across various components. These overlays cover the heel and side panel overlays, padded ankle, toe cap and even extend to the laces and mudguard.

The Jordan Spizike 270 Boot in Dark Brown incorporates a 270-degree Air Max unit, which is a hallmark of the Air Max 270 line. This unit ensures superior cushioning and comfort during wear, making it suitable for various activities. The shoe features a rugged rubber outsole which provides grip and traction but also contributes to the shoe’s durability.

A standout feature of the Jordan Spizike 270 Boot Dark Brown the StockX team appreciates is the Dark Cinder elephant print pattern, which embellishes the toe and heel areas, as well as the heel tab, tongue, lace lock, lateral wings, eyelets and inner sock liner. This iconic print pays homage to the Jordan legacy. The shoe was made available to the public on November 1st, 2020, with a selling price of $190.

Name: Crocs Classic Clog DreamWorks Shrek
Text:
The Crocs Classic Clog took an adventurous turn with the DreamWorks Shrek collaboration, released on September 13, 2023. This iconic footwear got a fairytale twist, boasting details inspired by our favorite ogre.

Coming in a swamp-inspired color scheme, this clog captures the essence of Shrek, merging greens and browns harmoniously. But what truly sets it apart? The toe box showcases the unmistakable Shrek nose and ear details, injecting a playful vibe and bringing out the magic of the animated classic.

What's really cool about this Crocs x Shrek design is the signature comfort of the Classic Clog combined with the enchanting allure of DreamWorks. Whether you're headed on an adventure around town or Far Far Away, these are the perfect fit. The Crocs Classic Clog DreamWorks Shrek collab dropped on September 13, 2023, and was initially priced at a magical $60.

Name: Crocs Classic Clog Naruto Shippuden Kakashi
Text:
The Crocs Classic Clog Naruto Shippuden Kakashi is part of a collaboration between Crocs and Naruto Shippuden, a Japanese manga and anime series created by Masashi Kishimoto.

This slip-on shoe pays tribute to Kakashi Hatake, a ninja and protagonist in the series, through colors and motifs. For example, the clog boasts a green base, which symbolizes Kakashi Hatake’s uniform. Several Jibbitz charms can be found on the upper, including a ninja star, a replica of the ninja’s face, a red rectangle featuring fighting characters, a weapon, and a cat-like mask. Instead of a traditional heel strap, this Croc comes with a padded strap that resembles bomber jacket material. There is also a small pouch, which can be attached to the heel strap with a snap.

Our StockX experts like the enhanced traction on the underside of the shoe, which comes in contrasting navy. The Crocs Classic Clog Naruto Shippuden Kakashi was released on February 27th, 2024, and retailed at $70.

Name: Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Niagara
Text:
The Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Niagara clog features a unique collaboration between Crocs and renowned footwear designer Salehe Bembury. The slide has a unique silhouette that is composed of three of Salehe Bembury’s signature fingerprints combined, available in the Niagara colorway.

The Niagara Salehe Bembury Crocs Pollex Clog showcases a "Niagara" color scheme, drawing inspiration from the Serene Gray tones observed at Niagara Falls. With its distinctive concave ridges, this model offers a breathable design, enhanced by intricate cut-out details, and is completed with the addition of a side strap for added functionality. The neutral color scheme is harmoniously paired with a lightweight foam construction, while the concave ridges serve as a practical water siphoning system. The adjustable heel strap proudly showcases dual branding from both Crocs and Salehe Bembury, featuring embossed logos for a distinctive touch.

What our experts love about Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Niagara is its unique design. This collaboration with Salehe Bembury combines elements inspired by nature with innovative design details to create a unique clog that’s not only visually striking, but also comfortable and practical. The clog debuted for $85 on July 20th, 2023.

Name: Crocs Classic Clog Batman Batmobile
Text:
Step into the iconic world of Gotham City with the Crocs Classic Clog Batmobile. Featuring a playful yet sleek design, these Crocs celebrate one of the most iconic vehicles in cinematic history—the Batmobile. The predominatley black colorway with yellow accents mirrors the mysterious and bold spirit of Batman, and mimics the classic design of the iconic batmobile. While the lightweight, comfortable construction of the Crocs Classic Clog ensures you’re ready for both everyday adventures and heroic missions.

Inspired by the legendary Batmobile, these clogs stand out with their distinct black base complemented by the striking yellow details. Whether you’re a fan of the Batman movies or just looking for a fun, unique addition to your wardrobe, this design allows you to showcase your love for one of the most beloved superheroes, and make a bold style statement.

The Crocs Classic Clog Batmobile, released on September 16, 2024, retailed for $70, offering comfort and flair in one dynamic package. Whether you’re hitting the street or lounging at home, these clogs let you embody the spirit of the Batmobile in style. Black and yellow have never looked so cool!

Name: Crocs Classic Clog SpongeBob SquarePants Patrick Star
Text:
The Crocs Classic Clog SpongeBob SquarePants Patrick Star updates the Crocs silhouette with motifs and colors inspired by the animated starfish from the SpongeBob SquarePants universe.

The upper is made of a lightweight and water-friendly material with ventilation ports that increase breathability. The top of the shoe comes in a light pink that mimics Patrick’s skin tone, while the underfoot area features a pattern that matches his shorts. This Croc includes several Patrick-themed Jibbitz charms, including a model of the character, a coconut, a jar of mayonnaise, and a tube of SPF 45 sunscreen. The adjustable ankle strap displays the quote "is mayonnaise an instrument?" while Patrick’s face graces the interior footbed

Our experts at StockX like the light traction pattern underfoot, which helps the shoe grip the ground. The Crocs Classic Clog SpongeBob SquarePants Patrick Star was released on May 22, 2024, and retailed at $70.

Name: Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Sasquatch
Text:
Since its release, Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Sasquatch remains of the highest-selling variants in the Crocs catalog.

The construction of Pollex Clog mainly utilizes croslite material. These Crocs come in an attractive sasquatch black colorway and feature a heel attached to the optional sport mode for great fitting. The upper part is perforated to enhance its breathability and allow the shedding of water and other particles, such as debris, from inside the Crocs.

The Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Sasquatch was released on September 22, 2022. At the time of the release, its retail price was $85.

Name: Crocs Classic Cozzzy Sandal McDonald's Grimace
Text:
The Crocs Classic Cozzzy Sandal McDonald's Grimace is a collaboration between the ultimate poolside casual slip-on sandal and the world's most famous fast food franchise. 

The McDonald's Grimace iteration of a Classic Crocs Cozzzy Sandal is made entirely of rich purple Croslite, the hallmark material of all Crocs. This polyethylene vinyl acetate that forms the upper, midsole, and outsole creates a shoe that is breathable, cushioning, and water resistant. The upper is open toed with two straps coursing across the forefoot. The lining and insole of this comfortable shoe is made of soft tonal faux fur and features grimace branding. The outsole is black Croslite and features both Crocs branding and a pattern for impact absorption and traction.

What our shoe experts enjoy most about this Croc are the Jibbitz charms that make the shoe distinctive. A characteristic Grimace facial expression adorns the two straps on the left foot and a Grimace and a McDonald's shake adorn the two straps of the right upper. The Crocs Classic Cozzzy Sandal McDonald's Grimace was released on November 14th, 2023, for retail price of $70.

Name: Crocs Classic Clog Naruto Itachi
Text:
The Crocs Classic Clog Naruto Itachi Blue Red pays homage to Itachi Uchiha, a ninja character in the Naruto manga and anime series created by Masashi Kishimoto.

The clog features a dark blue base with cloud-like motifs in red across the upper. It also includes several Jibbitz charms, including a black ninja throwing star and a miniature of the iconic character. Like other Classic Crocs models, this version is made from croslite resin, which is lightweight and durable. Ventilation ports along the sides allow the foot to breathe, while the pivoting heel strap supports a secure fit. A metal tab across the top of the clog displays an emblem associated with Itachi Uchiha.

Our StockX experts like the outsole's traction pattern because it provides grip on various surfaces. The Crocs Classic Clog Naruto Itachi Blue Red was released on June 10, 2024, and retailed for $70.

Name: adidas Yeezy 450 Slide Cream
Text:
Unveiled on August 3, 2023, the adidas Yeezy 450 Slide is the next evolution of the iconic Yeezy line, taking strides into new design territories.

Defying traditional aesthetics, the Yeezy 450 Slide presents an unorthodox, avant-garde silhouette that instantly captures attention. Its meticulously engineered, one-piece design showcases an extraordinary visual dynamic. Crafted for comfort, the slides provide a snug, tailored fit for those who live life on the move.

The adidas Yeezy 450 Slide dares to defy norms and set new trends. This model was released to the world on August 3, 2023, with an attainable retail price of $110.

Name: Nike Air More Uptempo Slide OG Black White
Text:
The Nike Air More Uptempo Slide OG Black White is a slide that borrows design inspiration from the Nike Air More Uptempo sneaker.

The Air More Uptempo Slide OG Black White features black synthetic leather upper with white accents. The slide boosts a full-length foam midsole that provides lightweight cushioning and support. In addition, the foam midsole is designed to absorb impact and improve energy return, ensuring that every step feels comfortable and effortless. The sole has a flexible design that allows for natural movement of the foot and the outsole is made of durable rubber that provides grip and traction on various surfaces.

We think the biggest draw of this shoe is the iconic "AIR" branding on the sides, which pays homage to the classic Nike Air Max design. This bold branding gives this sneaker a unique and unmistakable look. The Nike Air More Uptempo Slide OG Black White was released on April 4th, 2023 at a retail price of $85.

Name: Nike Air Rift Breathe Black (Women's)
Text:
The Nike Air Rift Breathe Black W is a stylish and comfortable athletic shoe featuring a sleek black and cool grey design with white accents.

Women's Black Air Rift Shoes are crafted with breathable materials to ensure maximum comfort during intense workouts or casual wear. It has a black and cool grey color scheme and white accents that add a touch of contrast. Its distinctive split-toe design and hook-and-loop strap details ensure a secure and personalized fit for every step. Emphasizing style and comfort, the shoe features Nike Air cushioning in the heel, providing impact absorption, while the plush foam midsole offers a soft feel.

At StockX, we can't get enough of the shoe’s innovative split-toe design! It's not just a style statement; it optimizes foot flexibility and enhances natural movement, making it a favorite among our experts. Coupled with the hook-and-loop strap details and plush foam midsole, it delivers unparalleled comfort and support. The Nike Air Rift Breath Black W was released on 25th February 2019 and retailed at $100.

Name: Nike Calm Slide Black
Text:
Nike made a bold statement on July 14, 2023, dropping the Calm Slide in the slick Black colorway. A pure embodiment of understated cool, these slides speak volumes to the casual-yet-classy crowd.
​
​Designed with a soft, cushioned footbed, the slides promise unparalleled comfort. The sleek black upper gives off an aura of minimalist sophistication, with the Nike logo subtly debossed onto the outter side of the slide. Versatile and stylish, these slides are ready to accompany you wherever you go.
​
​Be it the beach, the city streets, or your own living room, these slides are all about that casual comfort. Making their bold mark on the world on July 14, 2023, the Nike Calm Slide in Black came with an affordable retail price of $50, proving that you don't need to break the bank for top-tier style.

Name: ASICS ACTIBREEZE 3D Sandal Black
Text: The ASICS ACTIBREEZE 3D Sandal Black is a versatile and comfortable footwear option for those who prioritize both style and functionality. The sandal features a 3D-printed upper that provides a snug fit and breathability, while the EVA midsole offers cushioning and support. The outsole is made of durable rubber, ensuring traction and stability on various surfaces. The black colorway adds a sleek and modern touch to the sandal, making it suitable for both casual and athletic wear. The ASICS ACTIBREEZE 3D Sandal Black was released on July 21, 2022, and is priced at $80. Overall, this sandal is a great choice for those who want a comfortable and stylish option for their summer footwear collection.

Name: Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Kuwata
Text:
The Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Salmon Pink is a collaboration show that became one celebrated addition to the brand´s catalog.

Dressed in salmon pink and red, this Pollex clog features an EVA foam upper with clear-cut concave ridges that resemble a fingerprint pattern. Vent holes appear on high-heat areas like the front, midfoot, and ankles. It also features adjustable velcro straps for fitting. Dark red accents the strap holders and the semi-translucent panels on the heel, forefoot, and medial toe.

The Crocs Pollex Clog by Salehe Bembury Salmon Pink was released on 22nd October 2022, with a retail price of $85.

Name: Nike SB Dunk Low Premium City of Style
Text:
The Nike SB Dunk Low Premium City of Style is a low-top version of the basketball shoe that showcases scenes of nature in its design.

This version of the Nike SB Dunk Low Premium has an upper made of high-quality leather. The background is a light gray color with the illustrations outlined in khaki, Flat Gold, and light brown. On the upper you’ll find illustrations of clouds, trees, and graffitied walls containing "SB" branding. The leather overlays and the Nike Swoosh on both sides also contain these illustrations but are outlined in a Flat Gold color to make them stand out. Nike branding can be found stitched in gold on the back of the heel, and a brown/gold Nike SB patch can be found on the tongue. The white sole is patterned for traction.

What we like most about this shoe is the subtle SB branding that appears in the illustrations and is integrated into the overall design. The Nike SB Dunk Low Premium City of Style was released on April 10, 2024, for a price of $125.

Name: Nike SB Dunk Low Hyper Royal Malachite
Text:
The Nike SB Dunk Low Hyper Royal Malachite is a low-top basketball shoe with a bold and modern design.

This version of the Nike SB Dunk Low is made with a suede upper. The base of the upper is a royal blue color on the sides, the toebox, and around the heel. The toebox is perforated for breathability. White suede overlays line the toebox, laces, and around the heel. The Nike Swoosh appears on both sides in a rich Malachite Green color. The blue tongue also contains a white Nike patch with green text, and the Nike brand name is stitched on the heel in green. The tongue and insole are cushioned for extra comfort, and the sole is made of rubber for traction and grip.

What we like most about this shoe is the bold green and blue color blocking. This design helps the shoe stand out. The Nike SB Dunk Low Hyper Royal Malachite was released on April 24, 2024, for a price of $115.

Name: Nike SB Dunk Low Fog
Text:
The Nike Dunk SB Low Fog is a skateboarding sneaker that slightly resembles the Nike Dunk SB High Fog released in 2005. Designed to provide individuals with the comfort they need while skateboarding, this sneaker features a black suede upper contrasted with a gray leather Nike Swoosh logo on its side and a grey Nike SB branding on its heel. It also features a mesh tongue, black laces, a dark midsole, a black rubber sole, and a gum rubber outsole.

The Nike Dunk SB Low Fog was released in 2021. Originally, it had a retail price of $100.

Name: Nike SB Dunk Low There Skateboards
Text:
The Nike SB Dunk Low There Skateboards is a stylish collaboration between Nike SB and the California based skate brand, There Skateboards. Dressed in a sleek black, gorge green, and summit white colorway, this Dunk captures the essence of skate culture with its clean lines and minimalist approach. The collaboration reflects the shared values of craftsmanship and authenticity, making this release particularly special for fans of both brands.

The Nike SB Dunk has always been a symbol of the intersection between skateboarding and street fashion, and this partnership with There Skateboards underscores that connection. The design includes premium materials like smooth leather and suede, giving the sneaker both durability and a refined edge. Subtle branding details like the There logo on the tongue and insole make this collaboration distinct while maintaining the timeless appeal of the SB Dunk.

Released on August 6, 2024, the Nike SB Dunk Low There Skateboards retailed at $135. The black, gorge green, and summit white colorway offers a versatile yet stylish look that’s perfect for skaters and collectors alike. Whether you’re hitting the pavement or just looking to elevate your style, this Dunk offers the ideal mix of function and fashion.

Name: Nike SB Dunk Low Verdy Visty
Text:
The Nike SB Dunk Low Verdy Visty is a fresh and playful take on the iconic SB Dunk model, brought to life through a collaboration with Japanese artist Verdy. This eye-catching sneaker takes inspiration from Verdy’s character, "VISTY," blending creativity and street style in a standout design. The color palette is a pastel dream, with blue gaze, light arctic pink, and bicycle yellow tones adding a whimsical touch to the classic silhouette.

One of the most unique aspects of the Verdy Visty Dunk is its mix of materials. The fuzzy, hairy texture on the toe box, mid panel, tongue, and heel collar adds dimension and personality to the sneaker, while the pink leather Nike swoosh adds a smooth contrast. The pastel blue corduroy upper rounds out the design, giving the shoe a vintage, yet modern aesthetic. The yellow midsole and matching laces bring an extra pop of color, making this Dunk an instant standout whether you're skating or styling.

Released on September 19, 2024, the Nike SB Dunk Low Verdy Visty retailed at $135. The VISTY character makes a fun appearance on the inside tag and even comes with a special keychain, adding a personal touch to each pair. For those looking to combine fashion, art, and skate culture, this sneaker is the perfect way to express your individuality.

Name: Nike SB Darwin Low Supreme Black
Text:
The Nike SB Darwin Low Supreme Black is a low-top sneaker that’s part of a Spring 2024 collaboration between Nike Skateboarding and Supreme, a streetwear label known for its bold branding and contributions to skater fashion.

Celebrating the 30th anniversary of the Air Darwin from 1994, the Nike SB Darwin Low Supreme Black boasts an all-black construction with splashes of white on the branding details. The Swoosh on the heel, the small "SUPREME" tag on the side panel, the Swoosh on the toe, and the tongue’s logo tag feature white accents. The upper is made of canvas for durability, while the midsole is crafted from lightweight Phylon foam and houses an air unit.

Our experts like that this sneaker pays homage to the Air Darwin, the first sneaker to display a backward Swoosh, by printing a backward Swoosh on the heel. The Nike SB Darwin Low Supreme Black originally hit the market on May 2, 2024, and retailed at $118.

Name: Vans Old Skool Black White
Text:
If you are looking for a staple pair of black and white Vans for your rotation, the Vans Old Skool Black White is a popular choice. It arrives with a low-top black canvas upper with white leather Vans stripe detailing on lateral and medial sides. At the base, a white and gum waffle cup sole with a red, branded heel patch adds the finishing touch.

This model of the Vans Old Skool Black White released in 2017 and retailed for $70.

Name: Vans Classic Slip-On 'Black White'
Text: The Vans Classic Slip-On sneaker is one of the most celebrated silhouettes, originally known as 'Style 98.' The brands' Classic Slip-On was first seen in 1977 and inspired by boat shoes. This version features the classic construction with a durable black canvas upper, padded collars and Vans’ signature gum waffle outsole for durable traction. At the heel, the Vans Off-the-Wall bumper logo provides an unmistakable look.

Name: Nike ZoomX Invincible Run 3 White Cobalt Bliss
Text:
The Nike Invincible Run 3 White Cobalt Bliss updates the Invincible Run silhouette adding even more stability and raising the bar on comfort and cushioning for every stride, all packaged in a sleeker design.

The upper of the White Cobalt Bliss Nike Invincible Run 3 sports a white Flyknit upper with breathability zones placed where your foot heats up the most to provide maximum comfort. A smaller heel clip than on previous Invincible iterations provides structure and support in a more streamlined design. An ice blue mud guard sports a tonal embossed Nike swoosh that matches the one on the heel. A black heel tab compliments a black striped Nike swoosh on the quarter panel and a solid black Nike swoosh on the toe box. This upper gets springy support from a wider midsole composed of cream-colored Zoom X foam that returns energy with every step.

What we appreciate most about this high-octane running shoe is the black rubber outsole interwoven with hits of blue. The lattice pattern allows the foam to expand and react to empower your stride. The Nike Invincible Run 3 White Cobalt Bliss was released on January 5, 2023 for $180 retail.

Name: On Running Cloudmonster All Black
Text:
The On Running Cloudmonster All Black is a high-octane running shoe that has been designed for ultimate comfort and momentum and is dressed in a stealthy colorway of unrelieved black.

The On Running Cloudmonster All Black features a breathable mesh upper that incorporates recycled materials. Black synthetic overlays give the upper style as they support your foot with every step. A red tab with a white cross accompanies Swiss Engineering branding at the lateral heel, while Cloudmonster branding is printed black-on-black across the lateral side panel. The laces, tongue, and insole are also black. The soft black TPU sock liner is durable, lightweight, and resistant to temperature changes. The black rubber outsole enhances impact absorption and provides traction.

What our shoe experts find most impressive about this sneaker is its high-tech sole unit designed for maximum cushioning and forward momentum. The midsole composed of responsive CloudTec cushioning and Helion foam houses a powerful Speedboard underfoot designed to spur energy return in a forward rolling motion. The On Running Cloudmonster All Black was released on March 31, 2022, for a retail price of $170.

Name: Nike Pegasus Trail 3 Gore-Tex Black Dark Smoke Grey
Text:
The Nike Pegasus Trail 3 Gore-Tex Black Dark Smoke Grey is a variation of the Nike Pegasus Trail 3 running shoe.

The Gore-Tex Nike Pegasus Trail 3 has an upper that is made from Gore-Tex. This material provides protection from the elements while remaining breathable, allowing your feet to stay dry and comfortable even on the wettest of trails. The upper also has a durable water-repellent (DWR) finish that further enhances its water-resistant capabilities. The midsole features Nike's React foam cushioning system, which is designed to offer a lightweight and responsive ride.

Our experts say that the standout feature of the Nike Pegasus Trail 3 Gore-Tex Black Dark Smoke Grey is its combination of trail-specific features and waterproof protection from Gore-Tex technology. The shoe also features a multi-directional traction outsole that provides stability and grip on a variety of terrains such as trails, rocky surfaces, and wet grounds. This outsole offers durable traction and has increased surface contact for a more efficient stride. The Nike Pegasus Trail 3 Gore-Tex Black Dark Smoke Grey was released on September 21, 2021 at a retail price of $160.

Name: On Running Cloud 5 Undyed White
Text:
