The On Running Cloud 5 Undyed White is an environmentally conscientious shoe designed to up your running game while increasing comfort with every step.

The Undyed White iteration of the On Running Cloud 5 features a white antimicrobial mesh upper with taped reinforcements at the toe and midfoot. A darker white mesh overlay adorns the side panel, collar and heel, sporting gray OC branding and decorative stitching. A white molded heel construction adds stability and adds to the distinctive aesthetic. The white midsole features CloudTec advancements integrated into Zero-Gravity foam to deliver a lightweight, cushioned landing with every stride. The updated Speedboard underfoot offers propulsion, transforming energy into forward motion as you pound the track, trail, or pavement. A grooved white rubber outsole on the bifurcated sole unit completes the look and functionality of this monochromatic shoe.

The aspect of this sneaker we enjoy the most is the fact that it is sustainably constructed using at least 44% of recycled materials, considering the needs of the planet as it makes every effort to run across it. The On Running Cloud 5 Undyed White released on August 14, 2023 for retail price of $140.

Name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Sea Glass Bright Mandarin
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Sea Glass Bright Mandarin is a performance shoe made with a bright colorway.

This version of the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 is constructed with a Vaporfly textile upper to make the shoe lightweight and breathable. The outer layer is a semi-translucent off-white color, while the holes in it reveal a Bright Mandarin underlayer. The toe cap and mudguard areas appear in black and gray. A large Nike swoosh can be seen on the lateral side in Bright Mandarin, while a smaller swoosh can be found on the inner ankle in a darker orange color. The shoe also features an off-center lacing system and Nike swoosh branding at the bottom and on the tongue. The rubber ZoomX sole is orange under the forefoot and white under the heel. The white part is branding on the lateral side with a black swoosh and the text "MAKE IT A DAILY HABIT."

What stands out about this shoe is the thick orange ZoomX sole on the lateral side, as it adds to the bright colorway. The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly 3 Sea Glass Bright Mandarin was released on December 1, 2023, for $260.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next% 2 EK Eliud Kipchoge Paris 5K
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next 2 EK Eliud Kipchoge Paris 5K is a running shoe designed in collaboration with Kenyan long-distance runner Eliud Kipchoge.

This iteration of the Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next 2 is made with a flexible and lightweight FlyKnit textile upper in white. Stripes of Chile Red run down from the laces to the sole on each side. A black Nike Swoosh appears on both sides of the shoe over this red stripe. The laces are notched for a secure but comfortable fit. The white heel pull tab features a red Nike Swoosh, while the tongue also features branding elements. A thick off-white sole that juts out behind the heel completes the look. There is also a visible red Air Zoom unit under the forefoot.

What we like most about this shoe is the chunky heel, which is designed with modern technology to offer extra comfort and support. The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next 2 EK Eliud Kipchoge Paris 5K was released on August 31, 2023, for a price of $275.

Name: Nike ZoomX StreakFly Hyper Pink Laser Orange
Text:
The Nike ZoomX StreakFly Hyper Pink Laser Orange is a performance sneaker designed with signature ZoomX cushioning.

This version of the Nike ZoomX StreakFly is made with a breathable and flexible knitted mesh upper in Hyper Pink. The color dominates the entire upper, with a black outline of a Nike swoosh found on the lateral side of the heel and another one stretching from the toe box to the heel on the other side. A Laser Orange mudguard stretches from the arch on the inner side around the front of the shoe, ending at the opposite heel. A 5k/10k section also appears in orange and black on the lateral side. The chunky Laser orange sole is made of ZoomX foam and has a ZoomX logo in black, while the Nike Running logo runs up the heel.

What we like most about this shoe is its bold color scheme, which adds eye-catching appeal to the functional sneaker. The Nike ZoomX StreakFly Hyper Pink Laser Orange was released on April 1, 2023, for a retail price of $150.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% 3 Prototype (Women's)
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% 3 Prototype (Women's) is a shoe that rose to fame after being worn by long-distance runner Kelvin Kiptum.

This version of the Nike Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% 3 is made with a lightweight AtomKnit upper in white and a subtle Total Orange. A shiny Nike swoosh appears on the lateral side in orange and black coloring. Zoom Air pods are visible under the forefoot in orange, which adds both style and functionality. Handwritten numbers appear on the lateral side of the white rubber sole and on the inside of the heel. A heel pull tab is branding with Nike Racing, and the tongue also features branding elements.

What we like most about this shoe are the handwritten numbers, which lend the shoe its unfinished prototype look. The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% 3 Prototype (Women's) was released on January 4, 2024, for a price of $285.

Name: Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge
Text:
The Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge is inspired by the shoe this legendary runner was wearing in Rome in 2004 when he broke the 5K world record.

The Eliud Kipchoge Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK features a lightweight, breathable upper composed of white mesh. A thick red stripe courses from the midsole to the eyestays on the side panel, and the tail of the black outlined Nike Swoosh crosses over it. An off-white Zoom X foam midsole offers bounce and energy return in its light, responsive cushioning system. A full-length articulated plate is inserted under foot to deliver a propulsion sensation that provides a smooth transition at different paces. And finally, black rubber pods at the forefoot and heel comprise the durable outsole.

What we find most delightful about this elite running shoe are the personal Eliud Kipchoge touches. One medial midsole sports his motto "No human is limited," and the other features his signature. The Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge was released on August 31, 2023, for $160 retail.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost 20 White Iridescent
Text:
The adidas Ultra Boost 20 White Iridescent is a running shoe from the adidas Ultra Boost 20 lineup in a "White Iridescent" colorway.

This Ultra Boost 20 features a Cloud White Prime Blue knit upper made of at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic. A molded midfoot lace cage with the trademark Three Stripes and a coreless 3D heel frame supports the upper. Other details include the adidas mountain logo on the tongue, white laces, and branded insoles. Underfoot, an Iridescent full-length Boost midsole supported by adidas’ Torsion system rests on a white Continental Rubber outsole.

What our experts particularly love about this Ultra Boost 20 is the design and colorway. The monochromatic color scheme adds a unique and stylish touch to the sneaker, contributing to its overall aesthetic appeal, while the unique design and technologies used add a touch of style and comfort. The adidas Ultra Boost 20 White Iridescent was released on June 7th, 2020, retailing at $180.

Name: On Running Cloudnova White Pearl Brown (Women's)
Text:
The On Running Cloudnova White Pearl Brown (Women's) is a lifestyle and running sneaker with a white and pearl construction and brown details.

The upper is made of a lightweight knit material with a pattern of tiny perforations. The sneaker boasts a CloudTec midsole and a stabilizing TPU heel clip. Another technical feature is the Speedboard, which is a proportion system that helps send the runner forward. The mid-top sneaker has an inner bootie construction that allows for a snug fit. Padding around the collar protects the heel, while a tongue pull tab helps put on and take off the shoe. Finally, brown details can be found on the heel and tongue pull tabs.

Our StockX experts like the lace system, which can be adapted based on the needs of the wearer. The women’s size On Running Cloudnova White Pearl Brown (Women's) was released on May 27th, 2021, and retailed at $160.

Name: Nike ZoomX Invincible Run 3 Year of the Dragon
Text:
With the Nike ZoomX Invincible Run 3 Year of the Dragon, a high-octane running shoe silhouette celebrates the lunar New Year by tweaking iconic Nike design.

The upper of this celebratory shoe is built upon a base of breathable, airy white FlyKnit with white Flywire visible beneath, integrating into the eyestays to help secure midfoot stability. The turquoise FlyKnit tongue and the padded collar help enhance comfort, while a bright orange pull tab at the heel helps facilitate getting these runners on and off. A white synthetic heel counter bolsters rear foot stability and sports Just Do It branding on the lateral side. The wide, high ZoomX midsole in white, turquoise, orange, and pale green extends beyond the heel and offers elite cushioning. The black rubber outsole features lugs, vents, and grooves for flexibility and grip.

Our favorite details are the Nike Swooshes on the lateral side. The primary Nike Swoosh in black is stylized to be reminiscent of a dragon. It’s joined by a miniature embroidered turquoise Swoosh and orange Swoosh on an eyestay tag. The Nike ZoomX Invincible Run 3 Year of the Dragon debuted on February 1, 2024, for $190 retail.

Name: On Cloudmonster 2 POST ARCHIVE FACTION Moondust
Text:
The On Cloudmonster 2 POST ARCHIVE FACTION Moondust is a running shoe presenting in a Moondust colorway that was designed in collaboration by the Swiss-based On brand and the South Korean fashion brand Post Archive Faction.

This is a limited edition sneaker that combines fashion with running shoe tech. The upper of this shoe pulls inspiration from nature, as evidenced by the neutral toned colorway. The moondust colored upper is made of 100% recycled polyester and boasts delicate ventilation. Chalk-colored accents are seen on the tongue, overlays, midsole, and outsole. CloudTec technology is what the upper sits upon, the pods combine with Helion Superfoam to provide power and cushioning.

It is our expert opinion that the Post Archive Faction signature asymmetrical overlays and river-like aesthetic seen throughout the design is a notable feature of this shoe. The On Cloudmonster 2 POST ARCHIVE FACTION Moondust hit the shelves on May 4, 2024, with $240 as the recommended retail price.

Name: Hoka One One Mach 6 Pink Twighlight Lemonade (Women's)
Text:
The Hoka One One Mach 6 Pink Twighlight Lemonade (Women's) is a low-top high-performance running shoe with superior cushioning debuting in a Sweet Pink Twighlight and Lemonade colorway.

Hoka One One’s are known for oversized midsoles that are packed with cushioning and the Mach 6 is no exception. This edition has a super critical foam midsole as part of its low-profile cushion bed. The Hoka One One Mach 6 strives to provide an efficient push and be responsive. There is strategic rubber coverage in the multi-colored speckled outsole. The Pink Twighlight upper is made with a modern creel jacquard material that provides breathability.

The best feature of these shoes has to be the lemonade color that is seen underfoot on the outsole, it blends with the Pink Twighlight and adds to the overall aesthetic. When the Hoka One One Mach 6 Pink Twighlight Lemonade (Women's) originally released August 1, 2023, it had a retail price of $140.

Name: adidas Ultra Boost Light Core Black White
Text:
With adidas Ultra Boost Light Core Black White, adidas is not only providing a more lightweight running shoe, but this silhouette of the Ultra Boost reduces its carbon footprint by 10%.

The upper of this durable, comfortable running shoe is crafted from recycled black Primeknit. A black TPU cage stretches up the midfoot and integrates into the eye stays, providing midfoot support with a more locked-down feel. This cage forms the iconic three stripes on the side panel. A TPU heel counter with tonal embossed branding provides rear foot stability. The thick white midsole is composed of Boost for springy, comfortable landings and takeoffs with each stride. For the outsole, black rubber forms a ring around the forefoot and rear foot.

The standout detail that we enjoy most about this shoe is the black insole imprinted with the silvery white script, "End plastic waste." The adidas Ultra Boost Light Core Black White was released January 28, 2023 for a retail price of $190.

Name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next% Purple (Women's)
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next Purple (Women's) is a performance running shoe inspired by Eugene, Oregon, a town where runners from all over the world compete.

What makes this sneaker stand out is the divided midsole, which features two Zoom Air units in the forefoot and a ZoomX unit that spans the length of the entire shoe. This ZoomX unit gives the midsole its bulky, foam appearance and provides additional cushioning without reducing energy return. The upper is made of Atomknit, a knit material that is lightweight, durable, and conforms to the shape of the foot. The lace closure features notched laces, which secure the shoe without putting too much pressure on the foot.

Our experts like the shoe’s Vivid Purple, black, and white colorway. The women’s size Nike Air Zoom Alphafly Next Purple (Women's) was released on May 21st, 2022, and retailed at $275.

Name: Hoka One One Clifton 9 White
Text:
The Hoka One One Clifton 9 White is a timeless addition to your sneaker collection. The clean white-on-white colorway offers a classic and versatile look that complements any outfit. Known for its exceptional cushioning and support, the Clifton 9 ensures a comfortable and efficient run, making it a staple for both runners and casual wearers.

Incorporating Hoka's advanced cushioning technology, the Clifton 9 provides a responsive and smooth ride, ideal for long runs and everyday use. The breathable mesh upper keeps your feet cool and comfortable, while the extended heel crash pad offers added stability and smooth transitions. This combination of design and functionality makes the Clifton 9 a top choice for those seeking performance and style.

Released on February 21, 2023, the Hoka One One Clifton 9 White retailed at $145. Its all-white colorway and superior comfort make it a versatile and stylish option for any occasion. Elevate your running and casual wear with the Clifton 9, where classic design meets modern performance.

Name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Raptors
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Raptors showcases a color combination of black, purple, and crimson, creating a visually appealing look. The shoe features a lightweight and breathable upper material, allowing for airflow during intense runs.

The Nike ZoomX features contrasting panels and the signature Swoosh logo detail that adorns the sides and outsole. The round toe and front lace-up fastening ensure a secure and customizable fit. The shoe also includes a branded insole for added cushioning and support. With its chunky rubber sole and advanced cushioning technology, the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Raptors provides comfort and energy return to enhance your running performance.

Our team is particularly captivated by the ZoomX foam technology strategically placed in the midsole providing cushioning, stability, and agility, allowing you to conquer your runs with comfort and efficiency. Released on 11th May 2022, the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Raptors took an initial retail price of $250.

Name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Total Orange
Text:
The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Total Orange is a high performance running shoe engineered to provide elite athletes and runners in general with cutting-edge technology for enhanced speed and efficiency during long-distance races.

The shoes have a predominantly orange upper with subtle dark accents highlighting the Nike Swoosh logo. It is made from lightweight and breathable materials to make it as comfortable and efficient for runners. The sole unit is fully white on the midsole with a black and green hue on the outsole. It uses ZoomX foam cushioning which is also lightweight and responsive to improve efficiency and reduce fatigue during extended runs.

What our experts think stands out most on the Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Total Orange is the carbon fiber plate embedded in the midsole. It is designed to enhance energy efficiency and propulsion during running. The shoes were released for retail on 1st September 2022 priced at $250.

Name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 3 Triple Black
Text:
The Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 3 Triple Black is a running sneaker featuring Triple Black’s monochrome aesthetic.

Nike has been at the forefront of sneaker technology since the 1980s, when it introduced Air Max technology. With Nike React technology, the brand utilizes a lightweight yet durable foam for a smooth and responsive wear. The React’s rocker shape and flexibility aid in supporting the three phases of a runner's stride. The black Flyknit upper has an adjustable tongue. Nike Swoosh branding in shiny Black accents the sides. The Black foam midsole has a wide silhouette, accented by an embossed Nike Swoosh, and black laces tie the look together.

In our opinion, the best feature of the React Infinity is its Triple Black color palette, which looks edgy while offering superior technical performance. The Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 3 Triple Black released on March 25, 2022, and retailed at $160.

Name: Hoka One One Bondi 8 Triple Black
Text:
HOKA specializes in creating extra comfortable running sneakers that provide more cushioning than many of the sneakers offered by its competitors. The HOKA One Bondi 8 Triple Black is one of the most cushioned sneakers in the company's entire line-up.

This particular HOKA sneaker has an all-black mesh and polyester upper that makes it lightweight and breathable. It also features everything from a durable pull tab that enables people to put it on with ease to an Ortholite hybrid sockliner that is designed to hold people's feet in place.

But what our experts like best about this HOKA sneaker is the foam midsole that delivers more than enough cushioning. It also has a rear crash pad that aims to cushion the blow to the back of a person's foot with every step they take. The HOKA One Bondi 8 Triple Black was released on September 17, 2022, and it originally retailed for $165.

Name: Hoka One One Clifton 9 Black White
Text:
The Hoka One One Clifton 9 Black White is a versatile and stylish option for runners seeking a blend of performance and aesthetics. This sleek black and white colorway offers a modern, clean look that complements any athletic or casual outfit. The Clifton 9 continues Hoka’s legacy of providing exceptional cushioning and support, ensuring a smooth and comfortable run every time.

Featuring Hoka's signature lightweight foam, the Clifton 9 delivers responsive cushioning that adapts to your stride, making it ideal for both long-distance runs and everyday use. The breathable engineered mesh upper provides optimal airflow, while the extended heel crash pad enhances stability and smooth transitions. These features make the Clifton 9 a reliable choice for runners of all levels.

Released on February 19, 2023, the Hoka One One Clifton 9 Black White retailed at $145. Its classic color combination and innovative design elements ensure that you not only perform at your best but also look great while doing it. Experience the perfect balance of style and performance with the Clifton 9.

Name: Vans LX Old Skool Bape ABC Multi-Camo
Text:
The Vans LX Old Skool Bape ABC Multi-Camo gives the classic Vans Old Skool design a camouflage upgrade with mismatched colors on each shoe. This skateboarding sneaker is part of a collaboration between Vans and Bape – A Bathing Ape, a Japanese streetwear label.

The Bape ABC Multi-Camo Vans LX Old Skool’s minimalist build serves as the perfect canvas to display the bold camo print favored by Bape. The left shoe covers the camo print’s asymmetrical shapes in traditional green on the lateral side and in shades of blue on the medial side. In comparison, the right shoe displays green camo on the medial side and pink on the lateral side panel. Bape’s signature star logo shoots across the side panels and comes in a neutral white.

Our experts at StockX like the midsole, which features a shark tooth design at the front of the shoe. The Vans LX Old Skool Bape ABC Multi-Camo was released on July 27, 2024, and sold for $109.

Name: Vans Knu Skool Navy White
Text:
The Vans Knu Skool Navy White is a skate shoe that takes its design inspiration from the puffy skate style of the 90s.

This version of the Vans Knu Skool is made with a paneled suede upper in navy blue. The toe box, eyestays, and heel counter are all dark-blue suede stitched together with white thread. A lighter shade of blue makes up the sides of the shoes and runs around the top of the heel. The traditional Vans Sidestripe runs in puffy 3D white material across each side, and the extra puffy dark-blue tongue sports a Vans Off The Wall patch. The shoe sits on top of a white rubber midsole and has a heel pull tab for easy on and off.

Our favorite feature of this shoe is the white thread that stitches the panels of suede together on the upper, as it adds some contrast to the dark-blue shades. The Vans Knu Skool Navy White was released on February 18, 2023, for $75.

Name: Vans Knu Stack Black White
Text:
The Vans Knu Stack Black White reimagines the classic Vans silhouette from the 1990s by exaggerating its most notable features and adding a thick platform.

Originally designed for skateboarding, the Black White Vans Knu Stack sits on a platform almost 1.5 inches deep. Like the standard Vans Knu Skool, the platformed version features extra padding in the tongue and collar, giving the sneaker a puffy appearance. The tongue bulges against the white, oversized laces, revealing the red "VANS OFF THE WALL" tag. An additional "VANS OFF THE WALL" logo can be found on the platform. The 3D molded side stripe also embraces the puffy theme and comes in True White. Completing the look, pull tabs attach to the heel, allowing for ease of entry.

Our experts like that the stitching on the black, suede upper comes in True White instead of a tonal hue. It allows the shoe’s heritage construction to stand out as much as the exaggerated elements. The Vans Knu Stack Black White was released on July 3, 2023, and sold for $85.

Name: Vans OG Old Skool LX Gallery Dept. Good Luck
Text: The Vans Old Skool Gallery Dept Good Luck is a limited edition sneaker that combines the classic Old Skool silhouette with unique design elements from the Gallery Dept brand. The upper is made of premium suede and canvas materials in a bold black and white colorway, with Gallery Dept's signature paint splatter detailing throughout. The shoe also features a custom Good Luck embroidery on the heel and a Gallery Dept logo on the tongue. Released on May 19th, 2023, the Vans Old Skool Gallery Dept Good Luck retails for $150. This shoe is a must-have for fans of both Vans and Gallery Dept, as it seamlessly blends the two brands' aesthetics into one eye-catching design. Something we love about Vans Old Skool Gallery Dept Good Luck is the attention to detail in the design, from the paint splatter to the custom embroidery. Our experts think the standout feature of the Vans Old Skool Gallery Dept Good Luck is the unique collaboration between two iconic brands. This shoe is a true collector's item and a statement piece for any sneakerhead's collection.

Name: Vans Authentic Golden Coast
Text: The Vans Authentic Golden Coast Black White is a classic sneaker that has been updated with a fresh colorway. The upper is made of durable canvas, which is both lightweight and breathable. The black and white color scheme is timeless and versatile, making it easy to pair with any outfit. The shoe features the iconic Vans rubber waffle outsole, which provides excellent grip and traction. Released on July 1, 2014, the Vans Authentic Golden Coast Black White has been a popular choice among sneaker enthusiasts. With a retail price of $55, it offers great value for its quality and style. Something we love about Vans Authentic Golden Coast Black White is its simplicity and versatility. It's a shoe that can be dressed up or down, making it a great addition to any wardrobe. Our experts think the standout feature of the Vans Authentic Golden Coast Black White is its timeless design, which has remained popular for decades. Whether you're a fan of skate culture or just looking for a comfortable and stylish sneaker, the Vans Authentic Golden Coast Black White is a great choice.

Name: Vans Sk8-Hi Black White
Text:
The Vans Sk8-Hi Black White is an iconic sneaker from the popular skateboarding brand Vans, featuring its classic black and white colorway, which remains timeless close to fifty years since it was first launched.

The shoe features a high-top design and is constructed with a combination of suede and canvas material with a rubber outsole. The upper has a stitched-up design across the toe box and side panels, and also incorporates the iconic white stripe that runs across the sides of the shoe - making it instantly recognizable. Other design elements on the shoe include the padded collar for added support, while branding details include the ‘Vans Off The Wall’ logo in Striking Red on the tongue and midsole - just under the heel like most shoes on the Vans line.

The Vans Sk8-Hi Black White was first released for retail on January 1, 2019 at the retail price of $65.

Name: Vans LX Sk8-Mid Bape ABC Camo Black Green
Text:
The Vans LX Sk8-Mid Bape ABC Camo Black Green is co-branded BAPE x Vans sneaker, the LX Sk8-Mid model, presenting in a black, green, and white color scheme.

The canvas ABC camo, which is a classic motif of the Bape brand, fills up the side panels. Black suede dons the toe box, forefoot, tongue and heel areas. At the top of the tongue is the same camouflage pattern sporting an embroidered red OFF THE WALL skateboard image. The iconic Vans jazz stripe is featured on the lateral left and medial right sides in white, while a white shooting star STA logo adorns the medial left and lateral right sides of the sneakers, so the pairs are not mirror images of each other. An "ape head" lace lock in silver sits at the bottom of the laces.

We think that this sneaker epitomizes how Vans and Bapejoined to produce a vibrant mid-top skater shoe that seamlessly blends the two brands’ images. The Vans LX Sk8-Mid Bape ABC Camo Black Green colorway released on July 27, 2024, with a $115 price tag.

Name: Vans Old Skool Yacht Club
Text: If you listen carefully enough, you can actually hear Anderson Paak playing everytime a pair of the Vans Old Skool Yacht Clubs are sold on StockX. These quintessential California shoes are nautically flavored, and feature touches of blue, green, red, and yellow throughout the upper, all complemented nicely by crisp white sole units. These are shoes guaranteed to turn heads at any backyard BBQ or boat party in the Summer. These Vans dropped in March of 2018 at a retail price of $70 and are now available to buy or sell on StockX.

Name: Vans Authentic One Piece Nami
Text: The Vans Authentic One Piece Nami is a stylish and comfortable sneaker that is perfect for everyday wear. This shoe features a one-piece upper made from durable canvas material, which provides a snug and secure fit. The Nami design is inspired by the ocean waves, with a blue and white colorway that is both eye-catching and versatile. The Vans Authentic One Piece Nami is set to release on November 11, 2022, with a retail price of $90. This shoe is sure to be a hit with sneaker enthusiasts and Vans fans alike, thanks to its unique design and high-quality construction. One of the standout features of the Vans Authentic One Piece Nami is its one-piece upper, which provides a seamless and comfortable fit. Our experts also love the Nami design, which is both stylish and versatile. Whether you're hitting the streets or the beach, the Vans Authentic One Piece Nami is the perfect choice for any occasion. Overall, we think that the Vans Authentic One Piece Nami is a must-have sneaker for anyone who loves style, comfort, and quality. Something we love about this shoe is its unique design, which is sure to turn heads wherever you go.

Name: Vans Sk8-Hi Horror Pack Nightmare on Elm Street Freddy Krueger
Text:
The Vans Sk8-Hi Horror Pack Nightmare on Elm Street Freddy Krueger is a celebrated athletic sneaker shoe that features a chilling fabric top.

The Horror Pack Vans Sk8-Hi Nightmare on Elm Street released a high-top scary sneaker shoe inspired by Freddy Krueger. The sneakers come in a black, red, and green colorway. Other details include re-established protective covering, protective padded collars, and Vans trademark rubber waffle outer sole.

The Vans Sk8-Hi Horror Pack Nightmare on Elm Street Freddy Krueger was out in the market at the retail price of $80 and was released on the 1st of October 2021.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Comme des Garcons PLAY Black
Text:
Japanese designer Rei Kawakubo is one of the most prolific fashion designers of all time. Aside from her Comme des Garçons collections, she has had numerous sneaker collaborations over the years. One of the most outstanding of these collaborations involves her different iterations of work modifying and styling up the Converse Chuck Taylor with her sub-label Comme des Garçons PLAY. Kawakubo’s first iteration of his Converse Chuck Taylors came about in 2009 when she modified the original by stripping back its contrast stitching. Six years later, in 2015, she took the All Star Chuck 70s as her template and created a shoe so beloved that it has been re-released every year since.

The most immediately recognizable thing in shoes from the Comme des Garçons PLAY line is their heart and eyes logo, originally conceived and created by Filip Pagowski. Unlike the original 2009 version, however, the 2015 version and every version thereafter has moved away from the original minimalist philosophy that inspired Kawakubo to start this line of collaborations. The Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70s Hi Comme des Garçons PLAY harks back to the classic 70s Chuck Taylor style but with a high-top collar that snugly hugs the ankles and a black upper, white laces and a white sole and toe cap.

The Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70s Hi Comme des Garçons PLAY Black was released in March of 2019 and retailed for $125.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Comme des Garcons PLAY White
Text:
With a look inspired by the Converse Chuck Taylors of the ‘70s, the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Hi Comme des Garcons PLAY White has a high-top that blends the collab branding and collaboration. Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Hi Comme des Garcons PLAY White has a white canvas upper with double stitching and shiny metal eyelets. It also features heart icons on the sidewall. The lower part of the shoe mostly features a vulcanized rubber midsole and outsole.

Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70s Hi Commes des Garcons PLAY White was released in January 2019 and retailed at a price of $125.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Ox Comme des Garcons PLAY Black
Text:
Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Ox Comme des Garcons PLAY Black is a model of the iconic collaboration between Comme des Garcons, a Japanese Brand, and Converse. Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Ox Comme des Garcons PLAY Black features a canvas upper. It also features contrasting lace colorways and white seams. On the side, it features the famous red heart and a silhouette that ends on the cream-colored sole.

Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Ox Comme des Garcons PLAY Black was released in July 2017 and had a retail price of $120.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Comme des Garcons PLAY Grey
Text:
A collaboration between Converse and Comme Des Garcons, the PLAY line, birthed the Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70 Hi Comme des Garcons PLAY Grey, a variation of the All-Star Chuck 70 High sneaker model. It is constructed with an upper gray canvas accentuated by an oversized heart and eyes logo in basic black and white on the lateral side.

This high-top shoe sits on an egret-colored rubber midsole, brown finish outsole, and toe box that enhance durability. It retains the signature canvas lace-up closure.

The Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70 Hi Comme des Garcons PLAY Grey was released on June 3, 2021, and retailed for $150.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Black
Text:
The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Hi Black provides a classic design that continues the tradition of perhaps one of the oldest athletic shoes in the history of footwear.

Although the history surrounding Converse began to take shape as early as 1917, the company designed the Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Hi Black and similar models decades later as part of a tribute to the original shoe. The newer silhouette maintains many of the aesthetic aspects of its predecessor, but some of the fittings and materials have been updated as a way to make a robust shoe that Converse fans and footwear enthusiasts might be able to wear for decades to come. The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Hi Black includes a premium canvas upper that is double-ply for extra strength and durability while the stitching near the toe is reinforced but designed to keep the classic look of the original. Converse added some extra padding to the insole in an effort to provide collectors or wearers with additional arch support and more cushioning for comfort.

The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Hi Black released in January 2018 for $85.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Ox Comme des Garcons PLAY Multi-Heart Milk
Text:
The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Ox Comme des Garcons PLAY Multi-Heart Milk is the collaboration between a classic sneaker silhouette and one line of the Paris-based Japanese fashion label.

The Converse x Comme des Garcons PLAY Chuck 70 Multi-Heart sneaker in a Milk colorway features a creamy off-white canvas upper that is both durable and lightweight. A tonal rubber toecap provides support and signature style. The lace closure enhances a snug fit and the off-white insole sports dual branding. The heel is adorned with the signature Converse heelstay in black and a tonal embossed rubber license plate on the off-white rubber vulcanized midsole. The brown rubber outsole sports grooves for dependable traction.

The standout feature of this sneaker that we love the most is the line of black peeping heart PLAY logos running across the side panels. The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Ox Comme des Garcons PLAY Multi-Heart Milk was released on October 26th, 2023, for a retail price of $150.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Off-White
Text:
PLEASE NOTE: US and UK sizing is the same for Converse All-Stars. Converse and Virgil Abloh’s Off-White teamed up once again to re-release the Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70s Hi Off-White. This canvas model served as a follow-up to Abloh’s first Converse collaboration that was part of the "The Ten" collection.

While the all-white canvas upper of the Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70s Hi Off-White draws similarities to classic non-collaborative colorways, there are many points of differentiation. To start, the black and white caution tape-themed midsole nods to one of Off-White’s key design motifs. Next, "Off-White™ for CONVERSE ‘CHUCK TAYLOR ALL-STAR’ Malden, Massachusetts USA c. 1917" is screen printed on the inside medial panel of the upper. To round out this Off-White Chuck Taylor, a modified star patch appears on the ankle and a signature orange zip-tie is hooked to the laces.

The Converse Chuck Taylor All-Star 70s Hi Off-White originally released in October of 2018, and restocked in April of 2021, at a retail of $130.

Name: Converse Run Star Motion Black White Gum
Text:
The Converse Run Star Motion Black White Gum is a sneaker from the Converse Run Star Motion pack in a Black/White/Gum colorway.

This high-top sneaker features a black canvas upper with a reinforced toe cap. Other upper details include the circle All-Star logo patch on the medial ankle, a CX foam insole, White stitching, branded tongue, a heel pull tab, silver metallic eyelets, and white Laces. The highlight of this sneaker is a chunky and wavy sole unit made up of a lightweight Phylon midsole dressed in white and lugged outsole with gum on the forefoot and black rubber at the heel.

The Converse Run Star Motion Black White Gum was released on June 16, 2021 - retailing at $120.

Name: Converse TURBOWPN Mid Rick Owens DRKSHDW Black Cloud Cream
Text: The Converse TURBOWPN Mid Rick Owens DRKSHDW Black White is a sleek and stylish sneaker that combines the iconic Converse silhouette with the avant-garde design of Rick Owens. The shoe features a black and white colorway, with a premium leather upper and a chunky rubber sole for added durability and comfort. Released on January 10th, 2023, the Converse TURBOWPN Mid Rick Owens DRKSHDW Black White is a highly sought-after sneaker that is sure to turn heads. With a retail price of $200, this shoe is a must-have for any sneaker enthusiast or fashion-forward individual. One of the standout features of the Converse TURBOWPN Mid Rick Owens DRKSHDW Black White is its unique design, which combines the classic Converse look with Rick Owens' signature style. The shoe is also made with high-quality materials, ensuring that it will last for years to come. Something we love about the Converse TURBOWPN Mid Rick Owens DRKSHDW Black White is its ability to seamlessly blend classic and contemporary design elements. Our experts think that the premium leather upper and chunky rubber sole are the best features of this shoe, as they provide both style and comfort. Overall, we love the Converse TURBOWPN Mid Rick Owens DRKSHDW Black White for its unique design and high-quality construction.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Vintage Canvas Squirrel Friend Brown
Text:
The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Vintage Canvas Squirrel Friend Brown takes a classic silhouette and fuses heritage detail with updated durability and comfort.

The Squirrel Friend Brown Canvas iteration of the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Vintage High-Top features an upper constructed of durable brown canvas that recalls the classic look and feel from the Chuck 70. Ornate egret-colored stitching across the upper matches the flat cotton laces that thread through silver metal eyelets. The egret rubber toe cap sports a brown outline. The medial side collar features the Converse All Star circular patch, set above two perforations with metal eyelets. A vintage All-Star license plate adorns the heel.

The aspect of this shoe we most appreciate is the sole unit that reflects updates to a heritage style. OrthoLite cushioning offers supreme comfort, while the egret midsole and higher rubber sidewall hearken back to the classic Chuck Taylor design. The dark brown rubber outsole that matches the stripe along the sidewall features a classic Converse traction pattern. The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Vintage Canvas Squirrel Friend Brown debuted on January 30, 2023, for $90 retail.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Black
Text: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Black is a classic sneaker that has been a staple in the fashion world for decades. This shoe features a black canvas upper with white stitching and a white rubber sole. The high-top design provides ankle support and a timeless look that never goes out of style. The materials used in the construction of this shoe are high-quality and durable, ensuring that they will last for years to come. The canvas upper is breathable and comfortable, while the rubber sole provides excellent traction and grip. Released on September 24, 2011, the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Black has been a fan favorite ever since. With a retail price of $60, this shoe is an affordable option for anyone looking for a classic sneaker that will never go out of style. Something we love about the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Black is its versatility. This shoe can be dressed up or down, making it the perfect addition to any wardrobe. Our experts think that the standout feature of this shoe is its timeless design, which has remained popular for decades. Overall, we love the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Black for its durability, comfort, and classic style.

Name: Converse Geo Forma Boot A-COLD-WALL Lily White
Text:
The Converse Geo Forma Boot A COLD WALL Lily White is a collaborative design that became a celebrated addition to the brand's catalog.

It features a stretch bootie upper construction alongside a lugged outsole for traction. The entire shoe is in colored in a lily white hue on the upper and the sole. Besides its boot construction, the sneaker boasts a zip-up shroud and elevated, lugged outsole. At the collar, this Geo Converse pair has a TPU fuse with "A COLD WALL" printed in a styled typographic. Its heel stays and sock liners features Counter Climate branding.

The Converse Geo Forma Boot A COLD WALL Lily White was released on December 22nd, 2022, at a retail price of $150.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Stussy 8-Ball
Text: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Stussy 8 Ball is a collaboration between two iconic brands, Converse and Stussy. This sneaker features a black canvas upper with an all-over 8 ball print, giving it a unique and playful look. The classic Chuck Taylor silhouette is updated with Stussy branding on the heel and tongue, as well as a translucent outsole with Stussy's signature logo. Crafted with premium materials, the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Stussy 8 Ball is built to last. The canvas upper is durable and breathable, while the rubber outsole provides excellent traction and grip. The high-top design offers ankle support and a comfortable fit. This sneaker is set to release on November 5th, 2022, with a retail price of $110. It's a must-have for sneakerheads and fans of both Converse and Stussy. Something we love about the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Stussy 8 Ball is the playful and unique design that sets it apart from other Chuck Taylor sneakers. Our experts think the standout feature of this sneaker is the all-over 8 ball print, which adds a fun and unexpected element to the classic silhouette. What we love about the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Stussy 8 Ball is that it's a collaboration between two iconic brands, resulting in a sneaker that's both stylish and well-made.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi A-COLD-WALL Silver Birch
Text:
The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Hi A-COLD-WALL Silver Birch is a limited-edition sneaker that was created in collaboration with the British fashion designer Samuel Ross. This sneaker features a Silver Birch colorway with Pavement accents.

The upper of the Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi A-COLD-WALL Silver Birch is made from canvas while the toe cap is made from rubber. The Converse plate is present on the back of the heel and the interior is lined with a breathable canvas material, which ensures comfort while wearing. The high-top silhouette offers added ankle support.

What sets the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70s Hi A-COLD-WALL Silver Birch apart from its predecessors is its unique speckled sole. The sole is made from a translucent material with a marbled texture that perfectly complements the Silver Birch colorway. The shoe was released on October 6th, 2022, at a retail price of $110.

Name: Come Tees x Converse Chuck 70 High 'Realms and Realities'
Text: Dropping as part of a capsule collection with the LA-based fashion label, the Come Tees x Converse Chuck 70 High ‘Realms and Realities’ features unique imagery intended to convey a stream-of-consciousness approach to design. A different digitally-printed graphic is applied to every panel of the 12oz canvas upper, including multicolor graffiti-like text and a black and orange tiger print. ‘Come Tees’ and ‘Realms and Realities’ are inscribed on the heel of the left and right shoe, respectively. Underfoot, the black and grey rubber outsole is updated with a unique ‘shatter’ graphic.

Name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Golf le Fleur Flame Paprika
Text:
The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Golf le Fleur Flame Paprika is part of a collaboration between Converse and Golf Wang, a Los Angeles-based streetwear label founded by Tyler, the Creator.

This high-top sneaker boasts a vibrant colorway of Paprika, Egret, and Salmon Rose with an abstract flame print. Set against a canvas background in Paprika, each flame comes in Salmon Rose and is outlined with blue and bright red. A set of three lines on the midsole tonally match the flame decals. Like other Converse models, this version features prominent Converse All Star branding on the heel. The choice of Egret, an off-white color, on the laces and midsole grounds the sneaker and allows the bold pattern to stand out.

Our experts at StockX like the Paprika color on the bumper stamp. The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Hi Golf le Fleur Flame Paprika was released on September 21st, 2023, and retailed at $100.

Name: Jordan 11 Retro Legend Blue (2024)
Text:
The Jordan 11 Retro Legend Blue (2024), also known as the Columbia 11s, is easily one of the most well known and beloved colorways of the Jordan 11 ever produced. Dating back to 1996, this sneaker has only retro'd twice since then, with the latest version being 10 years ago in 2014.

The Legend Blue 11s feature an all white upper with white laces and an icy blue sole. The Jumpman logo pops in a Legend Blue accent as the finishing touch on this clean colorway. Jordan was famously spotted wearing these for the first time in the 1996 All-Star game, donning the now-iconic teal blue jerseys as the East defeated the West in San Antonio by a score of 129 to 118, in which Jordan was the game's MVP.

The Jordan 11 Retro Legend Blue (2024) released on December 14th, 2024, for a retail price of $230. Our experts love this sneaker due to its storied history and infrequent retro releases, making this sneaker likely to be ever-more collectible as the years go on.

Name: Jordan Jumpman Jack TR Travis Scott Dark Mocha
Text:
The Air Jordan Jumpman Jack TR Travis Scott Dark Mocha is the third colorway of Travis Scott's signature sneaker model, the Jumpman Jack.

This Dark Mocha colorway features and all black and brown design with a velcro tongue flap, reverse swoosh branding, and the Air Jordan logo on the tongue. The underside of the sneaker also showcases unique Cactus Jack branding. This colorway is by far the most neutral and muted colorway of the Jumpman Jack so far, making it a versatile sneaker for many different occasion. As Travis Scott continues to ascend to new heights, his sneakers and surely set to become as hot as ever.

The Air Jordan Jumpman Jack TR Travis Scott Dark Mocha released on November 26th, 2024, for a retail price of $200. We love this sneaker due to it's iconic Cactus Jack branding and recognizable style in the world of sneakers.

Name: Nike Air Tech Challenge II Hot Lava (2024)
Text:
The Nike Air Tech Challenge II Hot Lava (2024) is a re-release of one of the most iconic tennis shoes ever made. Originally debuting in the late 1980s, the Air Tech Challenge II took the courts by storm with its bold design and revolutionary features. Worn by tennis legend Andre Agassi, this sneaker broke barriers in both performance and style, influencing not just the tennis world but also pop culture. The hot lava colorway, with its fiery accents, became an instant classic and remains relevant today as a bold statement piece.

Featuring a mix of phantom, hot lava, black, silver, and pale ivory, this re-release stays true to the original design while offering slight updates for modern comfort. The vibrant hot lava detailing is the shoe’s standout feature, while the durable leather construction and Air cushioning ensure lasting support on and off the court. Whether you're hitting tennis balls or making a statement on the street, the Nike Air Tech Challenge II Hot Lava continues to turn heads with its timeless appeal.

Released on August 30, 2024, the Nike Air Tech Challenge II Hot Lava (2024) retailed for $150. This iconic sneaker remains a must-have for fans of retro tennis style and those who appreciate its cultural influence and bold design.

Name: ASICS Gel-NYC Cream Mineral Beige Pink
Text:
The ASICS Gel-NYC Cream Mineral Beige Pink is a technical running shoe that finds inspiration in heritage and contemporary ASICS models, including the Gel-Nimbus 3 from the 2000s and the Gel-MC Plus V.

The upper construction of the Cream Mineral Beige Pink ASICS Gel-NYC features breathable mesh with a medium-sized weave in cream and a grid of suede and leather overlays in Mineral Beige and metallic silver across the side panels. Although the upper takes elements from the Gel-Nimbus 3, the midsole combines advanced underfoot technology from the Gel-Cumulus 16. The use of gel inserts in the rear and forefoot as well as a combination of foams creates a responsive feel and protects against impact stress.

Something our experts at StockX love is the pink suede panels that form the mudguard and adorn the toecap area. They complement the pink detailing on the midsole and add a contemporary touch to the sneaker’s retro construction. The ASICS Gel-NYC Cream Mineral Beige Pink was released on May 1, 2024, and retailed at $130.

Name: Nike Air Max 1 Patta 20th Anniversary Chlorophyll
Text:
Celebrate 20 years of Patta with the Nike Air Max 1 Patta 20th Anniversary Chlorophyll, which released in 2024 and pays homage to the 5th anniversary model which released in 2009.

This sneaker features a grey, white, and green upper with a white midsole. This sneaker is highly coveted by sneakerheads due to it's similarly to the 5th anniversary model that released in 2009, that has similar color blocking. The Patta and Air Max branding can be seen on the tongue in white and green stitching. We love this sneaker due to its bold colors and OG references, making for a classic sneaker that you truly cannot go wrong with.

The Nike Air Max 1 Patta 20th Anniversary Chlorophyll released on September 13th, 2024, for a retail price of $160.

Name: adidas SL 72 OG Maroon Preloved Brown (Women's)
Text:
The adidas SL 72 OG Maroon Preloved Brown (Women’s) is a slim sneaker whose design has become a classic since the release of the first version in 1972.

This iteration of the adidas SL 72 OG comes with a suede and textile upper. The base is a dark brown shade with lighter brown suede overlays rounding out the toebox, coming up from the toe under the laces, under the midsole, and around the heel. The three stripes logo appears on the midsoles in a beige color. There is a gold adidas logo stamped onto the brown heel collar, while the tongue also bears a logo patch. The slim rubber outsole also has the adidas logo embossed onto it.

Our favorite feature of this shoe is the slim build. This gives the shoe a retro and classic look. The adidas SL 72 OG Maroon Preloved Brown (Women’s) was first released on March 28, 2024, for a retail price of $100.

Name: UGG Lowmel Black (Women's)
Text:
Crafted using recycled materials, the UGG Lowmel Black (Women's) is a comfortable sneaker designed to feel good, body and sole. This shoe is specifically designed for women.

The upper of the Black (Women's) UGG Lowmel, built for comfort, is fashioned from black suede with recycled ballistic canvas mesh at the toe box and padded collar. A padded, oversized tongue and a black webbing pull tab at the heel to ease on/off are also black. Thick plaid laces made from recycled polyester fibers are meant to be worn loose and open. Tonal UGG branding is embossed on the tongue and lateral heel. The molded EVA footbed is supported under foot by a sugarcane EVA outsole with a starburst pattern for absorbing impact and providing grip.

Our favorite aspect of this women’s sneaker is the UGG plush upcycled wool sock liner and the Lyocell insole that envelope your foot in yet another layer of comfort. The UGG Lowmel Black (Women's) was released on August 1, 2023, for $150 retail.

Name: New Balance 9060 Mushroom Timberwolf
Text:
The New Balance 9060 Mushroom Timberwolf puts a futuristic spin on classic New Balance designs, including the 99X, the 991, and the 860.

The Mushroom Timberwolf colorway of the New Balance 960 sports an upper of lightweight and breathable white mesh with pig suede overlays in complementary shades of gray, tan, and brown. The classic side panel N logo is constructed from pale embroidered dashed lines that match the cream-colored shoelaces. The heel features a semi-translucent CR device as well as NB branding. The sock liner is cream-colored and the black insole and gray tongue each sport New Balance branding. The outsole is black rubber with a red diamond traction pattern.

What we love most about this sneaker is the high-performance sole unit. The midsole is constructed of ABZORB in an exaggerated wavy pattern with ABZORB SBS in the heel for cushioning and impact absorption. The New Balance 9060 Mushroom Timberwolf was released on September 22, 2023, for a retail price of $150.

Name: ASICS Gel-NYC Ivory Clay Grey
Text:
The ASICS Gel-NYC Ivory Clay Grey takes its inspiration from the ASICS GEL-NIMBUS 3 and the MC-PLUS V and fuses it with tooling from the GEL-CUMULUS 16.

The Ivory Clay Grey iteration of the ASICS Gel-NYC has an upper with a base of breathable ivory mesh. This is overlaid with undulating strips of silver, grey, and black leather and synthetics that lend the shoe style and support. GEL branding is embroidered on the ivory mesh window in the center of the heel, while ASICS branding appears on a grey lateral overlay, the grey mesh tongue, and the black insoles.

Our experts really enjoy the sole unit of this ASICS sneaker. The lightweight ivory foam midsole incorporates GEL technology with inserts in the rear and forefeet. The black rubber outsole is arranged in large pods, grooved for traction and impact absorption. The ASICS Gel-NYC Ivory Clay Grey was released on July 1, 2023, for a $130 retail price.

Name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG University Blue
Text:
Jordan Brand paid homage to MJ’s alma mater with the Air Jordan 1 High University Blue. The University Blue colorway is prominent in the Jordan 1’s history. The first UNC-inspired Jordan 1 dates back to 1985 when the Jordan 1 debuted. Since then, there have been numerous iterations of the UNC 1, most recently the Jordan 1 Retro High Fearless UNC To Chicago. Jumpman is building off of its past and switching it up this week with a new iteration.

The upper of the Air Jordan 1 High University Blue is composed of a white and black tumbled leather upper with University Blue Durabuck overlays. Following traditional Jordan 1 detailing, a Nike Air woven label is located on the tongue and an Air Jordan Wings Logo is printed on the ankle. A white midsole and University Blue outsole complete rejuvenated classic.

The Air Jordan 1 High University Blue released in March of 2021 and retailed for $170.

Name: Nike Air Max 97 Triple White Wolf Grey
Text: This Nike Air Max 97 "OG" edition comes in a white, wolf grey and black colorway. Made to commemorate the 30th Anniversary of the classic Air Max silhouette. This pair sports a clean all-white upper and sole with the only hits of color coming from the grey branding. They were one of three colorways that dropped alongside each other. The release date was August 1st, 2017 where they retailed for $160 in men's sizes. This Nike Air Max 97 "OG" re-released in May of 2023. Fans of the Air Max 97 were very pleased with this colorway and it quickly became a must-have. Perfect for everyday use, you can never go wrong with an a white pair of kicks. If you're in need of a pair, hit up the marketplace to buy them. Those looking to sell can do so online today.

Name: Jordan 6 Retro Olympic (2024)
Text:
Originally released in 2000, then retro'd again in 2012, the Jordan 6 Retro Olympic (2024) is a classic colorway of a fan-favorite silhouette. Released during the Paris Olympics, the sneaker's colorway pays homage to the red, white, and blue of the United States.

Debuting in 1991, the Jordan 6 has donned many iconic colorways, but the Olympic color is perhaps once of the most desired and recognizable. This 2024 release marks the 3rd time this sneaker has released, which has come only once every 12 years (2000, 2012, and 2024). The white upper with midnight navy accepts and varsity red touches bring this classic style to life.

The Jordan 6 Retro Olympic (2024) released on August 3rd, 2024, for a retail price of $200. Lock in this OG classic today on StockX.

Name: Jordan 4 RM SP Nigel Sylvester Driveway Grey
Text:
The Jordan 4 RM SP Nigel Sylvester Driveway Grey reinvents the classic Jordan Brand silhouette through BMX athlete Nigel Sylvester’s creative lens.

Anthracite-colored suede dominates the upper, while tonal TPU side panels with molded eyelets connect to the front lace system. Thin anthracite laces wind through the eyelets and keep the lightly padded tongue in place. Inspired by the original Air Jordan 4, the polyurethane midsole houses a visible air sole unit in the heel, which provides springy cushioning. "BIKE AIR" branding and a Swoosh logo in white decorate the heel near a small black Jumpman logo.

Our experts at StockX like the tiny Swoosh logo in University Red on the suede mudguard. It provides a pop of color against the dark upper and complements the University Red in the Air sole unit. The Jordan 4 RM SP Nigel Sylvester Driveway Grey was released on August 8, 2024, and sold for $160.

Name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 'Wave Runner' 2017
Text: This inaugural colorway of Kanye West’s Yeezy Wave Runner 700 launched in November 2017, following a public debut earlier in the year as part of the Yeezy Season 5 runway show. The sneaker’s retro-inspired lines worked in tandem with a chunky silhouette reminiscent of an earlier era. A mesh base is finished in grey on the quarter panels and bright blue and teal on the forefoot. Suede overlays arrive on the toe and heel accented grey leather eyestays. Other details include neon green laces, a bulky white midsole, and pops of black and bright orange.

Name: ASICS GEL-Kayano 14 Cream Sweet Pink
Text:
The ASICS GEL-Kayano 14 Cream Sweet Pink is a technical running sneaker boasting metallic silver and Sweet Pink accents.

While the Cream Sweet Pink ASICS GEL-Kayano 14’s mesh construction, including the web of faux-leather overlays and mesh underlays, pays homage to GEL-Kayano models from the early 2000s, the use of shiny metallic silver gives the sneaker a futuristic upgrade. In addition, Sweet Pink accents add pops of color on the midsole pods, the ASICS branding, and the rubber outsole. Toshikazu Kayano didn’t design this version of the GEL-Kayano; however, the shoe still maintains its iconic layered construction and GEL technology underfoot. This cushioning system provides advanced shock absorption without weighing down the foot.

Our experts at StockX appreciate the sneaker’s sustainable features, including the sockliner, which is crafted using a dyeing process that reduces water consumption by 33 percent and carbon emissions by 45 percent. The ASICS GEL-Kayano 14 Cream Sweet Pink was released on May 1, 2024, and retailed at $150.

Name: Jordan 6 Retro Reverse Oreo
Text:
The Jordan 6 Retro Reverse Oreo reimagines the iconic "Oreo" colorway from 1999 and applies it to the Air Jordan 6 Retro silhouette.

As the name implies, in the "Reserve Oreo" colorway, the white and black tones are swapped. The upper is made from premium, tumbled leather in white and features overlays and reinforced stitching in the same color. Signature perforations along the quarter panels and ankle allow the foot to breathe and add design details that complement the heel tab and midsole speckles. This speckled pattern features a black background with white dots. They provide the other half of the "Reverse Oreo" colorway: black graces the Jumpman logo, the long tongue, and the collar lining.

Our StockX experts like the rubber outsole, which features semi-translucent and black details, as well as a white Jumpman logo. The Jordan 6 Retro reverse Oreo was released on June 8, 2024, and retailed at $200.

Name: Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Designed by Japan (Women's)
Text:
The Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Designed by Japan (Women's) is a layered multicolored sneaker that finds inspiration in the "Moon Shoe" designed by Nike co-founder Bill Bowerman. Although the sneaker boasts a variety of colors, most of the tones are neutral or earthy, which prevents the hues from clashing.

The base comes in Pale Ivory with full-grain leather, soft suede, synthetic, plastic, and mesh details across the upper. The suede overlays in Pale Ivory are thin and create a web-like pattern. Black leather Swooshes reach across the side panels and complement the black on the rubber outsole. However, the outsole also features Light Bone, Aquarius Blue, and Orange-brown hues. The traction pattern pays homage to the waffle sole found on the "Moon Shoe."

Our StockX experts like the addition of layered Aquarius Blue, Light Bone, and White on the bulky midsole. The Nike Zoom Vomero 5 Designed by Japan (Women's) was released on May 10, 2024, and retailed at $180.

Name: adidas Sambae Hello Kitty (Women's)
Text:
The adidas Sambae Hello Kitty (Women's) pays homage to the iconic cat character created by Yuko Shimizu for Sanrio through Hello Kitty-themed details and colors.

The white, calf leather upper of the Hello Kitty (Women's) adidas Sambae features embroidered outlines of Hello Kitty in white thread, including the character’s signature bow and cat ears. In addition, the right shoe displays a metal lace jewel with Hello Kitty’s face, while the left shoe features a big, plastic bow in red at the top of the lace closure system. Hello Kitty details and the adidas trefoil grace the white insole, while the signature gum rubber outsole comes in Clear Pink and the flat, leather tongue reveals adidas branding.

Our experts at StockX like the use of black on the 3-Stripes logos, the heel tab, and the tongue’s adidas branding because it matches the color used to outline Hello Kitty. The women’s size adidas Sambae Hello Kitty (Women's) was released on June 14, 2024, and retailed at $115.

Name: New Balance 1906R Silver Classic Crimson
Text:
The New Balance 1906R Silver Classic Crimson is a colorway of the 2000s-inspired running shoe containing cushioning technology.

This version of the New Balance 1906R is made with a lightweight white upper. Synthetic overlays in silver with Classic Crimson accents cross the entire upper, from the toebox to the laces, across the midsole, and back to the heel. The midsole also features a black mesh panel. The New Balance N appears on both sides of the shoe in crimson, white, and silver with N-Lock branding in the middle. The heel is supported by a silver TPU cage that has an NB logo on it, and three red stripes are found above it. The tongue also sports a logo patch.

What we like most about this shoe is the ACTEVA LITE, N-ergy, and ABZORB cushioning in the midsole, sole, and outsole that all work together to make this shoe extra comfortable. The New Balance 1906R Silver Classic Crimson was released on November 16, 2023, for a price of $155.

Name: ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Metropolis Jasper Green
Text:
The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Metropolis Jasper Green draws elements from heritage models to create a technical sneaker with shiny metallic-silver accents and splashes of bright Jasper Green.

The mesh construction of the Metropolis Jasper Green ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 comes in Metropolis, a dark-gray hue that serves as a subtle backdrop for the leather overlays in metallic silver. Hits of Jasper Green cover the branding details on the mesh tongue and heel and add pops of color on the otherwise white midsole. Gel technology in the heel provides responsive cushioning, while the Trusstic system in the arch increases stability and reduces twisting motions. Finally, the sock liner was made using a dyeing method that reduces water consumption by up to 33 percent.

Our experts at StockX like that even though this version of the Gel-Kayano wasn’t designed by Toshikazu Kayano, it retains design elements drawn from the early 2000s. The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Metropolis Jasper Green was released on June 3, 2024, and sold for $150.

Name: Nike Air Force 1 Low Linen (2016/2024)
Text:
The Nike Air Force 1 Low Linen is a special edition sneaker that was released exclusively for the Japan market back in 2001 and then re-released in 2016 to celebrate the opening of Kith's Miami store. They were re-released on a wider scale in 2024.

The shoe features a light brown (linen) colorway with atmosphere pink and true white accents. Atmosphere pink is seen on the Swoosh and outsole while true white appears on the laces and midsole. The shoe maintains the Air Force 1 signature design with the stitching around the midsole and placement of panels on the upper and sides.

What we love about the Nike Air Force 1 Low Linen (2016/2024) is the thick sole unit which incorporates Air units to deliver responsive cushioning across the whole underfoot. This helps to improve comfort especially when wearing the shoes for an extended period. The shoes were released for a retail price of $120 on December 1st, 2016. The Nike Air Force 1 Low Linen (2016/2024) was re-released for a retail price of $135 on June 13th, 2024.

Name: Nike Air Force 1 Low G-Dragon Peaceminusone Para-Noise 3.0
Text:
Introducing the Nike Air Force 1 Low G-Dragon Peaceminusone Para-Noise 3.0, the third installment in the highly coveted collaboration between Nike and South Korean artist G-Dragon utilizing the Air Force 1 base. This special edition features a black leather upper that wears away over time to reveal hidden artwork by G-Dragon, adding a personal, creative touch to every pair. The sneaker showcases contrasting swooshes in yellow, pink, and blue, with a signature sunflower logo on the tongue and custom graphics on the insoles, giving this sneaker a vibrant and artistic vibe.

In keeping with the Air Force 1’s legendary status in both basketball and streetwear, the Para-Noise 3.0 incorporates G-Dragon’s unique artistic flair with features like brushstrokes along the midsole, custom pins, and a special-edition box. Since its debut in 1982, the Air Force 1 has evolved into one of the most iconic sneakers in Nike’s lineup, and this collaboration adds yet another layer of creativity to its storied history.

Released on September 14, 2024, the Nike Air Force 1 Low G-Dragon Peaceminusone Para-Noise 3.0 retailed at $200. The black, new emerald, pinkfire, tour yellow, and blue gale colorway, paired with G-Dragon’s signature artwork, makes this release a statement piece for both sneakerheads and art enthusiasts alike. This collaboration continues to redefine what a sneaker can be—a canvas for both fashion and expression.

Name: Jordan 1 Retro Low OG Shadow (2024)
Text:
The Jordan 1 Retro Low OG Shadow (2024) is a low-top sneaker with a colorway that is reminiscent of the original 1985 version of the shoe.

This iteration of the Jordan 1 Retro Low OG is completely made of leather. The upper is gray and black, with gray coloring the perforated toebox and the heel, while reflective black adorns the midsole, the lining of the toebox, and the overlays. The Nike Swoosh also appears in gray across the midsole. The Air Jordan logo appears in black on the gray heel tab, and a Nike Air patch can be found on the tongue. The mesh tongue and lining allow for breathability and extra comfort, while the sole is patterned for traction.

Our favorite thing about this shoe is the simple colorway with shiny black leather. It gives the shoe a sleek and stylish look. The Jordan 1 Retro Low OG Shadow (2024) was released on May 11, 2024, for a retail price of $140.

Name: New Balance 1906R White Metallic Gold
Text:
The New Balance 1906R White Metallic Gold comes in a metallic silver and metallic gold color scheme.

The New Balance 1906R White Metallic Gold adopts a classic silhouette with white leather and gold embellishments. The upper is breathable and lightweight, with a cushioned collar and tongue for comfort. The midsole is constructed from lightweight EVA foam for cushioning and support. Durable rubber is used to construct the outsole, which provides grip and steadiness. The shoe also features "N" branding in a contrasting gold and black colorway on both lateral sides.

The New Balance 1906R White Metallic Gold was made available on August 12th, 2022, for a retail price of $155.

Name: adidas Gazelle Indoor Better Scarlet
Text:
The adidas Gazelle Indoor Better Scarlet reimagines the classic Gazelle silhouette with a bold colorway of Better Scarlet with accents in Cloud White that give the sneaker a vintage, varsity athletics look.

The use of suede on the upper provides depth of color and richness to the Better Scarlet, while the white leather 3-Stripes logo and heel tab give the Better Scarlet adidas Gazelle Indoor a timeless feel. The cotton laces, the trefoil on the heel, and the texturized tongue come in Better Scarlet, while the adidas branding on the tongue boasts Cloud White. The semi-transparent gum rubber outsole bears adidas branding beneath the heel and provides traction on a variety of surfaces.

Our experts at StockX like the way this sneaker blends heritage and modern elements to create a retro-inspired shoe with a contemporary twist. The adidas Gazelle Indoor Better Scarlet was released on May 30, 2024, and retailed at $120.

Name: Nike Dunk Low SP Retro 'Veneer' 2024
Text: The 2024 edition of the Nike Dunk Low SP Retro 'Veneer' revives a coveted colorway from the CO.JP 'Ugly Duckling Pack' from 2001. The low-top sports a suede upper, featuring a brown base with contrasting green overlays and a purple Swoosh. A lime green finish coats the collar lining and insole, marked with Nike branding. Additional Nike logo hits appear on the woven tongue tag and back tab. Undergirding the sneaker is a rubber cupsole that pairs white sidewalls with a grippy violet rubber outsole.

Name: Union LA x Bephie's Beauty Supply x Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG SP 'Summer of '96'
Text: The Union LA x Bephie’s Beauty Supply x Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG SP 'Summer of '96' delivers a three-way collaboration that reunites Jordan Brand with Chris Gibbs and Beth Birkett Gibbs. Their unique take on the iconic silhouette features a white leather upper with exposed green stitching, a pale grey Swoosh and woven detailing that recalls the Nike Air Footscape Woven. Yellow trim outlines the shoe’s classic lines, matching the laces and the discreet ‘UN/LA’ label that adorns the lateral ankle. Additional branding elements include a woven Nike Air tongue tag and a tonal Wings logo stamped on the collar flap. A vintage pre-yellowed finish is applied to the durable rubber cupsole.

Name: Nike Air Force 1 Mid SP Off-White Varsity Maize
Text:
The Nike Air Force 1 Mid SP Off White Varsity Maize represents a collaboration between Nike and Virgil Abloh’s fashion house Off-White. This sneaker takes an iconic silhouette and a retro colorway and infuses it with hallmark Off-White creativity.​
​​
​The Off White X Nike Air Force 1 Mid-Top Varsity Maize SP sports an upper with a base of tumbled white leather and perforations in the toe box. The overlays and ankle strap are maize-colored tumbled leather, while the side-panel Nike swoosh is white tumbled leather. The laces are maize and an extra pair of white laces threads through fly cables on the upper. The white foam midsole houses visible Air and sits atop a maize rubber outsole where the classic AF1 traction pattern has been enhanced with track spikes.​
​​
​What we love most about this creative shoe is the Off-White branding. Characteristic Off-White text appears on the medial upper while a white grim reaper graphic is embroidered on the lateral heel. The Nike Air Force 1 Mid SP Off White Varsity Maze was released on November 9, 2023, for a retail price of $205.

Name: adidas Yeezy 700 V3 'Safflower' 2024
Text: The 2024 edition of the adidas Yeezy 700 V3 'Safflower' features yellow accents throughout an upper made with monofilament engineered mesh. An off-white RPU cage provides structure and durability, while bootie construction in a contrasting black finish delivers a snug and comfortable fit. Encapsulated in a cream-colored polyurethane carrier, a full-length EVA midsole yields lightweight cushioning with every step. Underfoot, a herringbone-pattern rubber outsole offers grippy traction.

Name: Jordan 3 Retro SP Nina Chanel Abney Bicoastal (Women's)
Text:
The Jordan Air Jordan 3 Retro SP Nina Chanel Abney Bicoastal (Women's) is a stunning collaboration that merges fine art with sneaker culture. Featuring a unique colorway of bicoastal green, black, malachite, and fossil, this sneaker stands out with its striking design elements. The green canvas and suede upper, combined with rope laces, offers a fresh and stylish look. The modified Jumpman logo on the tongue, a first for a Jordan retro collaboration, adds a distinctive touch that highlights the innovative approach taken in this design.

This sneaker celebrates the artistic brilliance of Nina Chanel Abney, a fine artist known for her bold and vibrant works. The Jordan 3, first introduced in 1988, is reinterpreted through Abney's creative lens, resulting in a sneaker that is both a piece of art and a fashion statement. The leather heel tab with a chenille Nike Air logo adds to the unique aesthetic, making this model a must-have for collectors.

Released on June 20, 2024, and retailing at $225, the Jordan Air Jordan 3 Retro SP Nina Chanel Abney Bicoastal (Women's) is a standout piece in any collection. This sneaker seamlessly blends the heritage of the Jordan brand with contemporary artistic expression, offering a stylish and culturally significant addition to your wardrobe. Don’t miss out on this exceptional model that embodies the spirit of innovation and creativity.

Name: adidas Yeezy 500 Stone Salt
Text:
The adidas Yeezy 500 Stone Salt hails from the branch of adidas that used to work in collaboration with Kanye West. This singular-looking sneaker sports the Yeezy vibe, with comfort and innovation working hand in glove.

The Stone Salt adidas Yeezy 500 features an upper base of lightweight, breathable gray mesh that is padded at the collar for enhanced comfort. Overlays of premium leather and cow suede undulate across the upper in shades ranging from beige to gray. A mudguard crafted from abrasion-resistant beige-gray rubber adds both durability and aesthetic uniqueness to this upper. The adiPrene+ midsole is structured in light gray pods for ultimate cushioning and shock absorption. Completing the form and function of this shoe is a gray rubber abstract outsole that enhances comfort while offering traction.

The aspect of this shoe that we enjoy the most is the addition of Ortholite insoles. That extra touch of underfoot attention emphasizes how indulgently comfortable these sneakers are. The adidas Yeezy 500 Stone Salt was released on March 11, 2024, for $210 retail.

Name: adidas Yeezy 500 'Utility Black' 2023
Text: The 2023 edition of the adidas Yeezy 500 ‘Utility Black’ revives a monochromatic colorway of the lifestyle runner. A one-note black finish is executed on the mixed-material upper, highlighted by an airy mesh base with tonal suede overlays and a durable rubber mudguard. Reflective detailing around the eyelets and midfoot overlay provides enhanced visibility in low-light conditions. The sneaker sits atop a matching black midsole, featuring adidas’ adiPRENE+ cushioning for a smooth ride.

Name: adidas Yeezy 500 'Granite'
Text: The adidas Yeezy 500 ‘Granite’ updates the retro-inspired lifestyle runner with a subdued greyscale finish. Stripped of conspicuous branding, the upper combines charcoal-colored mesh with tonal suede and leather overlays. The collar is lined in padded Lycra for a comfortable fit, while a seamless rubber mudguard offers improved durability. The sneaker sits atop a podular adiPRENE+ midsole inspired by the adidas KB8 3, a Kobe Bryant signature model originally released in 1999.

Name: Puma LaMelo Ball LaFrancé Amour Untouchable
Text:
The Puma LaMelo Ball LaFrancé Amour Untouchable adds a Puma Black and Glowing Pink colorway to NBA star LaMelo Ball’s chunky, Y2K-inspired sneaker.

As part of a collaboration between Puma and Ball’s brand LaFrancé, the Untouchable Puma LaMelo Ball LaFrancé Amour sneaker embraces exaggerated silhouettes and oversized detailing. For instance, extra-wide black laces thread through the eyelets and create an overlapping pattern over the lace cage. Padding in the tongue and collar gives the sneaker a bulky appearance, while the thick EVA midsole furthers the exaggerated look and spans the full length of the shoe. Although the upper is crafted from a combination of leather, textile, and synthetic leather, the sockliner and insole are 100 percent textile.

Our experts like the bubble-like, graffiti-inspired LaFrancé branding on the midsole. The bulbous shapes match the oval textile detailing in Glowing Pink on the upper. The Puma LaMelo Ball LaFrancé Amour Untouchable was released on July 19, 2024, and retailed for $110.

Name: Nike Air Max 1 Urawa (2023)
Text:
The Nike Air Max 1 Urawa (2023) is an updated version of the original Nike Air Max 1 Urawa. The OG model was launched in 2004 as part of a collaboration between Nike and one of the biggest football clubs in Japan, the Urawa Dragons.

While the original Urawa only retailed in Japan, the 2023 version was sold in the US. The 2023 Air Max Urawa variation features a mostly white colorway of Pure Platinum, White, Black, Sport Red, and Summit White, unlike its predecessor which came in a bright Jersey Red, White, Silver, and Deep Red. Other elements mirror the 2004 Urawa, including the placement of the overlays, the use of mesh in the upper, and the visible Air Sole unit in the midsole.

Our experts love the addition of bright red details on the eyelets near the collar and on the Air Sole unit to honor the original Urawa. The Nike Air Max 1 Urawa (2023) was released on October 3, 2023, and retailed at $160.

Name: Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage 'White Black'
Text: As one of the first Nike basketball sneakers ever released, the Nike Blazer has a long heritage. The Nike Blazer Mid ’77 Vintage ‘White Black’ pays homage to its history with an old-school look. The upper comes in white leather, with an OG Swoosh taking up the side, and a deconstructed tongue with vintage branding. Two forefoot overlays come in a hairy tonal suede, and the rear branding features a distressed ‘NIKE’ logo.

Name: Crocs Pollex Juniper by Salehe Bembury Tahini
Text:
