The Crocs Pollex Juniper by Salehe Bembury Tahini dresses, American streetwear designer Salehe Bembury’s first signature Crocs sneaker in a Tahini yellow and white colorway.

Unlike other Crocs Pollex Juniper colorways created by Bembury, the Salehe Bembury Tahini Crocs Pollex Juniper is subdued and moves away from shouty, contrasting colors. Unlike Crocs Classics, this lightweight Croc features a sock-like fit and a front lace closure. The synthetic upper comes in white and features ventilation ports and perforations for breathability. However, the standout design element is Bembury’s recognizable Pollex sole unit. It’s made from gum rubber in Tahini and wraps around the upper. Finally, a large pull tab on the heel helps put on or take off the shoe.

Our experts at StockX like the dual-branding on the tongue because it celebrates the iconic footwear company and the up-and-coming designer. The Crocs Pollex Juniper by Salehe Bembury Tahini was released on September 5, 2024, and retailed at $140.

Name: ASICS Gel-NYC Cream
Text:
The ASICS Gel-NYC Cream draws inspiration from contemporary and heritage models in the ASICS catalog. It boasts a neutral colorway with hits of metallic silver and earthy-brown accents.

The mixed-material upper borrows details from two retro sneakers from the 2000s: the Gel-Nimbus 3 and the Gel-MC Plus V. The mesh base comes in Cream with layers of overlays in Cream and metallic silver. The signature Formstripes also display Cream and create a web across the quarter panels. One of the most eye-catching design elements is the suede mudguard wrapping around the shoe. It features "ASICS" lettering and complements the beige tones on the midsole. Adding a modern element to the retro design, the tooling system comes from the Gel-Cumulus 16. Providing advanced cushioning, the midsole includes Gel inserts and soft foam.

Our experts like the inclusion of Gel inserts in the heel and forefoot for maximum comfort. The ASICS Gel-NYC Cream was released on June 21, 2024, and sold for $130.

Name: Nike Dunk Low Retro QS Halloween Skull
Text:
The Nike Dunk Low Retro QS Halloween Skull is here to celebrate Halloween in style, offering a spooky twist on the classic Dunk silhouette. This limited-edition sneaker features a cracked leather upper, with vibrant green hues emerging from beneath the black exterior, creating a dramatic contrast. An embossed black skull decorates the toe box, adding to the eerie theme, while the custom insole showcases a series of skull graphics for a chilling effect.

Designed with the same iconic Dunk Low shape, the Halloween Skull edition stands out for its bold design and attention to detail. The textured cracked leather gives the shoe a unique look, and the bright cactus and green curry accents make it a real eye-catcher. Whether you’re hitting the streets or attending a Halloween event, this sneaker is sure to turn heads with its striking visuals and Halloween-themed aesthetics.

Released on October 24, 2024, the Nike Dunk Low Retro QS Halloween Skull retailed for $140. With its vibrant colorway and limited-edition design, this sneaker is a must-have for sneakerheads looking to celebrate Halloween in style.

Name: Nike Dunk Low Reverse Goldenrod (2024)
Text:
The Nike Dunk Low Reverse Goldenrod (2024) takes a classic silhouette and dresses it in a contrasting dual colorway that pops.

The 2024 Reverse Goldenrod Nike Dunk Low-Top features an upper constructed from smooth goldenrod leather on the forefoot, with the toe box featuring the classic perforations. The base of the heel, collar, and tongue are made of tightly woven goldenrod textile. All the overlays on the upper as well as the side-panel Nike Swoosh are black tumbled leather. Black laces match the black sock liner and insole. This eye-catching upper rests on a white foam midsole and a black rubber outsole with grooves and circles designed for traction and impact absorption.

But what we enjoy most about this shoe are the various hits of branding. Nike branding is embroidered in goldenrod on the heel tab, and a small black hang tag on the lateral collar features a backwards mini goldenrod Nike Swoosh. Nike branding appears in goldenrod on the tongue patch and insole and is embossed on the outsole. The Nike Dunk Low Reverse Goldenrod (2024) was released on February 8, 2024, for a retail price of $125.

Name: adidas Yeezy 700 V3 Azael
Text:
Yeezy introduces a new variation of the 700 with the Yeezy 700 V3 Azael, now available on StockX. The third incarnation of the Yeezy 700 is one of the most sophisticated designs we’ve seen from the ongoing collaborations, playing with shape, line, texture, and even expectations. The outer shell is reminiscent of a race car and an astronaut’s suit with a sole unit that feels progressive and substantial.

This 700 V3 is composed of an azael upper composed of monofilament engineered mesh with RPU overlays for structure and durability. The RPU cage has glow-in-the-dark features, along with 3M reflective detailing on the toe. The EVA midsole and herringbone rubber outsole completes the design. These sneakers released in December of 2019 and retailed for $200.

Name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN 'Metallic'
Text: The adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN ‘Metallic’ presents a neutral colorway of the chunky lifestyle runner. No-tie bungee laces secure the upper, constructed from grey polyester textile with durable no-sew overlays and oversized ‘700’ branding in metallic silver. The streamlined build is mounted on a sculpted polyurethane midsole that functions as the carrier for Boost cushioning. The responsive foam compound is visible through cut-outs in the herringbone-traction rubber outsole.

Name: Nike Dunk Low Retro SE Medium Soft Pink Malachite
Text:
The Nike Dunk Low Retro SE Medium Soft Pink Malachite is a low-top basketball sneaker made with a unique colorway.

This iteration of the Nike Dunk Low Retro SE comes with an upper made of a mix of leather and suede. The base of the upper is a medium soft pink leather, which appears on the sides, toebox, and around the heel. The toebox is also perforated. Green suede overlays contrast with the pink leather, outlining the toebox, the laces, and snaking down around the heel. The Nike Swoosh on both sides also appears in green suede. The pink cushioned tongue also contains a Nike patch, and the Nike brand name is stitched onto the green heel tab in light pink. The rubber sole is white on top and green on the bottom, and is patterned for grip on the court.

What we like best about this shoe is the combination of leather and suede on the upper, which allows for extra cushioning and style. The Nike Dunk Low Retro SE Medium Soft Pink Malachite was released on April 9, 2024, for a retail price of $125.

Name: Nike Air Max 1 '86 OG Big Bubble Air Max Day (2024)
Text:
The Nike Air Max 1 '86 OG Big Bubble Air Max Day (2024) is a special-edition sneaker that was released to celebrate Air Max Day.

The sneaker boasts a white mesh construction with suede overlays in Royal Blue and Sail. Unlike other Nike Air Max 1 models released as part of Air Max Day, the "Big Bubble Air Max Day" iteration features a Volt midsole that catches the eye. The tongue’s inner lining also showcases a panel of Volt synthetic material. The oversized window in the heel displays visible Air Max units and four circular cut outs.

Something our StockX experts like is the ‘3.26’ on the tongue’s logo tag. It represents the date of Air Max Day and comes in chunky Blue Volt letters. The Nike Air Max 1 '86 OG Big Bubble Air Max Day (2024) was launched on March 26th, 2024, and sold for $150.

Name: adidas Response CL Bad Bunny Paso Fino
Text:
The adidas Response CL Bad Bunny Paso Fino is part of a collaboration between adidas and the Puerto Rican singer Bad Bunny. The sneaker takes the classic Response CL silhouette and incorporates Wild West elements inspired by Bad Bunny’s love of Western films.

The Ecru Tint, Bronze Strata, and Earth Strata colorway takes cues from the desert environment, leather, rust, and rich earth. Overlapping shapes and curved lines in leather across the mesh upper evoke desert formations such as mountains and rock outcroppings. The 3-Stripes cross the side panel, connecting the midsole and lace cage. The sneaker features the recognizable Response CL rubber outsole known for its bulky appearance and cushioning support.

Our StockX experts love the splashes of purple on the tongue and midsole, which represent the pops of color found in the otherwise monotone desert landscape. The adidas Response CL Bad Bunny Paso Fino was released on October 28, 2023, and retailed at $160.

Name: Jordan 9 Retro Powder Blue (2024)
Text:
The Air Jordan 9 Retro Powder Blue 2024 revives a fan favorite colorway with a fresh execution. It features a white leather upper that's both luxurious to the touch and robust for wear. Black components grace the tongue, eyelets, liner, pull tabs, and midsole, highlighted by the iconic Jumpman. These dark accents set the stage for the dark powder blue featured on the midsole, inner lining, tongue branding, and logo on the heel pull tabs, imbuing the sneaker with a cool, collected charm that makes this sneaker truly stand out.

Every aspect of the sneaker is infused with intention—the powder blue adorns the midsole creating a visual synergy that's both striking and sophisticated. The Air Jordan 9's unique globe emblem on the heel celebrates Jordan's global influence, while the intricate stitch patterns and layered panels add depth and texture to the design.

The release of the Air Jordan 9 Retro Powder Blue on March 23, 2024, for $210, marked a triumphant return of a beloved colorway. The launch celebrated Jordan's global appeal, with the sneaker's white and black composition setting the stage for the serene powder blue, ensuring its place in the annals of sneaker culture as a testament to timeless design and universal appeal.

Name: Nike Air Max 180 Ultramarine (2024)
Text:
The Nike Air Max 180 Ultramarine (2024) is a stunning reissue of the classic 1991 design by Tinker Hatfield. This sneaker features a white neoprene upper with suede overlays, highlighted by vibrant ultramarine blue and solar red accents. The signature exposed Air unit adds a futuristic touch, making this sneaker both a fashion statement and a functional piece of footwear. The bold color scheme and high-quality materials ensure that this sneaker stands out in any crowd.

Since its introduction, the Air Max 180 has been celebrated for its revolutionary 180-degree Air unit, providing maximum comfort and cushioning. The Ultramarine colorway, one of the most iconic in the Air Max lineup, is known for its eye-catching design and vibrant colors. The 2024 re-release faithfully replicates the original, offering the same striking visuals and superior comfort.

Priced at $150, the Nike Air Max 180 Ultramarine (2024) was released on May 24, 2024. This sneaker is not just a piece of athletic footwear but a piece of cultural history. The Ultramarine colorway brings a fresh yet nostalgic vibe, making it a must-have for sneaker collectors and fashion enthusiasts alike. Don’t miss your chance to own this timeless classic and experience the perfect blend of style, comfort, and heritage.

Name: Nike Air Max Plus 25th Anniversary
Text:
The Nike Air Max Plus 25th Anniversary was released to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the original Nike Air Max Plus. This commemorative sneaker features a color scheme and design that pay tribute to prominent Air Max colorways, including "Palm," "Hyper Blue," "Fireberry," and "Sanguine."

Like other Air Max Plus models, the 25th Anniversary variation boasts a polyurethane midsole with a midfoot shank inspired by the curve of a whale’s tail. The upper is made of breathable mesh, displaying a color gradient that fades from light blue to Varsity Blue to purple to red with a palm pattern. Each color represents one of the famous Air Max colorways. A TPU cage supports the soft upper and mimics the sway of palm trees moving in the breeze.

Our StockX experts like visible Air Max units in the chunky midsole. The Nike Air Max Plus 25th Anniversary was released on November 9, 2023, and retailed at $185.

Name: Jordan 6 Retro Aqua
Text:
Enter the realm of iconic basketball legacy with the Jordan 6 Retro Aqua, revamped in a vibrant Black, Bright Concord, and Aquatone colorway.

Dripping with history, this Retro silhouette gets a refreshing twist. The upper's supple suede is highlighted by Bright Concord accents on the Jumpan logo and rubberized heel tab, ensuring that perfect mix of premium style and function. Dive into the unexpected brilliance of Aquatone, seamlessly blending with the stark Black upper and Bright Concord hues on the midsole– a color fusion never witnessed before on this iconic model. Signature Jordan elements remain, from the pull-tab at the rear of the heel. But what steals the show? The uncharted Aqua color way elements that's ready to make waves.

The Jordan 6 Retro Aqua is a throwback with a fresh splash. Dropped at $200, it's the bridge between vintage Jordan and contemporary cool.

Name: Jordan 1 Retro High Bred Toe
Text: Combining elements of three certified classic AJ1’s, the 2018 Jordan 1 Retro High Bred Toe is like the Coachella lineup of OG 1s. Coming in gym red, black, and summit white, with red on the toe box, outsole, and wrapping around the ankle and heel, white side panels and midsole and black covering the rest of the sneaker, it’s a perfectly balanced mash-up of the Banned, Chicago, and Black Toe all in one. Originally releasing in February of 2018, the Bred toe has been one of the most popular sneakers on StockX since its drop. For fans of the AJ1, this colorway is a must Bid.

Name: Jordan 1 Retro High Bred Banned (2016)
Text:
The shoe that started it all. In 1985, Nike partnered with a young superstar in the making, Michael Jordan, and changed the game by releasing the Air Jordan, now known as the Air Jordan 1. It was rumored that this black and red colorway was banned by the NBA for violating the league's dress code, leading to the shoe's reputation as the banned Jordans. While this story was most likely a marketing move on Nike's part as it has never been confirmed, the legend of the Air Jordan 1 Bred lives on.

The Air Jordan 1 Bred 2016 featured a black and Varsity Red leather upper with Swoosh overlays and Wings logo detailing at the collar. Vintage-styled Nike Swoosh woven tongue tags add a classic feel. From there, a white and red Air sole completes the design.

The Air Jordan 1 Bred 2016 released in September of 2016 and retailed for $160.

Name: Nike Air Zoom GT Cut 3 White Picante Red
Text:
The Nike Air Zoom GT Cut 3 White Picante Red is designed for creating space for step back jumpers, back door cuts, and all the game-changing plays you strive for throughout all four quarters.

The upper of the White Picante Red Nike Air Zoom GT Cut 3 features a stretchy white breathable material meant to move with your foot across the court. Red deco stitching covers the forefoot and matches the tint of the side-panel Nike Swoosh. White synthetic overlays are perforated to provide ventilation, even as they offer lockdown foot support. A full-length the ZoomX foam midsole offers cushioning and springy energy return, and includes a plate at the pinky toe for stability. The rubber outsole has a modified herringbone traction pattern specifically designed for stopping on a dime and making lateral cuts on the court.

The stand-out feature of this shoe that catches our eye is the dual-color blocking on the sole unit. The forefoot of the sole unit is bright red, while from the midfoot to the heel, the midsole and outsole are Snowy White. The Nike Air Zoom GT Cut 3 White Picante Red was released on January 13, 2024, for $190 retail.

Name: Nike Kobe 4 Protro Philly (2024)
Text:
Introducing the Nike Kobe 4 Protro Philly 2024, a stunning tribute to Kobe Bryant's birthplace and the historical city of Philadelphia. Cloaked in the patriotic varsity royal, white, and university red, this sneaker encapsulates the spirit of Philly with a design that's as bold and fearless as the city's own story. Designed for the trendsetters, the Kobe 4 Protro Philly celebrates the fusion of Bryant's origins with the iconic American heritage.

Engineered with cutting-edge sneaker technology, the Kobe 4 Protro Philly boasts a Zoom Air unit in the heel for responsive cushioning, a Flywire-laced upper for a lock-down fit, and a Phylon midsole for lightweight support, all underlined by the star-spangled collar lining that pays homage to the City of Brotherly Love. This sneaker is a style statement a marvel of design that nods to the past while propelling you forward with unrivaled comfort and durability.

Released on April 13, 2024, for $190, the Nike Kobe 4 Protro Philly is a piece of basketball and American history. With its Philadelphia-inspired colorway and advanced performance features, it stands as a beacon of honor to the city that gave birth to one of basketball's greatest legends. This re-release brings with it the opportunity to walk in the shoes of greatness, combining Philly's rich heritage with the performance legacy Kobe Bryant left behind.

Name: Puma LaMelo Ball MB.01 Lo Green Gecko
Text:
The Puma LaMelo Ball MB01 Lo Green Gecko has become a part of the brand´s catalog. The basketball sneaker appears in a Green Gecko or Castlerock colorway.

The upper of this collaborative shoe is made from synthetic materials featuring a 3D printed design throughout. The laces are made of green cotton with an underlying tongue made of mesh. This upper displays a circular leaves motif, near the collar, forming a crown and the rubber outsole has a thin linear pattern for traction.

The Puma LaMelo Ball MB01 Lo Green Gecko was originally released on October 21, 2022. The retail price was $120.

Name: Nike Book 1 Lilac Bloom
Text:
The Nike Book 1 Lilac Bloom decks out NBA player Devin Booker’s first collaboration with Nike in an all-over pastel-purple colorway and a mixed-material upper.

Unlike previous editions of the Book 1, the Lilac Bloom version is colorful and moves away from grayscale and neutral colors. The upper is crafted from suede, genuine leather, and a twill-like material in Barley Grape, giving the sneaker a smooth appearance. The shiny material on the Swoosh logo and the collar has a pearlescent sheen and comes in Daybreak. Additional splashes of Daybreak decorate the top of the tongue and the soft lining. A Zoom-Air unit in the heel provides a springy feel, while the rubber outsole features a herringbone pattern for multidirectional traction.

Our experts like the full-length foam in the midsole because it provides soft cushioning underfoot. The Nike Book 1 Lilac Bloom was released on July 18, 2024, and sold for $140.

Name: Nike Ja 1 Reverse Scratch
Text:
The Nike Ja 1 Reverse Scratch is basketball shoe presenting in a Reverse Scratch colorway and part of the Nike Ja 1 line, which is basketball player Ja Morant’s signature shoe line.

Starting with the white-based upper, it’s made up out of lots of mesh panels along with others that aren’t mesh, but still have air perforations in them. The black Swoosh, sock liner and laces add contrast along with the University Red ankle panel. Turbo green lights up the midsole while a beach-colored tongue tag displays the JA chevron logo. Jersey number 12 appears on the heels, the left side in Beach and the right side in University Red. Then there are the scratches that represent Ja’s famous two-handed dunk.

StockX experts think that this Nike Ja 1 Reverse Scratch sneaker stands out because of the scratch marks that are seen throughout its design and create an element of suspense. Released on July 1, 2024, it retailed for $130.

Name: Nike KD 15 EP 'What The'
Text: The Nike KD 15 ‘What The’ presents a greatest-hits compendium that blends colors and details from past editions of Kevin Durant’s 15th signature shoe. Mismatched uppers are bolstered with floating TPU wings, featuring the glow-in-the-dark finish of the ‘Psychic Purple’ colorway on the left side, twinned with the soft violet hue of the ‘B.A.D.’ colorway on the opposite side. Other notable highlights include an ‘Aunt Pearl’ tongue tag, a graffiti-like ‘Brooklyn Courts’ heel graphic, and a sockliner and rubber outsole borrowed from the ‘All-Star’ edition. In terms of performance, the low-top utilizes a Cushlon midsole with a visible Zoom Air Strobel for on-court responsiveness.

Name: Nike KD 15 Psychic Purple
Text:
The Nike KD 15 Psychic Purple is an addition to the Nike KD 6 lineup, a collection of basketball sneakers designed in collaboration with NBA star Kevin Durant.

The Psychic Purple KD 15 has an upper that is primarily constructed with breathable Flyknit material that conforms to the shape of the foot. It is reinforced with Flywire cables that wrap around the mid foot, providing extra support and lockdown. The outsole is made of durable rubber with a multidirectional wave-like traction pattern that provides maximum grip and control on the court. 

What we love about the Nike KD 15 Psychic Purple? Of course, it is the Nike React foam technology midsole, which provides cushioning and responsiveness for enhanced performance on the basketball court. The midsole is designed to absorb shock and provide energy return, which allows players to jump higher and land safely. The Nike KD 15 Psychic Purple was released on August 10th, 2022, at a retail price of $150.

Name: Nike Kobe 6 Protro Grinch (2020)
Text:
Nike opened a new chapter at the end of 2020 and refreshed the Kobe 6 design with the Nike Kobe 6 Protro Grinch. The Kobe 6 Grinch originally debuted in 2010 when Kobe Bryant’s Los Angeles Lakers faced LeBron James’ Miami Heat in a legendary match up on Christmas Day. This is the first Kobe 6 to receive the Kobe Protro treatment, a design process that takes classic Kobe designs and updates them with modern tech for improved performance.

At a first glance, the Nike Kobe 6 Grinch looks identically like the OG pair from 2010: it features a Green Apple and Volt textured, snake-inspired upper as a tribute to Kobe’s Black Mamba moniker. A black Swoosh, red Kobe branding on the tongue, and green translucent outsole accentuate the shoe’s reptile theme. But, because this is a Protro, there are some differences. The updated Kobe 6 Grinch arrives with a more responsive Zoom Air cushioning system and scaled-down traction for an improved court feel. The silhouette shape is even altered to provide a lower, sleeker fit.

The Nike Kobe 6 Grinch released in December of 2020 and retailed for $180.

Name: Nike KD 17 NRG Metro Boomin
Text:
The Nike KD 17 NRG Metro Boomin is part of a line produced by Nike, NBA player Kevin Durant, and producer Metro Boomin that honors the artist’s mother.

The Metro Boomin Nike KD 17 NRG comes in a primarily purple colorway of Atomic Violet, black, white, and Hyper Grape that highlights Metro Boomin’s mother’s favorite color. This sneaker features an Air Zoom unit in the forefoot area and was designed for improving gym workout performance. Metro Boomin’s fisheye-like tag on the tongue is the producer’s branding logo, but also represents the struggles of single mothers. In addition, the inside of the padded tongue bears the names of Metro Boomin’s brothers and sisters.

Our experts at StockX like the design details that pay tribute to Metro Boomin’s difficult past. For example, the lightning storm graphics on the side panels represent Metro Boomin’s fight to overcome personal struggles and the power behind his effort. The Nike KD 17 NRG Metro Boomin was released on June 24, 2024, and sold for $160.

Name: adidas Harden Vol. 7 Wonder Blue Impact Orange Paisley
Text:
The adidas Harden Vol. 7 Wonder Blue Impact Orange Paisley represents a collaboration between the iconic sneaker company and NBA point guard James Harden.

The James Harden x adidas Vol. 7 in a Wonder Blue/Impact Orange/Paisley colorway sports a soft, flexible padded upper in pale blue textile, with side panel stitching to suggest the iconic adidas three stripes. The collar, sock liner, and tongue area of this upper are constructed from black knit, and the heel is overlaid in black synthetic with an intricate paisley print. TPU in shiny black and ice blue overlay the mud guard to add both support and style. Three bright orange stripes course vertically up the heel and match the pull tab above, which sports James Harden branding.

What we enjoy most about this eye-catching shoe is the midsole with its Lightstrike cushioning and Jet Boost in the heel for maximum energy return. This all rests atop an ice blue, black, and orange rubber outsole with a modified herringbone traction pattern. The adidas Harden Vol. 7 Wonder Blue Impact Orange Paisley was released on October 1, 2023, for $160 retail.

Name: adidas D.O.N. Issue #6 Purple Burst
Text:
The adidas D.O.N. Issue #6 Purple Burst is an ultra-sleek basketball shoe, with an extremely forward-looking design. Its kaleidoscopic color scheme immediately stands out from the rest.

Part of the Donovan Mitchell signature collection, it has all the hallmarks of top-class adidas basketball shoes. A key feature is the adidas Lightstrike technology, which creates an exceptionally lightweight midsole that's also extremely responsive to sudden changes of direction. Combined with a comfortable padded upper, this puts these shoes in the same realm as other adidas basketball icons.

Our experts rate these shoes very highly for their performance on court. They provide superior lateral support without the need for a high side wall. This gives a low-profile basketball shoe that provides a high degree of flexibility while still imparting stability. An accentuated midsole gives excellent arch support too. The adidas D.O.N. Issue #6 Purple Burst retailed at $120 upon its release on 5 July 2024.

Name: adidas Dame 8 Admit One Cloud White
Text:
The adidas Dame 8 Admit One Cloud White dresses NBA player Damian Lillard’s eighth signature adidas sneaker in an all-white colorway with black accents.

The upper is crafted from breathable mesh with a tight weave and sits on a Bounce Pro midsole. This midsole features dual-density technology, which supports stability and motion control during spins or quick movements. Like other Dame 8 models, the "Admit One Cloud White" version is partly made from recycled materials. For example, 25 percent of the upper is crafted from production waste. While the upper comes in Cloud White, black accents are found on the iconic 3-Stripes logo, the "ADMIT ONE" lettering on the heel, and the adidas tongue tag.

Our experts at StockX like the sneaker’s low-to-the-ground design and the minimalist colorway. The adidas Dame 8 Admit One Cloud White was released on September 10, 2022, and retailed for $130.

Name: adidas Crazy IIInfinity Chalk
Text:
The adidas Crazy IIInfinity 003 Chalk is a part of the adidas Crazy line, a line that originally was the adidas Kobe line. It mixes neutral colors and a modern design, inspired by the original design of the Kobe 3 model.

The adidas Crazy IIInfinity 003 Chalk has a zip-up outer. It features the famous three adidas stripes on the side, which are indented into the rubber. The upper part of the shoe is composed of mesh that is designed to be breathable, while the bottom part of the shoe is rubber. The top of the shoe is made of a pure black color, and the rubber on the bottom is a neutral chalk color.

Our experts love the feature of the textile upper part of the shoe, as it is flexible and soft. The adidas Crazy IIInfinity 003 Chalk first came out on July 13th, 2023, and were priced at $160.

Name: adidas D Rose Son of Chi
Text:
The adidas D Rose Son of Chi is a mid-top silhouette in a lavender and black color combination from basketball player Derrick Rose’s signature D Rose line of shoes.

This adidas D Rose line features many colorways – this one is dressed in a tonal lavender and features black accents. The synthetic upper has a diamond-like pattern throughout the quarter, which leads into dark purple stitched stripes that also appear on the white perforated toebox. The iconic Three Stripes are housed on the lateral side of the TPU heel counter. D Rose branding is under a black mesh on the tongue. The semi-translucent lavender outsole boasts a herringbone pattern and a D Rose logo on the outsole’s heel. Finally, the Flywire lacing system with matching lavender laces rounds out this shoe.

StockX specialists note the full-length Bounce midsole as a standout feature. The Bounce material provides support, cushioning and energy return which is a benefit for playing any type of sport. The adidas D Rose Son of Chi lavender and black colorway sold for $100 when it was released on March 18, 2022.

Name: adidas D Rose Son of Chi Christmas
Text:
The adidas D Rose Son of Chi Christmas is a high top athletic shoe featuring a Cloud White upper accented by Pulse Aqua details. The Son of Chi Christmas is composed of geometric patterns, with zigzag leather overlays revealing Cloud White geometric mesh over a Pulse Aqua base. The rear heel features shiny, multicolored adidas branding encased in a geometric Pulse aqua frame, which is balanced by a linear textured Cloud White midsole and a Pulse Aqua zigzag outsole.

As one of the world’s major athletic shoe producers, adidas has long outfitted professional athletes with signature shoes. NBA player Derrick Rose began his professional basketball career in 2008, going on to win numerous awards in the sport. The D Rose signature shoe series with adidas has drawn inspiration from Rose’s life, and many styles feature names that reflect that, such as the Son of Chi Christmas.

Our experts feel that the best feature of the Son of Chi Christmas is its striking geometric construction, which is nuanced and uncommon. The adidas D Rose Son of Chi Christmas released on December 7, 2021, and retailed at $100.

Name: adidas D.O.N. Issue #2 Marvel Venom
Text:
A mixture of Cloud White, Core Black, and Signal Pink define the appearance of the adidas D.O.N. Issue #2 Marvel Venom.

The Marvel Venom adidas D.O.N. Issue #2 showcases a textile and mesh upper that vividly represents the influence of the symbiote from Marvel Comics fame. The majority of the shoe's profile and sole are rendered in a full black color, symbolizing the symbiote's control. However, there are striking speckles of red beneath, reminiscent of blood splatters, which not only add contrast but also complement the design of the heel. The heel prominently features Venom's iconic spikey teeth and vibrant jaws, further emphasizing the symbiotic nature of the character.

One aspect of this shoe that our experts found intriguing is its sturdy rubber outsole, which is ideal for Donovan Mitchell's quick, instinctive, and strong style of play and the style of any player who aspires to play like him. The adidas D.O.N. Issue #2 Marvel Venom sold for $110 when it made its debut on May 22, 2021.

Name: Li-Ning Way of Wade 808 3 Family Love
Text:
The Li-Ning Way of Wade 808 3 Family Love is part of a collaboration between NBA player Dwyane Wade and the Chinese athletic apparel label Li-Ning.

Something that makes this sneaker stand out is its replaceable midsole. The forefoot TPU and the full-length ZOOM midsole can be removed and replaced, which allows the wearer to adjust the sneaker based on his or her needs. The rubber outsole boasts a wavy traction pattern that grips a variety of surfaces, while a carbon-fiber plate supports the foot and ankle. The sneaker boasts a breathable textile upper that comes in a clean white with multi-color accents. For example, the ‘W’ logo on the side panel displays a gradient of light blue, pink, and orange. Other branding details include ‘808’ on the tongue.

Our experts at StockX like the musical note design on the left shoe’s heel. The Li-Ning Way of Wade 808 3 Family Love was released on June 23rd, 2023, and retailed at $119.

Name: Li-Ning Wade Son of Flash White Hot
Text:
The Li-Ning Wade Son of Flash White Hot is a performance sneaker designed by the Chinese company enhanced with BOOM and CLOUD technology.

This version of the Li-Ning Wade Son of Flash is made with a breathable white textile upper. Mesh dominates the toe box and sides of the shoe, while supportive white overlays appear around the ankles and heel. A muted multicolor TPU support in the shape of a flash appears on the lateral side of the shoe above the arch, and a small Li-Ning logo tag can be found coming off the laces. The tongue features branding elements and the heel pull tab features a flash. The heel overlays are also textured, adding visual interest. The shoe is equipped with BOOM and CLOUD technology for comfort, cushioning, and energy return. A white rubber sole and outsole in jagged flash patterns complete the look.

Our favorite feature of this shoe is the multicolored flash TPU support, which provides the only pop of color as well as serves a functional purpose. The Li-Ning Wade Son of Flash White Hot was released on August 3, 2023, for a price of $135.

Name: Li-Ning Wade All City 12 Sunshine State
Text:
The Li-Ning Wade All City 12 Sunshine State is a performance basketball shoe designed with the aura of the Sunshine State in mind.

This version of the Li-Ning Wade All City 12 is constructed with a light pink textile upper, allowing for breathability. The midsoles are loosely knit mesh, while the toe cap and mudguard are more tightly knit. On each side, you can find the Li-Ning logo in pink, white, and yellow above the arch, forming supports. The lateral heel sports a tie-dyed look with "Sunshine State" written in cursive. The Li-Ning logo can also be found peeking out of the heel collar, which is yellow. A pink cushioning element also appears on top of the heel collar, and there is a pink pull tab. The tongue features a WOW DOG and Li-Ning logo placed on the state of Florida, while a Wade logo appears at the bottom of the laces. The shoe sits atop a carbon plate within a white outsole.

Our favorite feature of this shoe is the many subtle branding elements incorporated into the design. The Li-Ning Wade All City 12 Sunshine State was released on December 5, 2023, for $149.

Name: Anta Kai 1 Enlightened Warrior
Text:
The Anta Kai 1 Enlightened Warrior is a mismatched pair of shoes designed by American basketball player, Kyrie Irving.

This version of the Anta Kai 1 is made with a lightweight mesh upper. The upper of each shoe features black and white geometric and tribal patterns, different on each shoe. Translucent purple and pink overlays round out the toebox of one of the shoes, while this overlay appears in pink and orange on the other shoe. Irving’s number 11 appears at the bottom of the laces and again on the heel under the special characters. A strap over the laces embellished with special characters adds support. The heels also contain a TPU stabilizer in black and white. The white rubber outsole is thick and contains yellow on one shoe and red on the other.

Our favorite thing about this shoe is how the geometric patterns on the base are similar but still different, complementing each other. The Anta Kai 1 Enlightened Warrior was released on April 12, 2024, for a retail price of $125.

Name: Anta Shock Wave 5 Kyrie Irving First Year
Text:
The Anta Shock Wave 5 Kyrie Irving First Year is part of a collaboration between NBA player Kyrie Irving and Chinese athletic apparel label Anta.

This performance sneaker finds inspiration in fierce predators and rugged terrains. For example, the side of the midsole displays a TPU panel that looks like a fish bone and mimics the skin of a crocodile or cobra. The breathable upper features a simple color combination of white and black, while jagged lines create the illusion of teeth. In terms of technology, the sneaker houses a full-length Nitrogen midsole and insole, TPU stability plates, and a carbon plate. The rubber outsole extends slightly over the toecap and is made of a non-slip material.

Our experts at StockX like the lightning bolt pattern near the eyelets, which celebrates the sneaker’s powerful silhouette. The Anta Shock Wave 5 Kyrie Irving First Year was released on September 6th, 2023, and retailed at $230.

Name: Nike Zoom KD 4 'Christmas' 2024
Text: The 2024 edition of the Nike Zoom KD 4 'Christmas' brings back a holiday-themed colorway of Kevin Durant's fourth signature shoe. Inspired by Christmas cookie cutters, the retro model sports a copper-hued mesh upper with tonal no-sew overlays. Durant's 'KD' logo adorns the back heel, while Nike Swoosh branding appears on the Adaptive Fit strap. The cushioning setup takes the form of a lightweight Phylon midsole, painted black and fitted with a springy Zoom Air unit in forefoot.

Name: Nike ACG Rufus Limestone Black
Text:
The Nike ACG Rufus Limestone Black is a unique slipper that has now made a comeback after about a decade.

This model of the Nike ACG Rufus is made with a seamless suede upper in a Limestone tan color. The only design seen on the upper is a small Nike Swoosh embossed into the lateral side. The midsole is black rubber that dons a wavy texture near the bottom, and speckled Limestone tan forms the thick outsole, fully enclosing the black midsole. A small black Nike swoosh appears on the front tip of the outsole. The midsole has foam cushioning for extra comfort.

Our favorite thing about this shoe is the unique black midsole unit that contrasts nicely with the Limestone color of the rest of the shoe. The Nike ACG Rufus Limestone Black was first released on May 10, 2024, for an initial retail price of $110.

Name: New Balance 1906A 'Black'
Text: The New Balance 1906A 'Black' features angular lines and a layered build. The upper combines airy black mesh with durable synthetic overlays in matching black and pewter. The signature 'N' logo is integrated into the N-Lock lacing system for midfoot lockdown, while a molded TPU heel cage provides rearfoot stability. The sneaker rides on an ACTEVA LITE midsole, painted black and fitted with ABZORB SBS pods in the heel. Underfoot, the rubber outsole is equipped with a TPU shank, dubbed the Stability Web, for added arch support.

Name: Salomon XT-6 Gore-Tex Black Silver
Text:
The Salomon XT-6 Gore-Tex Black Silver takes Salomon’s signature trailing running technologies and applies them to a city-inspired sneaker.

This lightweight runner boasts an upper made of synthetic mesh, which is designed to keep debris from entering the shoe. Gore-Tex bonds to the mesh upper and creates a protective layer that is waterproof and windproof yet also breathable. The sneaker features an all-black construction with reflective stripes that form triangular shapes and spell out SALOMON. The EnergyCell midsole provides responsive cushioning on concrete, compact soil, and rough terrain, while the rubber tread provides traction. A toggle lace closure with thin, durable laces secures the shoe and allows for easy adjustments. Branding details can be found on the inner side panel and the tongue tag.

Our StockX experts like that the reflective details match the silver accents on the black midsole. The Salomon XT-6 Gore-Tex Black Silver was released on January 27, 2024, and retailed at $200.

Name: Nike Air Terra Humara SP Alchemy Pink Diffused Blue
Text:
The Nike Air Terra Humara SP Alchemy Pink Diffused Blue is a performance shoe made for trail running that debuted in 1997.

This version of the Nike Air Terra Humara SP is constructed with a layered woven textile and suede upper. A Diffused Blue woven textile forms the base of the shoe, including the toe box and the midsole, as well as the area around the heel. Alchemy Pink suede overlays form the toe cap and mudguard, and run from the laces down to the arch. The Nike Swoosh also appears in Alchemy Pink suede under the ankle. A bright yellow color forms the length of the tongue and the heel collar, and features the Nike brand name embossed under the front of the ankle. The blue heel counter features a pink Nike Air logo, and a white rubber outsole with visible Air units completes the look.

The standout feature of this shoe is the Alchemy Pink suede accents, as they add a bold design to the shoe. The Nike Air Terra Humara SP Alchemy Pink Diffused Blue was released on May 14, 2024, for a price of $150.

Name: adidas Predator Elite Foldover Tongue FG Solar Energy Pack
Text:
Designed for speed, the adidas Predator Elite Foldover Tongue F Solar Energy Pack is a football cleat with a variety of performance-enhancing features.

The sneaker boasts a HybridTouch 2.0 upper, which has a PrimeKnit collar that comes in two pieces. The durable PrimeKnit conforms to the foot’s shape and provides an airy feel. The upper also features fins made of rubber Strikeskin, a material that adds grip and supports precision shooting. Another noteworthy technical feature is the Controlfame 2.0 outsole, which is designed for play on soft ground. In terms of style, the cleat features an oversized tongue in Solar Red that folds over the lace cage. While the base comes in Core Black, the exaggerated 3-Stripes logo features Cloud White.

Our experts like the swirling pattern on the Solar Red and Cloud White outsole. The adidas Predator Elite Foldover Tongue F Solar Energy Pack was released on February 27th, 2024, and retailed at $280.

Name: Nike Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite FG x Air Max Plus Sunset
Text:
The Nike Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite FG x Air Max Plus Sunset turns the recognizable Vapor 15 into a soccer cleat. It features a vibrant colorway of Pimento that appears to fade from bright orange to red-orange.

What makes this sneaker stand out is the series of lines that form a cage over the upper. These lines are a signature design element of Air Max Plus sneakers and often represent palm trees or flames. A ¾-length Zoom Air unit underfoot provides comfort and responsive cushioning, while tri-star studs offer multi-directional traction. The upper is crafted from Vaporposite+, which is a mesh-like material that molds to the foot’s shape without feeling restrictive. This sneaker was designed for damp pitches with short grass.

Our experts at StockX like the splash of color provided by the crimson Swoosh logos on the side panels. The Nike Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite FG x Air Max Plus Sunset was released on March 14, 2024, and retailed at $285.

Name: Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Elite FG Blast Pack Baltic Blue
Text:
The Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Elite FG Blast Pack Baltic Blue is an iteration of this silhouette that includes a redesigned plate and a refined upper to reduce the weight of the shoe and increase your speed on the turf.

The upper of this "Firm Ground Elite" soccer shoe is crafted from white leather with perforations near the collar to facilitate ventilation and enhance comfort. A gray leather overlay covers the heel adding support and style. The upper features a raised texture backed by foam pods for precision in passing, dribbling, and shooting. A cushioned insole rests above an outsole fitted with studs designed to provide top-tier traction for sudden stops and quick cuts.

The aspect of this soccer shoe we most enjoy is the standout hits of blast pink on the upper. Tiempo branding on the lateral side Nike Swoosh and the entire medial Nike Swoosh pop with this bright hit of contrast. The Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Elite FG Blast Pack Baltic Blue was released on May 2, 2023, for a retail price of $230.

Name: Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite AS FG Rising Gem Pack
Text:
The Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite AS FG Rising Gem Pack is a football (soccer) shoe designed for playing on firm ground (FG) that was released as part of the Rising Gem Pack series, which features shiny soleplates.

The Atmosphere Gray upper is made with Nike’s grippy, grid mesh called Vaporposite+. This material provides ball control when its most needed. There is a large black textured Swoosh that envelopes the shoe from the toe area to the lateral side, while a smaller black Swoosh adorns the medial side. Unique AIR branding flanks both sides of the ankles in black. There is a 3/4 length Air Zoom unit underfoot in the metallic outsole.

StockX experts think that the stunning shining, chrome soleplate, which was a hallmark feature of the Rising Gem Pack, is what sets this football shoe apart from others. Released on May 5, 2024, Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite AS FG Rising Gem Pack shoe retailed at a price of $260.

Name: Nike Zoom Superfly 9 Elite FG Blast Pack Baltic Blue
Text:
The Nike Zoom Superfly 9 Elite FG Blast Pack Baltic Blue is a performance soccer cleat designed for use on grass with non-removable tri-star studs.

What makes this cleat stand out is the addition of a Zoom Air unit that’s soccer-specific. It sits on top of the traction plate, increasing energy return and adding stability with each step. The upper is made of durable Vaporsite, a mesh material that allows for better ball control. The soccer shoe also boasts a Flyknit lining, which conforms to the shape of the foot and creates a secure, sock-like fit. Although the base is primarily white, the studs come in Pink Blast and Baltic Blue. These bright tones can also be found on the graphic designs that fill in the ‘AIR’ lettering along the medial side panel.

Our experts like the shoe’s white Flyknit upper. When the light shines on it, the material looks semi-iridescent. The Nike Zoom Superfly 9 Elite FG Blast Pack Baltic Blue was released on January 16, 2023, and retailed at $275.

Name: adidas Predator 24+ Elite FT FG Pearlized Pack
Text:
The adidas Predator 24+ Elite FT FG Pearlized Pack is a soccer cleat designed with a sheen to resemble a pearl.

This version of the adidas Predator 24+ Elite FT FG is made with a HybridTouch 2.0 upper in a shiny pearlized white for maximum flexibility. The upper also features rubber Strikeskin elements in a silvery gray color to help with shooting accuracy. Silver lines also run from the sole towards the laces on the lateral side, forming a version of the iconic adidas three stripes logo. A white elastic band branded with the word "PREDATOR" attaches the flat tongue to the shoe. The tongue and the heel also feature adidas branding, and the Predator name appears once again under the lateral ankle. Studs with silver on the edges complete the design and allow for grip and quick movement on the field.

Our favorite feature of this shoe is the pearlized upper, which makes the cleats stand out from others. The adidas Predator 24+ Elite FT FG Pearlized Pack was released on January 29, 2024, for $280.

Name: Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite FG Luminous Pack
Text:
The Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite FG Luminous Pack is an eye-catching soccer cleat that has a vibrant style to match its firm ground high-octane capabilities.

The Firm Ground Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite in a Luminous Pack colorway features a bright pink and yellow upper Vaporposite+, a mesh with a premium lining that facilitates optimal ball control at high speeds. The inner lining is soft, yet stable, wrapping tightly around your foot. The pliability of this upper combines for a natural on-ball feel, whether you're passing, dribbling, or scoring. The outsole plate features a ¾-length Air Zoom unit to offer springy propulsion.

The standout features we most enjoy about this shoe are the attention to and arrangement of the tri-star studs on the yellow and translucent outsole. Heel studs designed to deliver traction and stability when breaking complement toe-off center studs that deliver traction during quick starts. The Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 15 Elite FG Luminous Pack was released on April 3, 2023, for a retail price of $250.

Name: adidas 11Pro FG Toni Kroos Cloud White Core Black Gold Metallic
Text:
The adidas 11Pro FG Toni Kroos Cloud White Core Black Gold Metallic marks the 10th anniversary of this now-iconic soccer boot. It's a truly exclusive model that recreates the exact design and dimensions as the ones the German idol has played in.

The uppers are made from soft leather, which allows great cushioning for ball control. Support and stability are provided by the Adipure outsole, which also gives a high degree of traction, particularly on firm pitches. This limited edition has a striking white and old gold colorway, with the protective adidas 11Pro heel cup.

Our experts rave about the collectors' value of this model. They point to the immaculate attention to detail, such as the little German flag on the back of the heel, and the fact that it has only been produced in one size—that of Toni Kroos. The adidas 11Pro FG Toni Kroos Cloud White Core Black Gold Metallic was released on June 12, 2024, retailed at $250.

Name: Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 FG Kylian Mbappé Air Max Plus Voltage Purple
Text:
The Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 FG Kylian Mbappé Air Max Plus Voltage Purple is an elite soccer cleat that takes inspiration from the Air Max Plus. This high-performance shoe was introduced by the famous soccer player Kylian Mbappé, a forward for Real Madrid and the captain of the French national team.

The Voltage Purple Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 Firm Ground, inspired by both the Air Max Plus and Kylian Mbappé, features an upper crafted from lightweight Vaporposite+ in purple. A black TPU cage provides iconic style and all over foot support, and it matches the stretchy, form-fitting FlyKnit collar. The sole unit in shades of white, iridescent black, and orange features a soleplate with tri-star studs that deliver optimal grip on the turf.

The aspect of this high-octane soccer shoe that we enjoy the most is the side-panel Nike Swoosh. The bright orange outlined in black set against the purple adds a vibrant pop of contrast. The Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 FG Kylian Mbappé Air Max Plus Voltage Purple was released on January 15, 2024, for $310 retail.

Name: adidas Predator 30 Elite FT FG 30th Anniversary
Text:
Celebrate three decades of game-changing soccer tech with the adidas Predator 30 Elite FT FG, which dropped on December 8, 2023, boasting a legacy burgundy palette that commands respect on the pitch. The 30th-anniversary edition fuses the time-honored Predator performance with a touch of modern sophistication.

This elite-level cleat features a core black and off-white upper with a legacy burgundy accent, offering an aesthetic that's as dynamic as its gameplay. The innovative design, including a fold-over tongue and state-of-the-art traction, maximizes control and precision. It's a nod to the Predator's rich history while pushing the boundaries of modern soccer technology.

Priced at $350, the adidas Predator 30 Elite FT FG is an investment in soccer excellence. It's crafted for athletes who demand the best and cherish the Predator lineage—a true collector's item that delivers on both performance and style.

Name: Nike Vapor Edge Dunk Kyler Murray
Text:
The Nike Vapor Edge Dunk Kyler Murray is part of a collaboration between Nike and American football player Kyler Murray.

This sneaker applies football-specific features to the Nike Vapor Edge Dunk silhouette. For example, the outsole boasts protruding studs in Vibrant Rose Gold. Although the base is white, Rose Gold elements can also be found on the Swoosh and on the metal aglets at the end of the laces. This color symbolizes Murray’s elegance as he plays, while the word "family" in Korean pays homage to Kyler Murray’s roots. Other symbolic elements include ‘Be 1 of ONE’ printed under the tongue, which represents the athlete’s mission to inspire children to become the best version of themselves.

Our experts at StockX like that the insole is locked onto the plate. This prevents the foot from sliding inside the shoe during quick movements. The Nike Vapor Edge Dunk Kyler Murray was released on November 10th, 2023, and retailed at $190.

Name: Vapor Edge Pro 360 VC White Metallic Silver
Text:
The Vapor Edge Pro 360 VC White Metallic Silver is a football cleat whose design was updated to include a full-foot Vapor plate.

This version of the Vapor Edge Pro 360 VC features an upper made of lightweight synthetic leather in white. The material is seamless and a metallic silver Nike swoosh appears starting at the toe on the lateral side. The shoe’s upper also features vertical cutouts on each side, revealing a gray layer underneath. Gray also forms the heel, with the Nike brand name appearing in bold white letters on the lateral side. The tongue features "V" branding. The shoe sits on top of a Vapor plate which provides flexibility, support, and instant propulsion. Widely-spaced studs on the cleats allow for quick movements.

Our favorite feature of these cleats is the clean white and gray design, which provides versatility and an airy look. The Vapor Edge Pro 360 VC White Metallic Silver was released on July 11, 2023, for $150.

Name: Jordan 1 Mid TD Cleat Black White
Text:
The Jordan 1 Mid TD Cleat Black White takes the Jordan 1 Mid and reimagines it for the football field with performance-enhancing technologies and a sleek colorway of black with white accents.

Designed for speed, the cleat Black White Jordan 1 Mid TD Cleat features wide stud placement underfoot that supports quick movements. Reminiscent of the original Air Jordan 1, the upper boasts synthetic leather detailing that adds durability to the design. These details provide scratch resistance to the sneaker without sacrificing the premium appearance. In terms of technology, the external Lunarlon foam midsole gives the wearer lasting comfort. The all-white branding details include the large Swoosh logos on the side panels, the Air Jordan Wings logo, and the crisp Jumpman logo on the tongue.

Our StockX experts appreciate the front lacing system’s supportive design, which keeps the foot locked in and protects the ankle. The Jordan 1 Mid TD Cleat Black White was released on June 1, 2023, and sold for $150.

Name: Nike Vapor Edge 360 DT Max '96 Cleat Diamond Turf Black White
Text:
The Nike Vapor Edge 360 DT Max '96 Cleat Diamond Turf Black White is a football cleat designed in partnership with Deion Sanders, aka Coach Prime.
   
The Diamond Turf Black White Nike Vapor Edge 360 DT Max ‘96 Cleat has a lightweight synthetic leather upper in black. Jagged white support pieces bleed up from the midsole into the design of the upper in what looks like licks of flames, breaking up the black design. Small Varsity Maize yellow Nike Swooshes appear on each side under the ankle, and perforations revealing a yellow layer underneath are seen on the lateral side. The forefoot strap bears a white Nike Swoosh, as does the heel collar. The tongue’s pull tab features Coach Prime branding. The shoe sits on a Vapor plate built for speed, and the stud placement is intended for quick cuts. 

Our favorite thing about this cleat is the sock-like ankle, which provides a comfortable and supportive fit. The Nike Vapor Edge 360 DT Max '96 Cleat Diamond Turf Black White was released on June 14, 2024, for $220.

Name: Nike Vapor Edge Pro 360 2 Black Iron Grey
Text:
The Nike Vapor Edge Pro 360 2 Black Iron Gray updates the original Nike Vapor Edge Pro 360 with reworked features on the upper and a locked-in fit.

This performance soccer cleat boasts a lightweight molded upper made with durable synthetic materials. NikeSkin overlays support flexibility and stability while contributing to the shoe’s low weight. A breathable elastic cuff creates a snug fit around the ankle and further supports stability. Pull tabs on the heel and above the lace cage help the athlete tug the cuff over the ankle and add an element of style. Although technical features are the most important part of this shoe, it also boasts a monochromatic colorway of white and black with Iron Gray accent lines around the Swoosh logo.

Our experts at StockX like the internal frame, which replaces a traditional plate. The Nike Vapor Edge Pro 360 2 Black Iron Gray was released on January 8th, 2023, and retailed at $125.

Name: Jordan 1 Low TD Cleat Shadow 2.0
Text:
The Jordan 1 Low TD Cleat Shadow 2.0 updates the AJ1 with football technologies to support quick movements on the field. It features Michael Jordan’s classic "Shadow" colorway with a black base and Light Smoke Grey accents.

At the Shadow 2.0 Jordan 1 Low TD Cleat, a series of studs replaces the traditional sole unit and increases traction on slippery grass. The upper is crafted from synthetic leather instead of genuine leather, which increases the shoe’s longevity. The base comes in black while the forefoot and heel overlays, the collar, the eyelets, and the signature Swoosh logo are crafted from synthetic leather in Light Smoke Grey. Perforations across the vamp allow the foot to breathe, while durable, black laces secure the front closure.

Our experts at StockX like the minimalist branding because it allows the color-blocking to take center stage. The only branding on the exterior is the Jumpman logo on the tongue tag. The Jordan 1 Low TD Cleat Shadow 2.0 was released on August 1, 2023, and sold for $140.

Name: Nike Vapor Edge Pro 360 White
Text:
The Nike Vapor Edge Pro 360 White is a football cleat designed version. The sneaker comes in a predominantly white colorway with black accents.

The upper of the Vapor Edge Pro 360 in White is constructed using Nike's signature Flywire technology, which provides support and lockdown, as well as a lightweight and flexible fit. The shoe features a dynamic fit collar that wraps snugly around the ankle, providing support and stability. The synthetic material used in the shoe's construction is breathable and durable.

Our experts say that the notable feature of the Nike Vapor Edge Pro 360 White is the sole plate. The plate consists of 8 chevron studs and 4 heel studs, along with a TPU plate that provides traction and stability on the field. The stud shape is designed to be highly responsive to the player's movements, offering quick starts, stops, and cuts. The plate's flexibility ensures that the player can move without sacrificing stability. The shoe was released on February 8th, 2020, at a retail price of $120.

Name: Jordan 1 Retro High Golf Metallic Green
Text:
The Jordan 1 Retro High Golf Metallic Green takes an iconic basketball silhouette, reimagines it for golf, and dresses it in an eye-catching iridescent colorway.

The Metallic Green Air Jordan 1 Retro High-Top Golf shoe features a vintage upper with a base of white leather. White leather overlays adorn the midfoot and eyestays. Flat white laces crisscross over a white tongue and match the padded white sock liner that offers enhanced ankle comfort. Iridescent green leather adds a sheen to this upper with a perforated toe box underlay, heel and collar overlays, and the side panel Nike Swoosh. A white Wings logo is stamped on the lateral collar overlay, a green Jumpman adorns the white tongue tag, and a white Jumpman graces the green insole to complete the look of this upper.

Our favorite aspect of this sneaker is the outsole, which has been modified for golf. Beneath a white foam midsole, a green rubber outsole sports sharpened lugs to provide grip on the fairway. The Jordan 1 Retro High Golf Metallic Green was released on April 28, 2023, for $180 retail.

Name: Jordan 12 Retro Eastside Golf Out of the Clay
Text:
The Air Jordan 12 Retro Eastside Golf Out of the Clay is part of the shoe catalog created in collaboration with a golf-centric lifestyle company. 

This sneaker's upper is dressed in a Burnt Sunrise lizard-textured mudguards and a cream-colored leather upper with metallic gold embellishments. Its brandings include the Eastside Golf emblem which is embroidered on its tongue, a Jumpman logo on its underfoot, and midsoles and a splatter pattern featured on its heel. Translucent herringbone traction pods in mismatched colors are visible underneath the outsole, with grass green on a red dirt finish on its right and grass green on its left.

The Air Jordan 12 Retro Eastside Golf Out of the Clay was released on 12th November 2022. It retailed at $200.

Name: UGG Classic Short II Boot Chestnut (Women's)
Text:
Chestnut is the only color that dresses the UGG Classic Short II Boot Chestnut W.

This Short II Boot UGG Classic for women in a Chestnut color scheme showcases the renowned UGG silhouette, enhanced with a high-quality suede upper that has been treated to resist stains and moisture. It also incorporates the durable Treadlite outsole for added traction. Additionally, this boot includes an UggPure wool insole.

The UGG Classic Short II Boot Chestnut W had a starting retail price of at around $170 when it was first launched in the market on September 1st, 2021.

Name: UGG Sunburst Tall Boot Chestnut (Women's)
Text:
The UGG Sunburst Tall Boot Chestnut (Women's) offers timeless UGG style with an extra dose of warmth and luxury. Crafted from chestnut-colored premium suede and lined with plush sheepskin, this tall boot is designed for the colder months, ensuring your feet stay cozy and protected from the elements. The sheepskin cuff adds an extra touch of flair and warmth, making it perfect for braving the winter chill in style.

The tall design of the Sunburst Boot elongates the leg, while the chestnut colorway gives it a classic and versatile look. The sturdy sole provides excellent traction, making it as functional as it is fashionable. Whether you're heading out for a casual day or dressing up a winter outfit, this boot keeps you warm while elevating your style.

Released on October 5, 2016, the UGG Sunburst Tall Boot Chestnut (Women's) retailed for $250. Its combination of warmth, style, and comfort makes it a go-to choice for those looking to invest in a long-lasting winter boot that doesn’t compromise on luxury.

Name: Crocs Classic Mega Crush Clog Rauw Alejandro Bone
Text:
The Crocs Classic Mega Crush Clog Rauw Alejandro Bone is a bold collaboration between Crocs and Latin music sensation Rauw Alejandro. Known for pushing boundaries in music and fashion, Rauw brings his edgy style to the Mega Crush Clog, featuring a sleek bone colorway. This model combines Crocs' iconic comfort with Rauw's creative flair, resulting in a must-have for both fans of his music and those who love making a fashion statement.

The Mega Crush Clog is designed with a chunky, oversized platform sole, adding height and a modern twist to the traditional clog silhouette. Made from lightweight Croslite foam, these clogs offer unparalleled comfort and durability. The bone color keeps the design fresh and versatile, while the addition of custom Jibbitz charms inspired by Rauw Alejandro adds a unique, collectible element to the shoe. Whether you're pairing these with streetwear or casual outfits, the clogs offer a stylish way to showcase your individuality.

Released on September 13, 2024, the Crocs Classic Mega Crush Clog Rauw Alejandro Bone retailed for $90. This collaboration highlights how Crocs continues to blend comfort with cutting-edge fashion, making it perfect for those who want to stand out while staying comfortable.

Name: Jordan 11 Retro Jubilee 25th Anniversary
Text:
In 2020, Jordan Brand celebrated 25 years of one of their most popular models, the Jordan 11. To commemorate the famed silhouette, Michael Jordan and Nike released the Jordan 11 Jubilee. The sneaker’s distinct colorway was inspired by original sketches from the designer of the 1995 sneaker, Tinker Hatfield.

The Jordan 11 Jubilee showcases everything Hatfield envisioned for the sneaker 25 years ago; a performance product that can be worn easily both on and off the court. Features such as the two types of leather on the upper with hits of metallic lettering and Jumpman emblem add luxe elements to the athletic sneaker. A white midsole and foggy translucent outsole deliver contrast to the black sneaker. Carbon fiber plating on the sole provides stability and power to the wearer’s feet on the court.

The Jordan 11 Jubilee 25th Anniversary released in December of 2020 for $220.

Name: Jordan 8 Retro Winterized Gunsmoke
Text:
The Jordan 8 Retro Winterized Gunsmoke presents a versatile and neutral color palette for the iconic championship silhouette.

The Winterized Gunsmoke Air Jordan 8 Retro design showcases a black nubuck upper that is water-resistant, secured with synthetic black cross straps. Specifically crafted to endure adverse weather conditions, the water-resistant black suede upper includes reflective side straps, enhancing visibility in low-light settings. Jumpman branding is featured on a circular chenille patch atop the tongue. Adding vibrancy, metallic silver accents adorn the black foam midsole, which incorporates an encapsulated Air-sole unit in the heel for lightweight cushioning.

The standout element of the Jordan 8 Retro Winterized Gunsmoke is its water-resistant black nubuck upper. This distinguishing feature, coupled with the shoe's resilience against challenging weather conditions, distinguishes it from others and amplifies its adaptability for diverse climates. The sneaker was originally sold for a price of $200 on November 27th, 2023.

Name: Jordan 1 Retro High Black Metallic Gold (2020)
Text:
Jordan Brand is no stranger to patent leather. Since the Air Jordan 11 debuted the material for the brand back in 1996, it’s found its way onto various models such as the Jordan 1, Jordan 4, and Jordan 7. 2020 marks the third issue of the patent-clad Air Jordan 1 Black Metallic Gold, with the first releasing back in 2001, and again in 2013.

The Air Jordan 1 Black Metallic Gold’s 2020 retro delivers slight cosmetic changes from its 2013 predecessor. The upper black and metallic gold patent leather upper. From there, a full translucent black sole with gold speckles completes the Jordan 1 classic.

The Air Jordan 1 Black Metallic Gold released in November of 2020 and retailed for $170.

Name: Jordan 11 Retro Pantone
Text:
Pantone blue and white are the two main colors in the design scheme that defines the outward appearance of the Air Jordan 11 Retro Pantone.

The Retro Pantone Air Jordan 11 is a unique iteration of the iconic Air Jordan 11 silhouette. It showcases a predominantly Legend Blue color scheme, applied to both the patent leather and smooth leather upper. The shoe features a clean white midsole and a translucent outsole with a tint of Legend Blue. Originally unveiled as a sample collection during the 2010 World Basketball Festival, this particular colorway was later released as part of the "Ultimate Gift of Flight Pack" alongside a similarly styled Air Jordan 29. The'University Blue colorway pays homage to Michael Jordan's college days, when he achieved NCAA Championship success as a member of the University of North Carolina Tarheels.

The Air Jordan 11 Retro Pantone made its market debut on December 23, 2014, with $250 as the suggested market price.

Name: Jordan 11 Retro 'Concord' 2018
Text: The 2018 edition of the Air Jordan 11 Retro ‘Concord’ features ‘45’ stamped on the black heel tab—a nod to the jersey number that Michael Jordan wore upon his return to basketball following his first retirement. The rest of the build keeps the shoe’s signature details intact, including a white ballistic mesh upper, black patent leather overlays and an icy translucent outsole underfoot.
